  6970                                  
  6971                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  6972                                  ;
  6973                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  6974                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  6975                                  ;
  6976                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  6977                                  ;
  6978                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  6979                                  ;   initialize it.
  6980                                  ;
  6981                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  6982                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  6983                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  6984                                  ;
  6985                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  6986                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  6987                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  6988                                  ;
  6989                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  6990                                  ;   save coding.
  6991                                  ;
  6992                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  6993                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  6994                                  ;
  6995                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  6996                                  ;
  6997                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  6998                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  6999                                  ;
  7000                                  ; called modules:
  7001                                  ;		  getboot
  7002                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  7003                                  ;
  7004                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  7005                                  ;
  7006                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  7007                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  7008                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7009                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  7010                                  ;
  7011                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7012                                  
  7013                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7014                                  domini:	
  7015 00002179 8A36[5117]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  7016                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7017 0000217D 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  7018                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  7019 0000217F 7431                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  7020 00002181 B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  7021                                  domini_loop:				
  7022 00002183 52                      		push	dx
  7023 00002184 8816[5017]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  7024 00002188 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  7025 0000218A CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7026                                  					; DL = drive number
  7027                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7028                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7029                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7030 0000218C FEC6                    		inc	dh
  7031 0000218E 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  7032 00002190 88F0                    		mov	al, dh
  7033 00002192 A3[5617]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  7034 00002195 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh
  7035 00002198 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  7036 0000219A A3[5817]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  7037 0000219D 06                      		push	es
  7038 0000219E 8A16[5017]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7039 000021A2 E836FB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  7040                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  7041 000021A5 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  7042 000021A7 E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  7043                                  domininext:				
  7044 000021AA 07                      		pop	es
  7045 000021AB 5A                      		pop	dx
  7046 000021AC FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  7047 000021AE FECE                    		dec	dh
  7048 000021B0 75D1                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  7049                                  dominiret:				
  7050 000021B2 C3                      		retn
  7051                                  
  7052                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7053                                  
  7054                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7055                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7056                                  
  7057                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7058                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7059                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7060                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7061                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7062                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7063                                  ;
  7064                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7065                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7066                                  
  7067                                  
  7068                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7069 000021B3 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7070                                  fmpnext:				
  7071 000021B7 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7072 000021BB 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7073 000021BD 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7074 000021C0 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7075 000021C4 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7076                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7077                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7078                                  fmpnextfound:
  7079 000021C6 C3                      		retn
  7080                                  
  7081                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7082                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7083                                  ;fmpret:
  7084                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7085                                  
  7086                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7087                                  
  7088                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7089                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  7090 000021C7 E8A100                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7091 000021CA 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7092 000021CC 8B3E[5417]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free	bds
  7093 000021D0 C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7094                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7095 000021D5 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7096                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7097                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7098 000021D9 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7099                                  					; ffHardFile
  7100 000021DD C606[D216]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7101 000021E2 A1[5617]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7102 000021E5 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7103 000021E8 A1[5817]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7104 000021EB 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7105 000021EE A0[5017]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7106 000021F1 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7107                                  					; set physical number
  7108 000021F4 A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7109 000021F7 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7110                                  					; set logical number
  7111 000021FA 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7112 000021FF 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7113 00002201 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7114                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7115 00002206 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7116                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7117                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7118 00002208 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7119 0000220B 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7120 0000220F 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7121 00002212 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7122 00002214 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7123 00002216 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7124 0000221A 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7125                                  					; set hidden trks
  7126 0000221D 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7127 00002221 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7128 00002225 8A16[5017]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7129 00002229 BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7130 0000222C B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7131 0000222F CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7132                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7133                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7134                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7135 00002231 7293                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7136 00002233 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7137 00002236 06                      		push	es
  7138 00002237 E80900                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7139                                  					; bx value saved.
  7140 0000223A 07                      		pop	es
  7141 0000223B 7203                    		jb	short fmpnextchain
  7142 0000223D E84000                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7143                                  fmpnextchain:				
  7144 00002240 E974FF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7145                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7146                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7147                                  
  7148                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7149                                  ;fmpnextfound:				
  7150                                  		;retn
  7151                                  
  7152                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7153                                  
  7154                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7155                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21)
  7156                                  
  7157                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7158                                  	
  7159 00002243 57                      		push	di
  7160 00002244 53                      		push	bx
  7161 00002245 1E                      		push	ds
  7162 00002246 06                      		push	es
  7163                                  setmini_1:				
  7164 00002247 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12 partition
  7165 0000224B 741B                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7166 0000224D 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  7167 00002251 7415                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7168 00002253 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG	partition
  7169 00002257 740F                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7170 00002259 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7171 0000225C 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7172 00002260 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  7173 00002262 F9                      		stc
  7174 00002263 07                      		pop	es
  7175 00002264 1F                      		pop	ds
  7176 00002265 5B                      		pop	bx
  7177 00002266 5F                      		pop	di
  7178 00002267 C3                      		retn
  7179                                  
  7180                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7181                                  setmini_2:				
  7182 00002268 E91DFB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard
  7183                                  
  7184                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7185                                  
  7186                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7187                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7188                                  ;
  7189                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7190                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7191                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7192                                  ;
  7193                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7194                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7195                                  ;			trash ax
  7196                                  
  7197                                  dmax_check:	
  7198 0000226B 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7199 00002270 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; return with carry if okay
  7200 00002272 06                      		push	es
  7201                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7202 00002273 B85804                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  7203 00002276 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  7204                                  		; 18/10/2022
  7205 00002278 26C606[FF03]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  7206                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  7207                                  					; set message flag
