  8274                                  ;************************************************************************
  8275                                  ;*									*
  8276                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8277                                  ;*									*
  8278                                  ;************************************************************************
  8279                                  
  8280                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8281                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8282                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8283                                  
  8284                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8285                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8286                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8287                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8288                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8289                                  ;
  8290                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8291                                  
  8292                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8293                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8294                                  
  8295                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8296                                  
  8297                                  ;************************************************************************
  8298                                  ;*									*
  8299                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8300                                  ;*									*
  8301                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8302                                  ;*									*
  8303                                  ;************************************************************************
  8304                                  
  8305                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8306 00000218 E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8307                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8308                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8309                                  prn_done:
  8310 0000021B F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8311 0000021C C3                      		retn
  8312                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8313                                  
  8314                                  ;************************************************************************
  8315                                  ;*									*
  8316                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8317                                  ;*									*
  8318                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8319                                  ;*									*
  8320                                  ;************************************************************************
  8321                                  
  8322                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8323                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8324 0000021D E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8325                                  prn_loop:				
  8326 0000021F BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8327                                  prn_out:				
  8328 00000222 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8329 00000225 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8330 00000227 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8331 0000022A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8332 0000022C E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8333 0000022F 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8334 00000231 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8335 00000234 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8336 00000236 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8337 00000238 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8338 0000023D EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8339                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8340                                  
  8341                                  _prnwf:					
  8342 0000023F F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8343 00000242 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8344                                  TestPrnError:				
  8345 00000244 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8346 00000245 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8347                                  pmessg:					
  8348 00000247 E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8349                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8350                                  
  8351                                  prn_con:				
  8352 0000024A 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  8353 0000024B E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8354                                  ;prn_done:				
  8355                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8356                                  prn_done2:
  8357                                  		;clc
  8358                                  		; cf=0
  8359 0000024D C3                      		retn
  8360                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8361                                  
  8362                                  ;************************************************************************
  8363                                  ;*									*
  8364                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8365                                  ;*									*
  8366                                  ;************************************************************************
  8367                                  
  8368                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8369 0000024E E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8370 00000251 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8371 00000253 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8372                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8373                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8374 00000256 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8375 00000258 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8376                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8377                                  
  8378                                  ;************************************************************************
  8379                                  ;*									*
  8380                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8381                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8382                                  ;*									*
  8383                                  ;************************************************************************
  8384                                  
  8385                                  prnstat:				
  8386 0000025B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8387                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8388                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8389                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8390                                  
  8391                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8392                                  
  8393                                  ;************************************************************************
  8394                                  ;*									*
  8395                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8396                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8397                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8398                                  ;*									*
  8399                                  ;************************************************************************
  8400                                  
  8401                                  prnop:	
  8402 0000025D 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8403 00000261 CD17                    		int	17h
  8404                                  
  8405                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8406                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8407                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8408                                  
  8409 00000263 50                      		push	ax
  8410 00000264 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8411 00000267 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8412 0000026A 58                      		pop	ax
  8413 0000026B 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8414 0000026D 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8415 00000270 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8416                                  
  8417                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8418                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8419                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8420                                  
  8421                                  NextTest:				
  8422 00000273 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8423                                  					; i/o error?
  8424 00000276 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8425                                  
  8426                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8427                                  
  8428 00000278 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8429                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8430 0000027A F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8431 0000027D 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8432 0000027F FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8433                                  ret1:					
  8434 00000281 C3                      		retn
  8435                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8436                                  
  8437                                  checknotready:				
  8438 00000282 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8439 00000284 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8440 00000287 C3                      		retn
  8441                                  
  8442                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8443                                  
  8444                                  ;************************************************************************
  8445                                  ;*									*
  8446                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8447                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8448                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8449                                  ;*									*
  8450                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8451                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8452                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8453                                  ;*									*
  8454                                  ;************************************************************************
  8455                                  
  8456                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8457                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8458 00000288 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8459                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8460 0000028A 51                      		push	cx
  8461 0000028B 53                      		push	bx
  8462 0000028C 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8463 0000028E 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8464 00000292 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8465                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8466 00000294 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8467 00000298 5B                      		pop	bx
  8468                                  prn_getstat:				
  8469 00000299 E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8470 0000029C 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8471 0000029E F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8472 000002A1 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8473 000002A3 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8474 000002A4 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8475 000002A6 26                      		es
  8476 000002A7 AC                      		lodsb
  8477                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8478                                  					; lodsb
  8479 000002A8 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8480 000002AA E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8481 000002AD 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8482 000002AF E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8483                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8484                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8485                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8486 000002B1 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8487                                  
  8488                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8489                                  
  8490                                  prn_bperr:				
  8491 000002B2 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8492                                  prn_berr:				
  8493 000002B3 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8494                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8495

  8498                                  ;************************************************************************
  8499                                  ;*									*
  8500                                  ;*	prn_genioctl - get/set printer retry count			*
  8501                                  ;*									*
  8502                                  ;************************************************************************
  8503                                  
  8504                                  ; IOCTL.INC (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  8505                                  ; 11/01/2019
  8506                                  
  8507                                  ;********************************;*

  8509                                  ;********************************;*
  8510                                  
  8511                                  ;;RAWIO SUB-FUNCTIONS

  8513                                  ;;set_retry_count equ 45h
  8514

  8516                                  ;;.rc_count: resw 1
  8517                                  ;;endstruc
  8518                                  
  8519                                  ;ioc_pc equ 5
  8520                                  
  8521                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8522                                  
  8523                                  		; 19/10/2022

  8527                                  					; ioc_pc

  8530                                  prnfuncerr:

  8536 000002C8 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
  8537 000002CC 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8538                                  		;mov	bl, ds:printdev	; get index into retry counts
  8539 000002CE 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8540 000002D2 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1

  8544 000002DA 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount
  8545 000002DC 3C45                    		cmp	al, 45h		; set_retry_count

  8550 000002E3 898F[E804]              		mov	[wait_count+bx], cx
  8551 000002E7 26890D                  		mov	[es:di], cx	; [es:di+A_RETRYCOUNT.RC_COUNT]
  8552                                  					; return current retry count
  8553                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8554                                  		; cf=0
  8555                                  		;clc
  8556 000002EA C3                      		retn
  8557                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8558

  8589                                  ;************************************************************************
  8590                                  ;*									*
  8591                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8592                                  ;*									*
  8593                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8594                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8595                                  ;*									*
  8596                                  ;************************************************************************
  8597                                  
  8598                                  ;	values in ah, requesting function of int 14h in rom bios
  8599                                  
  8600                                  ;auxfunc_send	 equ	1	;transmit
  8601                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8602                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status
  8603                                  
  8604                                  ;	error flags, reported by int 14h, reported in ah:
  8605                                  
  8606                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8607                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8608                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8609                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8610                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8611                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8612                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout
  8613                                  
  8614                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8615                                  
  8616                                  ;flag_cts	 equ	10h	;clear to send
  8617                                  ;flag_dsr	 equ	20h	;data set ready
  8618                                  ;flag_rec_sig	 equ	80h	;receive line signal detect
  8619                                  
  8620                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8621                                  
  8622                                  ;************************************************************************
  8623                                  ;*									*
  8624                                  ;*	aux_read - read cx bytes from [auxnum] aux port to buffer	*
  8625                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  8626                                  ;*									*
  8627                                  ;************************************************************************
  8628                                  
  8629                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh
  8630                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2
  8631 00000306 E311                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8632 00000308 E87700                  		call	getbx		; put address of auxbuf	in bx
  8633 0000030B 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8634 0000030D 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  8635 0000030F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8636 00000311 7503                    		jnz	short aux2
  8637                                  aux1:					
  8638 00000313 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  8639                                  					; won't return if error
  8640                                  aux2:					
  8641 00000316 AA                      		stosb
  8642 00000317 E2FA                    		loop	aux1		; if more characters, go around	again
  8643                                  exvec2:					
  8644 00000319 F8                      		clc			; all done, successful exit
  8645                                  auxin_retn:	; 18/12/2022
  8646 0000031A C3                      		retn
  8647                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8648                                  
  8649                                  ;************************************************************************
  8650                                  ;*									*
  8651                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*
  8652                                  ;*		if error occurs, map the error and return one		*
  8653                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  8654                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*
  8655                                  ;*									*
  8656                                  ;************************************************************************
  8657                                  
  8658                                  auxin:					
  8659 0000031B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; auxfunc_receive
  8660 0000031D E83C00                  		call	auxop
  8661 00000320 F6C40E                  		test	ah, 0Eh		; flag_frame|flag_parity|flag_overrun
  8662                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  8663                                  		;retn
  8664                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  8665 00000323 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn
  8666                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8667                                  
  8668                                  arbad:					
  8669 00000325 58                      		pop	ax		; remove return	address	(near call)
  8670 00000326 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8671 00000328 0CB0                    		or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  8672 0000032A E9AAFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8673                                  
  8674                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8675                                  
  8676                                  ;************************************************************************
  8677                                  ;*									*
  8678                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  8679                                  ;*									*
  8680                                  ;************************************************************************
  8681                                  
  8682                                  aux_rdnd:				; 2C7h:335h = 70h:28A5h
  8683 0000032D E85200                  		call	getbx
  8684 00000330 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; have bx point	to auxbuf
  8685 00000332 08C0                    		or	al, al		; if al	is non-zero (char in buffer)
  8686 00000334 7511                    		jnz	short auxdrx	; then return character
  8687 00000336 E82100                  		call	auxstat		; if not, get status of	aux device
  8688 00000339 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; flag_data_ready - test data ready
  8689 0000033C 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8690 0000033E A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  8691 00000340 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8692 00000342 E8D6FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  8693 00000345 8807                    		mov	[bx], al
  8694                                  auxdrx:					
  8695 00000347 E9A7FE                  		jmp	rdexit		; return busy status
  8696                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8697                                  
  8698                                  auxbus:					
  8699 0000034A E979FE                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8700                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8701                                  
  8702                                  ;************************************************************************
  8703                                  ;*									*
  8704                                  ;*	aux_wrst - return aux port write status				*
  8705                                  ;*									*
  8706                                  ;************************************************************************
  8707                                  
  8708                                  aux_wrst:				; 2C7h:355h = 70h:28C5h

  8710 00000350 A820                    		test	al, 20h		; test data set	ready
  8711 00000352 74F6                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8712 00000354 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  8713 00000357 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8714                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8715                                  		; cf=0	; (test instruction resets cf)
  8716                                  		;clc
  8717 00000359 C3                      		retn
  8718                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8719                                  
  8720                                  ;************************************************************************
  8721                                  ;*									*
  8722                                  ;*	auxstat - call rom bios to determine aux port status		*
  8723                                  ;*									*
  8724                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  8725                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8726                                  ;*									*
  8727                                  ;************************************************************************
  8728                                  
  8729                                  auxstat:				
  8730 0000035A B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  8731                                  
  8732                                  		; fall into auxop
  8733                                  
  8734                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8735                                  
  8736                                  ;************************************************************************
  8737                                  ;*									*
  8738                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  8739                                  ;*									*
  8740                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  8741                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  8742                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8743                                  ;*									*
  8744                                  ;************************************************************************
  8745                                  
  8746                                  auxop:		; proc near		
  8747 0000035C 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  8748                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  8749                                  					; get port number
  8750 00000360 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  8751                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  8752                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  8753 00000362 C3                      		retn
  8754                                  
  8755                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8756                                  
  8757                                  ;************************************************************************
  8758                                  ;*									*
  8759                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  8760                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  8761                                  ;*									*
  8762                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  8763                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  8764                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  8765                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  8766                                  ;*									*
  8767                                  ;************************************************************************
  8768                                  
  8769                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  8770 00000363 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  8771 00000366 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  8772                                  					; zero out buffer
  8773                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8774                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8775                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  8776 00000369 C3                      		retn
  8777                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8778                                  
  8779                                  ;************************************************************************
  8780                                  ;*									*
  8781                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
  8782                                  ;*									*
  8783                                  ;************************************************************************
  8784                                  
  8785                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
  8786                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  8787 0000036A E3AD                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8788                                  aux_loop:				
  8789 0000036C 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
  8790                                  					; move di pointer to next character
  8791 0000036F 47                      		inc	di
  8792 00000370 B401                    		mov	ah, 1		; auxfunc_send - indicates a write
  8793 00000372 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
  8794 00000375 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  8795 00000378 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error
  8796 0000037A B00A                    		mov	al, 10		; else indicate	write fault
  8797 0000037C E958FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  8798                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8799                                  
  8800                                  awok:					
  8801 0000037F E2EB                    		loop	aux_loop	; if cx	is non-zero,
  8802                                  					; still	more character to print
  8803                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8804                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8805                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  8806 00000381 C3                      		retn
  8807                                  
  8808                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8809                                  
  8810                                  ;************************************************************************
  8811                                  ;*									*
  8812                                  ;*	getbx - return bx -> single byte input buffer for		*
  8813                                  ;*		selected aux port ([auxnum])				*
  8814                                  ;*									*
  8815                                  ;************************************************************************
  8816                                  
  8817                                  getbx:	
  8818 00000382 8B1E[2100]              		mov	bx, [auxnum]	; return bx -> single byte input buffer
  8819                                  					; for selected aux port	([auxnum])
  8820                                  		;add	bx, offset auxbuf
  8821 00000386 81C3[1600]              		add	bx, auxbuf	; 19/10/2022
  8822                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8823                                  		; cf=0 (if [uaxnum] is valid number) 
  8824 0000038A C3                      		retn
  8825                                  
  8826                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8827                                  
  8828                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8829                                  
  8830                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  8831                                  ;								:
  8832                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
  8833                                  ;								:
  8834                                  ;								:
  8835                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
  8836                                  ;								:
  8837                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
  8838                                  ;								:
  8839                                  ;	routine 		function			:
  8840                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
  8841                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
  8842                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
  8843                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
  8844                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
  8845                                  ;								:
  8846                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
  8847                                  ;								:
  8848                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
  8849                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
  8850                                  ;								:
  8851                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  8852                                  
  8853                                  ; convert time to ticks
  8854                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
  8855                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
  8856                                  
  8857                                  ;19/07/2019
  8858                                  ;09/03/2019
  8859                                  
  8860                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
  8861                                  
  8862                                  ; first convert from hour,min,sec,hund. to
  8863                                  ; total number of 100th of seconds
  8864                                  
  8865 0000038B B03C                    		mov	al, 60
  8866 0000038D F6E5                    		mul	ch		; hours	to minutes
  8867 0000038F B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  8868 00000391 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; total	minutes
  8869 00000393 B97017                  		mov	cx, 6000	; 60*100
  8870 00000396 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; get out of the way of	the multiply
  8871 00000398 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to 1/100 sec
  8872 0000039A 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  8873 0000039C B064                    		mov	al, 100
  8874 0000039E F6E7                    		mul	bh		; convert seconds to 1/100 sec
  8875 000003A0 01C1                    		add	cx, ax		; combine seconds with hours and min
  8876 000003A2 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; ripple carry
  8877 000003A5 B700                    		mov	bh, 0
  8878 000003A7 01D9                    		add	cx, bx		; combine 1/100	sec
  8879 000003A9 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  8880                                  
  8881                                  	; dx:cx is time in 1/100 sec
  8882                                  
  8883 000003AC 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  8884 000003AD 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; now time is in cx:ax
  8885 000003AE BB0BE9                  		mov	bx, 59659
  8886 000003B1 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply low half
  8887 000003B3 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx
  8888 000003B5 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; cx->ax, ax->dx, dx->cx
  8889 000003B6 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply high	half
  8890 000003B8 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; combine overlapping products
  8891 000003BA 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  8892 000003BD 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; ax:dx=time*59659
  8893 000003BE BB0500                  		mov	bx, 5
  8894 000003C1 F6F3                    		div	bl		; divide high half by 5
  8895 000003C3 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
  8896 000003C5 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  8897 000003C7 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; remainder of divide-by-5
  8898 000003C9 98                      		cbw
  8899 000003CA 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; use it to extend low half
  8900 000003CB F7F3                    		div	bx		; divide low half by 5
  8901 000003CD 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; cx:dx	is now number of ticks in time
  8902 000003CF CB                      		retf			; far return
  8903                                  
  8904                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8905                                  
  8906                                  ; 17/10/2022
  8907                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8908                                  
  8909                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  8910                                  ;
  8911                                  ; tim_writ sets the current time
  8912                                  ;
  8913                                  ; on entry es:[di] has the current time:
  8914                                  ;
  8915                                  ;	number of days since 1-1-80	(word)
  8916                                  ;	minutes (0-59)			(byte)
  8917                                  ;	hours (0-23)			(byte)
  8918                                  ;	hundredths of seconds (0-99)	(byte)
  8919                                  ;	seconds (0-59)			(byte)
  8920                                  ;
  8921                                  ; each number has been checked for the correct range.
  8922                                  ;
  8923                                  ;	NOTE: Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  8924                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  8925                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  8926                                  ;
  8927                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  8928                                  
  8929                                  tim_writ:				; 2C7h:3DBh = 70h:294Bh
  8930 000003D0 268B05                  		mov	ax, [es:di]
  8931 000003D3 50                      		push	ax		; daycnt. we need to set this at the very
  8932                                  					; end to avoid tick windows.
  8933 000003D4 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  8934                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  8935 000003D9 7426                    		jz	short no_cmos_1
  8936 000003DB 268A4503                		mov	al, [es:di+3]	; near indirect	calls
  8937                                  					; get binary hours
  8938                                  					; convert to bcd
  8939 000003DF FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8940                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd	; call far [bintobcd]
  8941 000003E3 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; ch = bcd hours
  8942 000003E5 268A4502                		mov	al, [es:di+2]	; get binary minutes
  8943 000003E9 FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8944                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd	; convert to bcd
  8945 000003ED 88C1                    		mov	cl, al		; cl = bcd minutes
  8946 000003EF 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; get binary seconds
  8947 000003F3 FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8948                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd
  8949 000003F7 88C6                    		mov	dh, al		; dh = bcd seconds
  8950 000003F9 B200                    		mov	dl, 0		; dl = 0 (st) or 1 (dst)
  8951 000003FB FA                      		cli
  8952 000003FC B403                    		mov	ah, 3
  8953 000003FE CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  8954                                  					; CH = hours in	BCD, CL	= minutes in BCD
  8955                                  					;  DH =	seconds	in BCD,DL = 01h	if daylight savings, 00h if standard time
  8956                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  8957 00000400 FB                      		sti
  8958                                  no_cmos_1:				
  8959 00000401 268B4D02                		mov	cx, [es:di+2]
  8960 00000405 268B5504                		mov	dx, [es:di+4]
  8961                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8962 00000409 FF1E[E206]              		call	far [ttticks]
  8963                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:ttticks ; call far	[ttticks]
  8964                                  					; convert time to ticks
  8965                                  					; cx:dx	now has	time in	ticks
  8966 0000040D FA                      		cli			; turn off timer
  8967 0000040E B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8968 00000410 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  8969                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  8970                                  					; Return: time of day set
  8971                                  		;pop	ds:daycnt
  8972 00000412 8F06[F004]              		pop	word [daycnt]
  8973 00000416 FB                      		sti
  8974                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  8975 00000417 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  8976 0000041C 740A                    		jz	short no_cmos_2
  8977 0000041E FF1E[0605]              		call	far [daycnttoday]
  8978                                  		;call	ds:daycnttoday	; call far [daycnttoday]
  8979                                  					; convert to bcd format
  8980 00000422 FA                      		cli
  8981 00000423 B405                    		mov	ah, 5
  8982 00000425 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET DATE IN REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  8983                                  					; DL = day in BCD, DH =	month in BCD, CL = year	in BCD
  8984                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  8985                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  8986 00000427 FB                      		sti
  8987                                  no_cmos_2:
  8988                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8989                                  		; cf=0				
  8990                                  		;clc
  8991 00000428 C3                      		retn
  8992                                  
  8993                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8994                                  
  8995                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8996                                  
  8997                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8998                                  ; gettime reads date and time
  8999                                  ; and returns the following information:
  9000                                  ;
  9001                                  ;	es:[di]  =count of days since 1-1-80
  9002                                  ;	es:[di+2]=hours
  9003                                  ;	es:[di+3]=minutes
  9004                                  ;	es:[di+4]=seconds
  9005                                  ;	es:[di+5]=hundredths of seconds
  9006                                  ;
  9007                                  ;	NOTE:  Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  9008                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  9009                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  9010                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9011                                  
  9012                                  tim_read:				; 2C7h:435h = 70h:29A5h
  9013 00000429 E84E00                  		call	GetTickCnt
  9014 0000042C 8B36[F004]              		mov	si, [daycnt]
  9015                                  
  9016                                  ; we now need to convert the time in tick to the time in 100th of
  9017                                  ; seconds. the relation between tick and seconds is:
  9018                                  ;
  9019                                  ;		 65,536 seconds
  9020                                  ;	       ----------------
  9021                                  ;		1,193,180 tick
  9022                                  ;
  9023                                  ; to get to 100th of second we need to multiply by 100. the equation is:
  9024                                  ;
  9025                                  ;	ticks from clock  * 65,536 * 100
  9026                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9027                                  ;		1,193,180
  9028                                  ;
  9029                                  ; fortunately this formula simplifies to:
  9030                                  ;
  9031                                  ;	ticks from clock * 5 * 65,536
  9032                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9033                                  ;		59,659
  9034                                  ;
  9035                                  ; the calculation is done by first multipling tick by 5. next we divide by
  9036                                  ; 59,659. in this division we multiply by 65,536 by shifting the dividend
  9037                                  ; my 16 bits to the left.
  9038                                  ;
  9039                                  ; start with ticks in cx:dx
  9040                                  ; multiply by 5
  9041                                  
  9042 00000430 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
  9043 00000432 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; start	with ticks in cx:dx
  9044                                  					; multiply by 5
  9045 00000434 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9046 00000436 D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	2
  9047 00000438 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9048 0000043A D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	4
  9049 0000043C 01DA                    		add	dx, bx
  9050 0000043E 11C8                    		adc	ax, cx		; times	5
  9051 00000440 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9052                                  
  9053                                  ; now have ticks * 5 in	dx:ax
  9054                                  ; we now need to multiply by 65536 and divide by 59659 d.
  9055                                  
  9056 00000441 B90BE9                  		mov	cx, 59659	; get divisor
  9057 00000444 F7F1                    		div	cx		; dx now has remainder
  9058                                  					; ax has high word of final quotient
  9059 00000446 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; put high word	in safe	place
  9060 00000448 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; this is the multiply by 65536
  9061 0000044A F7F1                    		div	cx		; bx:ax	now has	time in	100th of seconds
  9062                                  
  9063                                  ; rounding based on the	remainder may be added here
  9064                                  ; the result in	bx:ax is time in 1/100 second.
  9065                                  
  9066 0000044C 89DA                    		mov	dx, bx		
  9067 0000044E B9C800                  		mov	cx, 200		;extract 1/100's
  9068                                  
  9069                                  ; division by 200 is necessary to ensure no overflow--max result
  9070                                  ; is number of seconds in a day/2 = 43200.
  9071                                  
  9072 00000451 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9073 00000453 80FA64                  		cmp	dl, 100		; remainder over 100?
  9074 00000456 7203                    		jb	short noadj
  9075 00000458 80EA64                  		sub	dl, 100		; keep 1/100's less than 100
  9076                                  noadj:					
  9077 0000045B F5                      		cmc			; if we	subtracted 100,	carry is now set
  9078 0000045C 88D3                    		mov	bl, dl		; save 1/100's
  9079                                  
  9080                                  ; to compensate	for dividing by	200 instead of 100, we now multiply
  9081                                  ; by two, shifting a one in if the remainder had exceeded 100.
  9082                                  
  9083 0000045E D1D0                    		rcl	ax, 1		
  9084 00000460 B200                    		mov	dl, 0
  9085 00000462 D1D2                    		rcl	dx, 1
  9086 00000464 B93C00                  		mov	cx, 60		; divide out seconds
  9087 00000467 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9088 00000469 88D7                    		mov	bh, dl		; save the seconds
  9089 0000046B F6F1                    		div	cl		; break	into hours and minutes
  9090 0000046D 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah
  9091                                  
  9092                                  ; time is now in ax:bx (hours, minutes, seconds, 1/100 sec)
  9093                                  
  9094 0000046F 50                      		push	ax
  9095 00000470 89F0                    		mov	ax, si		; daycnt
  9096 00000472 AB                      		stosw
  9097 00000473 58                      		pop	ax
  9098 00000474 AB                      		stosw
  9099 00000475 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  9100 00000477 AB                      		stosw
  9101 00000478 F8                      		clc
  9102 00000479 C3                      		retn
  9103                                  
  9104                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9105                                  
  9106                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9107                                  
  9108                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9109                                  ;
  9110                                  ; procedure : GetTickCnt
  9111                                  ;
  9112                                  ;		Returns the tick count in CX:DX. Takes care of DayCnt in case
  9113                                  ;		of rollover [except when power management driver is in use]. 
  9114                                  ;		Uses the following logic for updating Daycnt
  9115                                  ;
  9116                                  ;		if ( rollover ) {
  9117                                  ;			if ( t_switch )
  9118                                  ;				daycnt++ ;
  9119                                  ;			else
  9120                                  ;				daycnt += rollover ;
  9121                                  ;		}
  9122                                  ;
  9123                                  ; USES : AX
  9124                                  ;
  9125                                  ; RETURNS : CX:DX - tick count
  9126                                  ; MODIFIES : daycnt
  9127                                  ;
  9128                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9129                                  
  9130                                  		; 17/10/2022
  9131                                  GetTickCnt:	
  9132 0000047A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9133 0000047C CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  9134                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  9135                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  9136                                  					; midnight
  9137                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  9138 0000047E 803E[F204]00            		cmp	byte [t_switch], 0 ; use old method ? (>0 is yes)
  9139 00000483 7507                    		jnz	short inc_case	; old method assumes  that Int 1Ah returns rollover flag
  9140 00000485 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; new method assumes that Int 1Ah returns roll over count
  9141                                  					; and not flag
  9142 00000487 0106[F004]              		add	[daycnt], ax
  9143 0000048B C3                      		retn
  9144                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9145                                  
  9146                                  inc_case:				
  9147 0000048C 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9148 0000048E 7404                    		jz	short no_rollover
  9149 00000490 FF06[F004]              		inc	word [daycnt]
  9150                                  no_rollover:				
  9151 00000494 C3                      		retn
  9152

  9161                                  ; 23/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0

  9180                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9181                                  ;	disk interface routines
  9182                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9183                                  
  9184                                  ; device attribute bits:
  9185                                  ;	bit 6 - get/set map for logical drives and generic ioctl.
  9186                                  
  9187                                  ;MAXERR		equ	5
  9188                                  ;MAX_HD_FMT_ERR	equ	2
  9189                                  
  9190                                  ;LSTDRV	equ 504h
  9191                                  
  9192                                  ; some floppies do not have changeline. as a result, media-check would
  9193                                  ; normally return i-don't-know, the dos would continually reread the fat and
  9194                                  ; discard cached data. we optimize this by implementing a logical door-latch:
  9195                                  ; it is physically impossible to change a disk in under 2 seconds. we retain
  9196                                  ; the time of the last successful disk operation and compare it with the current
  9197                                  ; time during media-check. if < 2 seconds and at least 1 timer tick has passed,
  9198                                  ; the we say no change. if > 2 seconds then we say i-don't-know. finally, 
  9199                                  ; since we cannot trust the timer to be always available, we record the number 
  9200                                  ; of media checks that have occurred when no apparent time has elapsed. while
  9201                                  ; this number is < a given threshold, we say no change. when it exceeds that
  9202                                  ; threshold, we say i-don't-know and reset the counter to 0. when we store 
  9203                                  ; the time of last successful access, if we see that time has passed too,
  9204                                  ; we reset the counter.
  9205                                  
  9206                                  accessmax	equ	5
  9207                                  
  9208                                  ; due to various bogosities, we need to continually adjust what the head
  9209                                  ; settle time is.  the following algorithm is used:
  9210                                  ;
  9211                                  ;   get the current head settle value.
  9212                                  ;   if it is 0, then
  9213                                  ;	set slow = 15
  9214                                  ;   else
  9215                                  ;	set slow = value
  9216                                  ;   ...
  9217                                  ;*********************************************
  9218                                  ;************ old algorithm ******************
  9219                                  ;*   if we are seeking and writing then
  9220                                  ;*	 use slow
  9221                                  ;*   else
  9222                                  ;*	 use fast
  9223                                  ;*********************************************
  9224                                  ;*********** ibm's requested logic ***********
  9225                                  ;   if we are seeking and writing and not on an at then
  9226                                  ;	use slow
  9227                                  ;   else
  9228                                  ;	use fast
  9229                                  ;   ...
  9230                                  ;   restore current head settle value
  9231                                  ;
  9232                                  ;
  9233                                  ;---------------------------------------
  9234                                  multrk_on	equ	10000000b	;user spcified mutitrack=on, or system turns
  9235                                  					; it on after handling config.sys file as a
  9236                                  					; default value, if multrk_flag = multrk_off1.
  9237                                  multrk_off1	equ	00000000b	;initial value. no "multitrack=" command entered.
  9238                                  multrk_off2	equ	00000001b	;user specified multitrack=off.
  9239                                  
  9240                                  ; close data segment, open Bios_Code segment
  9241                                  
  9242                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9243                                  
  9244                                  ; BIOSCODE:04A2h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  9245

  9247                                  ;	command jump table
  9248                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9249                                  
  9250 00000495 00                      		db 0
  9251

  9253                                  %if 0
  9254                                  
  9255                                  dsktbl:		db 26			; 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  9256                                  					; ((dtbl_siz-1)/2) ; this is the size of the table ; 26
  9257                                  		dw 1742h		; dsk_init

  9259                                  		dw 592h			; get_bpb
  9260                                  		dw 0D5h			; bc_cmderr

  9262                                  		dw 83Dh			; x_bus_exit
  9263                                  		dw 558h			; ret_carry_clear
  9264                                  		dw 558h			; ret_carry_clear

  9268                                  		dw 558h			; ret_carry_clear

  9270                                  		dw 80Ah			; dsk_open
  9271                                  		dw 81Ah			; dsk_close

  9274                                  		dw 558h			; ret_carry_clear

  9277                                  		dw 558h			; ret_carry_clear

  9289 00000497 [E916]                  		dw dsk_init

  9320                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9321                                  ; setdrive scans through the data structure of bdss, and returns a pointer to
  9322                                  ; the one that belongs to the drive specified. carry is set if none exists
  9323                                  ; for the drive. Pointer is returned in es:[di]
  9324                                  ;
  9325                                  ;  AL contains the logical drive number.
  9326                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9327                                  
  9328                                  SetDrive:	
  9329                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds ; Point es:di to first bds	
  9330 000004CB C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; 19/10/2022
  9331                                  X_Scan_Loop:				
  9332 000004CF 26384505                		cmp	[es:di+5], al	
  9333 000004D3 7409                    		jz	short X_SetDrv
  9334 000004D5 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link] ; Go	to next	bds
  9335 000004D8 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
  9336 000004DB 75F2                    		jnz	short X_Scan_Loop
  9337 000004DD F9                      		stc
  9338                                  X_SetDrv:				
  9339 000004DE C3                      		retn
  9340

  9343                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9344                                  
  9345                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
  9346                                  ; if id is f9, have a 96tpi disk else
  9347                                  ; if bit 2 is 0 then media is not removable and could not have changed
  9348                                  ;  otherwise if within 2 secs of last disk operation media could not
  9349                                  ;    have changed, otherwise dont know if media has changed
  9350                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
  9351                                  
  9352                                  media_chk:				; 2C7h:4EBh = 70h:2A5Bh
  9353 000004DF E8E9FF                  		call	SetDrive
  9354 000004E2 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1
  9355 000004E5 26F6452401              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
  9356                                  					; fchanged_by_format
  9357 000004EA 7416                    		jz	short WeAreNotFakingIt
  9358                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9359 000004EC 26806524FE              		and	byte [es:di+24h], 0FEh ; ~fchanged_by_format
  9360                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FEFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
  9361                                  					; ~fchanged_by_format ;	reset flag
  9362 000004F1 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh ; -1
  9363                                  					; Ensure that we ask the rom if media has changed
  9364 000004F6 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
  9365                                  					; fnon_removable
  9366 000004FB 740C                    		jz	short wehaveafloppy
  9367 000004FD BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; Indicate media changed
  9368 00000500 EB2C                    		jmp	short Media_Done ; Media_Done
  9369                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

  9371                                  WeAreNotFakingIt:

  9377                                  
  9378                                  		; If we have a floppy with changeline support, we ask the ROM

  9380                                  		; 2 second check for these drives.

  9429                                  
  9430                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9431                                  
  9432                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9433                                  ; perform a check on the time passed since the last access for this physical
  9434                                  ; drive.
  9435                                  ; we are accessing the same drive. if the time of last successful access was
  9436                                  ; less than 2 seconds ago, then we may presume that the disk was not changed.
  9437                                  ; returns in si:
  9438                                  ;	0 - if time of last access was >= 2 seconds
  9439                                  ;	1 - if time was < 2 seconds (i.e no media change assumed)
  9440                                  ; registers affected ax,cx,dx, flags.
  9441                                  ;
  9442                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds->Bios_Data
  9443                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9444                                  
  9445                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9446                                  Check_Time_Of_Access:
  9447 00000553 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; presume no change.
  9448 00000556 E821FF                  		call	GetTickCnt	; cx:dx	is the elapsed time
  9449 00000559 268B4547                		mov	ax, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
  9450                                  					; get stored time
  9451 0000055D 29C2                    		sub	dx, ax
  9452 0000055F 268B4549                		mov	ax, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
  9453 00000563 19C1                    		sbb	cx, ax
  9454 00000565 751A                    		jnz	short timecheck_unk ; cx<>0 => >1 hour
  9455 00000567 09D2                    		or	dx, dx		; time must pass
  9456 00000569 7511                    		jnz	short timepassed ; yes, examine max value
  9457 0000056B FE06[1D01]              		inc	byte [accesscount]
  9458 0000056F 803E[1D01]05            		cmp	byte [accesscount], 5 
  9459                                  					; if count is less than threshold, ok
  9460 00000574 720C                    		jb	short timecheck_ret
  9461 00000576 FE0E[1D01]              		dec	byte [accesscount] ; don't let the count wrap
  9462 0000057A EB05                    		jmp	short timecheck_unk ; "i don't know" if media changed
  9463                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9464                                  
  9465                                  timepassed:				
  9466 0000057C 83FA24                  		cmp	dx, 36		; 18*2 ; 18.2 tics per second.
  9467                                  					; min elapsed time? (2 seconds)
  9468 0000057F 7601                    		jbe	short timecheck_ret ; yes, presume no change
  9469                                  
  9470                                  		; everything indicates that we do not know what has happened.
  9471                                  timecheck_unk:				
  9472 00000581 4E                      		dec	si		; presume i don't know
  9473                                  timecheck_ret:				
  9474 00000582 C3                      		retn
  9475                                  
  9476                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9477                                  ; 15/10/2022

  9595                                  			; Microsoft/IBM code has a bug here because the BDS's

  9597                                  			; (to their default text) according to 'BDS.fatsiz' flags

  9636                                  
  9637                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9638                                  ;	getbp - return bpb from the drive specified by the bds.
  9639                                  ;	    if the return_fake_bpb flag is set, then it does nothing.
  9640                                  ;	    note that we never come here for fixed disks.
  9641                                  ;	    for all other cases,
  9642                                  ;	      - it reads boot sector to pull out the bpb
  9643                                  ;	      - if no valid bpb is found, it then reads the fat sector,
  9644                                  ;		to get the fat id byte to build the bpb from there.
  9645                                  ;
  9646                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds.
  9647                                  ;
  9648                                  ;   outputs:	fills in bpb in current bds if valid bpb or fat id on disk.
  9649                                  ;		carry set, and al=7 if invalid disk.
  9650                                  ;		carry set and error code in al if other error.
  9651                                  ;		if failed to recognize the boot record, then will set the
  9652                                  ;		set_id_flag to 0.
  9653                                  ;		this routine will only work for a floppy diskette.
  9654                                  ;		     for a fixed disk, it will just return.
  9655                                  ;
  9656                                  ;	****** Note: getbp is a clone of getbp which uses the newer
  9657                                  ;	  segment definitions. It should be migrated towards.
  9658                                  ;	   now es:di has the bds, ds: has Bios_Data
  9659                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9660                                  
  9661                                  GetBp:		; if returning fake bpb then return bpb as is.
  9662                                  		;test	byte [es:di+BDS.flags], return_fake_bpb|fnon_removable		
  9663 000005F8 26F6452305              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 5

  9674                                  		; we assume that the 2.x and greater dos disks all
  9675                                  		; have a valid boot sector.

  9755 0000066E 26887D0C                		mov	[es:di+0Ch], bh	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]

  9757 00000676 26886510                		mov	[es:di+10h], ah	; [es:di+BDS.media]
  9758 0000067A 26884511                		mov	[es:di+11h], al	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
  9759 0000067E 26885D13                		mov	[es:di+13h], bl	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
  9760 00000682 26885515                		mov	[es:di+15h], dl	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
  9761                                  
  9762                                  		; the BDS_BPB.BPB_HIDDENSECTORS+2 field and the
  9763                                  		; BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS field need to be set
  9764                                  		; to 0 since this code is for floppies
  9765                                  
  9766                                  		; 18/12/2022
  9767                                  		;mov	word [es:di+19h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
  9768                                  		;mov	word [es:di+17h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs]
  9769                                  		;mov	word [es:di+1Dh], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
  9770                                  		; 18/12/2022
  9771 00000686 29C9                    		sub	cx, cx
  9772 00000688 26894D19                		mov	[es:di+19h], cx ; 0 ; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
  9773 0000068C 26894D17                		mov	[es:di+17h], cx ; 0 ; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs]
  9774 00000690 26894D1D                		mov	[es:di+1Dh], cx ; 0 ; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
  9775                                  getret:					
  9776 00000694 5B                      		pop	bx
  9777 00000695 5A                      		pop	dx
  9778 00000696 59                      		pop	cx
  9779                                  getret_exit:				
  9780 00000697 C3                      		retn
  9781                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9782                                  
  9783                                  getbp_err_ret:	; before doing anything else, set set_id_flag	to 0.			
  9784                                  		;mov	ds:set_id_flag,	0

  9790
