 11720 00000EF0 07                      		pop	es
 11721                                  
 11722                                  		; Fall into TrackIo
 11723                                  
 11724                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11725                                  
 11726                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11727                                  
 11728                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11729                                  ;
 11730                                  ; TrackIo:
 11731                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 11732                                  ;
 11733                                  ;   input:
 11734                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 11735                                  ;		  3 = write
 11736                                  ;		  4 = verify
 11737                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 11738                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 11739                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 11740                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 11741                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 11742                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 11743                                  ;
 11744                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11745                                  
 11746                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11747                                  		
 11748                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11749                                  TrackIo:	
 11750                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 11751 00000EF1 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 11752 00000EF5 E844F9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 11753 00000EF8 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11754                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 11755 00000EFD 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 11756 00000EFF 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 11757 00000F00 51                      		push	cx
 11758 00000F01 E896FA                  		call	iosetup
 11759 00000F04 59                      		pop	cx
 11760 00000F05 58                      		pop	ax
 11761                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 11762 00000F06 BE[3B05]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 11763 00000F09 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11764 00000F0B D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11765 00000F0D 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11766                                  
 11767                                  		; WE WANT:
 11768                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 11769                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 11770                                  		
 11771 00000F0F BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 11772                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11773 00000F12 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 11774                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11775                                  					; good_tracklayout
 11776 00000F17 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 11777                                  		
 11778 00000F19 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 11779                                  ionextsector:				
 11780 00000F1B 51                      		push	cx
 11781 00000F1C 52                      		push	dx
 11782 00000F1D 46                      		inc	si
 11783 00000F1E 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 11784                                  					; the track table
 11785 00000F1F AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 11786 00000F20 A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 11787                                  
 11788                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 11789                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 11790                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 11791                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 11792                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 11793                                  		
 11794                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11795 00000F23 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 11796                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11797                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 11798 00000F28 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 11799                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11800 00000F2A F606[2F05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 11801                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 11802                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 11803 00000F2F 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 11804 00000F31 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 11805 00000F35 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 11806 00000F37 E81DFB                  		call	Disk
 11807 00000F3A 5A                      		pop	dx
 11808 00000F3B 59                      		pop	cx
 11809 00000F3C F8                      		clc
 11810 00000F3D C3                      		retn
 11811                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11812                                  
 11813                                  IoRemovable:				
 11814 00000F3E AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 11815                                  					; table	and save it
 11816 00000F3F 50                      		push	ax
 11817 00000F40 56                      		push	si
 11818 00000F41 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 11819 00000F42 50                      		push	ax
 11820 00000F43 8A26[2C01]              		mov	ah, [eot]	; Preserve whatever might be in	ah
 11821                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data
 11822 00000F47 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 11823 00000F4B 884403                  		mov	[si+3],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_SECTOR_SIZ]
 11824 00000F4E 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 11825 00000F51 58                      		pop	ax
 11826 00000F52 1F                      		pop	ds
 11827 00000F53 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 11828 00000F55 A3[2201]                		mov	[seccnt], ax
 11829 00000F58 E8FCFA                  		call	Disk
 11830 00000F5B 5E                      		pop	si		; Advance buffer pointer by adding
 11831                                  					; sector size
 11832 00000F5C 58                      		pop	ax
 11833 00000F5D E81D00                  		call	SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize
 11834 00000F60 01C3                    		add	bx, ax
 11835 00000F62 5A                      		pop	dx
 11836 00000F63 59                      		pop	cx
 11837 00000F64 E2B5                    		loop	ionextsector
 11838 00000F66 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11839                                  		;jz	short NoNeedDone
 11840                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11841 00000F6B 7404                    		je	short NoNeedDone2
 11842 00000F6D E872FA                  		call	done		; set time of last access, and reset
 11843                                  					; entries in Dpt.
 11844                                  NoNeedDone:				
 11845 00000F70 F8                      		clc
 11846                                  NoNeedDone2:
 11847 00000F71 C3                      		retn
 11848                                  
 11849                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11850                                  
 11851                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11852                                  ;
 11853                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 11854                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 11855                                  ; are permissible.
 11856                                  ;
 11857                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 11858                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 11859                                  ; All other registers preserved
 11860                                  ;
 11861                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11862                                  
 11863                                  SectSizeToSectIndex:	
 11864 00000F72 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024)
 11865                                  					; examine upper	byte only
 11866 00000F75 7703                    		ja	short OneK
 11867 00000F77 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; value	in AH is the index!
 11868 00000F79 C3                      		retn
 11869                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11870                                  
 11871                                  OneK:					
 11872 00000F7A B003                    		mov	al, 3
 11873 00000F7C C3                      		retn
 11874                                  
 11875                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11876                                  
 11877                                  
 11878                                  SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize:
 11879 00000F7D 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
 11880 00000F7F B88000                  		mov	ax, 128
 11881 00000F82 D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl
 11882 00000F84 C3                      		retn
 11883                                  
 11884                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11885                                  
 11886                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11887                                  
 11888                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11889                                  ;
 11890                                  ; SetDASD
 11891                                  ;
 11892                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 11893                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 11894                                  ;
 11895                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds
 11896                                  ;
 11897                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11898                                  
 11899                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11900                                  SetDasd:	
 11901 00000F85 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;
 11902                                  					; See if we've previously set dasd type
 11903 00000F8A 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 11904                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11905 00000F8C 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h
 11906                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11907                                  					; set_dasd_true
 11908 00000F91 744A                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 11909                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11910 00000F93 268065237F              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 7Fh
 11911                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FF7Fh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11912                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 11913                                  DoSetDasd:				
 11914 00000F98 C606[3906]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; Reset it
 11915 00000F9D C606[3B01]50            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 50h ; Format gap for 48tpi disks
 11916 00000FA2 B004                    		mov	al, 4
 11917 00000FA4 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11918                                  					; DEV_3INCH720KB
 11919 00000FA9 741A                    		jz	short DoSet
 11920 00000FAB 26807D2201              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11921                                  					; DEV_5INCH96TPI
 11922 00000FB0 7404                    		jz	short GotBig
 11923 00000FB2 B001                    		mov	al, 1
 11924 00000FB4 EB0F                    		jmp	short DoSet
 11925                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11926                                  
 11927                                  GotBig:					
 11928 00000FB6 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; 160/320k in a	1.2 meg	drive
 11929 00000FB8 803E[3706]00            		cmp	byte [mediatype], 0
 11930 00000FBD 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 11931                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive
 11932                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11933                                  		;inc	al  ; al = 3
 11934                                  		; 18/12/2022
 11935 00000FBF 40                      		inc	ax  ; al = 3
 11936 00000FC0 C606[3B01]54            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 54h
 11937                                  DoSet:					
 11938 00000FC5 1E                      		push	ds
 11939 00000FC6 56                      		push	si
 11940 00000FC7 8E1E[1A00]              		mov	ds, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vectors
 11941                                  
 11942 00000FCB C5367800                		lds	si, [DSKADR]
 11943                                  		;lds	si, [78h]	; [DSKADR]  (Int 1Eh)
 11944                                  		;;lds	si, ds:78h		
 11945                                  
 11946 00000FCF C644090F                		mov	byte [si+9], 0Fh ;
 11947                                  					; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11948 00000FD3 5E                      		pop	si
 11949 00000FD4 1F                      		pop	ds
 11950 00000FD5 B417                    		mov	ah, 17h
 11951 00000FD7 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 11952 00000FDB CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 11953                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 11954                                  DasdHasBeenSet:				
 11955 00000FDD 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 11956 00000FE1 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah
 11957 00000FE5 C3                      		retn
 11958                                  
 11959                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11960                                  
 11961                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11962                                  
 11963                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11964                                  ;
 11965                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 11966                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 11967                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 11968                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 11969                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 11970                                  ;
 11971                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 11972                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 11973                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 11974                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 11975                                  ;
 11976                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 11977                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 11978                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 11979                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 11980                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 11981                                  ;
 11982                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11983                                  
 11984                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11985                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 11986 00000FE6 51                      		push	cx
 11987 00000FE7 52                      		push	dx
 11988                                  
 11989                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 11990                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 11991                                  
 11992 00000FE8 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 11993 00000FED 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 11994 00000FEF 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 11995 00000FF1 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11996 00000FF6 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 11997 00000FF8 EB7F                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 11998                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11999                                  
 12000                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 12001 00000FFA 06                      		push	es
 12002 00000FFB 56                      		push	si
 12003 00000FFC 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 12004 00001000 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12005                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12006                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12007 00001005 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12008 00001009 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12009                                  
 12010                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 12011                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 12012                                  
 12013 0000100D 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12014 00001012 5E                      		pop	si
 12015 00001013 07                      		pop	es
 12016                                  
 12017                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:				
 12018 00001014 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12019 00001018 49                      		dec	cx
 12020 00001019 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12021 0000101C D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12022 0000101E D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12023 00001020 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 12024 00001022 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12025 00001026 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12026 0000102A 06                      		push	es
 12027 0000102B 1E                      		push	ds
 12028 0000102C 56                      		push	si
 12029 0000102D 57                      		push	di
 12030 0000102E B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12031 00001030 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12032                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12033 00001032 7233                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12034 00001034 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12035 00001039 7425                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 12036 0000103B 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 12037 0000103C 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12038 00001040 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12039                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 12040                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 12041 00001045 8936[3A06]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 12042 00001049 8C06[3C06]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 12043 0000104D 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12044                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 12045 00001051 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 12046                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 12047 00001056 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 12048 0000105B C606[3806]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12049                                  skip_disk_base_setting:			
 12050 00001060 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code
 12051                                  		;mov	ds:had_format_error, al	; Reset	the flag
 12052 00001062 A2[3906]                		mov	[had_format_error], al
 12053 00001065 EB0E                    		jmp	short PopStatRet
 12054                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12055                                  
 12056                                  FormaStatErr:
 12057                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12058 00001067 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 12059                                  				
 12060 00001069 80FC0C                  		cmp	ah, 0Ch		; DSK_ILLEGAL_COMBINATION
 12061                                  					; Illegal combination =	0Ch
 12062 0000106C 7406                    		jz	short FormatStatIllegalComb
 12063 0000106E 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR
 12064 00001071 7402                    		jz	short FormatStatTimeOut
 12065                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12066                                  		;dec	al
 12067                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12068 00001073 48                      		dec	ax
 12069                                  		; al = 2
 12070                                  		;mov	al, 1		; Function not supported.
 12071                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 12072                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12073                                  
 12074                                  FormatStatIllegalComb:
 12075                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12076                                  		;dec	al	; 3 -> 2 or 2 -> 1
 12077                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12078 00001074 48                      		dec	ax
 12079                                  		; al = 2				
 12080                                  		;mov	al, 2		; Function supported, but
 12081                                  					; Illegal sect/trk,trk combination.
 12082                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12083                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 12084                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12085                                  
 12086                                  FormatStatTimeOut:			
 12087                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12088                                  		; al = 3
 12089                                  		;mov	al, 3		; Function supported, but
 12090                                  					; Media	not present.
 12091                                  PopStatRet:				
 12092 00001075 5F                      		pop	di
 12093 00001076 5E                      		pop	si
 12094 00001077 1F                      		pop	ds
 12095 00001078 07                      		pop	es
 12096                                  SetMediaRet:				
 12097 00001079 5A                      		pop	dx
 12098 0000107A 59                      		pop	cx
 12099 0000107B C3                      		retn

 12101                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12102                                  
 12103                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12104                                  
 12105                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12106                                  ;
 12107                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12108                                  ;
 12109                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12110                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12111                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12112                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12113                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12114                                  ;
 12115                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12116                                  
 12117                                  ResetDisk:	
 12118 0000107C 50                      		push	ax
 12119 0000107D 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12120                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 12121 00001082 7505                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 12122                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12123 00001084 C606[3906]01            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12124                                  ResetDisk_cont:				
 12125 00001089 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12126 0000108B CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12127                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12128 0000108D C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12129                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12130 00001092 58                      		pop	ax
 12131 00001093 C3                      		retn
 12132                                  
 12133                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12134                                  
 12135                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12136                                  
 12137                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12138                                  ;
 12139                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12140                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12141                                  ;
 12142                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12143                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12144                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12145                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12146                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12147                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12148                                  ;
 12149                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12150                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12151                                  ;
 12152                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12153                                  
 12154                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12155                                  ToRom:	
 12156 00001094 53                      		push	bx
 12157 00001095 56                      		push	si
 12158                                  
 12159                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 12160                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12161                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 12162                                  
 12163 00001096 F606[3806]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12164 0000109B 7536                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 12165 0000109D 50                      		push	ax
 12166 0000109E 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12167 0000109F 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12168                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?
 12169 000010A4 9C                      		pushf			; (Save	the cmp	result)
 12170 000010A5 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12171                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; Get pointer to disk base table
 12172 000010A9 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12173                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 12174                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	 Save pointer to table
 12175 000010AE 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12176 000010B2 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12177                                  		
 12178 000010B6 A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 12179 000010B9 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12180 000010BD A0[3B01]                		mov	al, [gap_patch]
 12181 000010C0 26884407                		mov	[es:si+7], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_FORMT_GAP]
 12182                                  					; Important for	format
 12183 000010C4 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12184                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 12185                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 12186 000010C9 9D                      		popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 12187 000010CA 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 12188 000010CC 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 12189                                  MotorStrtOK:				
 12190 000010D1 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12191 000010D2 58                      		pop	ax
 12192                                  GotValidDpt:				
 12193 000010D3 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number
 12194 000010D7 88D5                    		mov	ch, dl		; Set low 8 bits in ch
 12195 000010D9 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number
 12196 000010DD 8A36[3801]              		mov	dh, [hdnum]	; Set head number
 12197 000010E1 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12198 000010E2 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 12199 000010E6 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 12200 000010E8 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12201 000010E9 5E                      		pop	si
 12202 000010EA 5B                      		pop	bx
 12203 000010EB C3                      		retn

 12207                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12208                                  
 12209                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12210                                  
 12211                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12212                                  ;
 12213                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12214                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12215                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12216                                  ;
 12217                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12218                                  
 12219                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12220                                  ioctl_getown:
 12221 000010EC E8DCF3                  		call	SetDrive
 12222 000010EF 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12223                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12224 000010F3 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12225                                  ownloop:				
 12226 000010F7 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12227 000010FB 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12228                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12229 000010FD 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12230                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12231                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12232 00001102 7515                    		jnz	short exitown
 12233                                  getnextBDS:				
 12234 00001104 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12235 00001107 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12236                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12237                                  
 12238                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12239                                  ;
 12240                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12241                                  ; in al to al.
 12242                                  ;
 12243                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12244                                  
 12245                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12246                                  ioctl_setown:
 12247 00001109 E8BFF3                  		call	SetDrive
 12248 0000110C C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 12249                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 12250 00001111 E828F7                  		call	checksingle
 12251 00001114 C606[7A00]00            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12252                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12253                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12254                                  
 12255                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12256                                  ;
 12257                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 12258                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12259                                  ;
 12260                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12261                                  
 12262                                  exitown:				
 12263 00001119 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 12264                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12265 0000111B 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 12266                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12267                                  					; fi_am_mult
 12268 00001120 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 12269 00001122 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12270                                  					; Get logical drive number
 12271                                  					; Get it 1-based
 12272 00001126 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 12273                                  exitnomult:				
 12274 00001128 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12275 0000112C 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 12276                                  					; Exit normal termination
 12277                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12278                                  		; cf=0
 12279                                  		;clc
 12280 0000112F C3                      		retn
 12281                                  
 12282                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12283                                  
 12284                                  ; 16/10/2022

 12286                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12287                                  ;
 12288                                  ; moves the old Dpt that had been saved in TempDpt back to Dpt. this is done
 12289                                  ; only if the first byte of TempDpt is not -1.
 12290                                  ; all registers (including flags) are preserved.
 12291                                  ;
 12292                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12293                                  
 12294                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12295                                  RestoreOldDpt:
 12296                                  		; if we have already restored the disk base table earlier,
 12297                                  		; do not do it again.
 12298                                  	
 12299 00001130 50                      		push	ax
 12300 00001131 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 12301 00001133 A2[3906]                		mov	[had_format_error], al	; Reset flag and 
 12302 00001136 8606[3806]              		xchg	al, [media_set_for_format] ; get current flag setting
 12303 0000113A 08C0                    		or	al, al
 12304 0000113C 741E                    		jz	short DontRestore
 12305 0000113E 56                      		push	si
 12306 0000113F 1E                      		push	ds
 12307 00001140 06                      		push	es
 12308 00001141 C536[3A06]              		lds	si, [tempdpt]
 12309                                  
 12310                                  		; 17/10/2022
 12311 00001145 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12312                                  		;mov	es, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12313 0000114A 268E06[1A00]            		mov	es, [es:zeroseg]
 12314                                  		;mov	es, es:zeroseg	; CAS -- bleeeech!
 12315                                  
 12316                                  		;mov	es:78h,	si	; [es:DSKADR]
 12317 0000114F 2689367800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], si
 12318                                  		;mov	word ptr es:7Ah, ds ; [es:DSKADR+2]
 12319 00001154 268C1E7A00              		mov	[es:DSKADR+2], ds
 12320 00001159 07                      		pop	es
 12321 0000115A 1F                      		pop	ds
 12322 0000115B 5E                      		pop	si
 12323                                  DontRestore:				
 12324 0000115C 58                      		pop	ax
 12325                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12326                                  		; cf=0
 12327                                  		;clc			;  Clear carry
 12328 0000115D C3                      		retn

 12334                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12335                                  ;	get media id
 12336                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12337                                  ;
 12338                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 12339                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12340                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 12341                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 12342                                  ;
 12343                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12344                                  ;
 12345                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 12346                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12347                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12348                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 12349                                  ;
 12350                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12351                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12352                                  ;
 12353                                  ; LOGIC:
 12354                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 12355                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 12356                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 12357                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 12358                                  ;
 12359                                  ; {
 12360                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 12361                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 12362                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 12363                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12364                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12365                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12366                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 12367                                  ;		};
 12368                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12369                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12370                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12371                                  ;		};
 12372                                  ;	else
 12373                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 12374                                  ;
 12375                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12376                                  
 12377                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 12378                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 12379                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 12380                                  
 12381                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12382                                  GetMediaId:
 12383 0000115E E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12384 00001161 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 12385 00001165 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 12386 0000116A E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 12387 0000116D 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 12388                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12389 0000116F 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12390                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12391 00001174 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 12392                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12393 00001176 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 12394 00001179 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 12395                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12396                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12397 0000117C 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 12398 0000117E C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 12399 00001182 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12400                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12401 00001186 46                      		inc	si
 12402                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 12403                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12404 00001187 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12405 0000118A B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12406                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12407                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12408 0000118D F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 12409                                  	
 12410                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12411                                  		; cf = 0
 12412                                  		;clc
 12413                                  
 12414 0000118F C3                      		retn
 12415                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12416                                  
 12417                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 12418 00001190 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12419 00001192 F9                      		stc
 12420                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 12421 00001193 C3                      		retn
 12422                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12423                                  
 12424                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12425                                  
 12426                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12427                                  ;  set media id
 12428                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12429                                  
 12430                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 12431                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12432                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 12433                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 12434                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 12435                                  ;	    the bds table.
 12436                                  ;
 12437                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12438                                  ;
 12439                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 12440                                  ;	    the request packet.
 12441                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 12442                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12443                                  ;
 12444                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12445                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12446                                  ;
 12447                                  ; logic:
 12448                                  ;
 12449                                  ; {
 12450                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 12451                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 12452                                  ;	BootIo;
 12453                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12454                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12455                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12456                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 12457                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 12458                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 12459                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 12460                                  ;		};
 12461                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12462                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12463                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12464                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 12465                                  ;		};
 12466                                  ;	else
 12467                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 12468                                  ;
 12469                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12470                                  
 12471                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12472                                  SetMediaId:
 12473 00001194 E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12474 00001197 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12475                                  					; Logical drive	number
 12476 0000119B 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 12477 0000119D C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 12478 000011A2 52                      		push	dx
 12479 000011A3 E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12480 000011A6 5A                      		pop	dx
 12481 000011A7 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 12482                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12483 000011A9 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12484                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12485 000011AE 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 12486 000011B0 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12487                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12488 000011B5 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 12489 000011B7 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 12490 000011B8 57                      		push	di
 12491 000011B9 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 12492 000011BA 07                      		pop	es
 12493 000011BB BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12494 000011BE C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 12495 000011C2 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12496 000011C5 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12497 000011C8 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12498                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12499                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12500 000011CB F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12501 000011CD 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 12502 000011CE 1F                      		pop	ds
 12503 000011CF 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 12504 000011D0 07                      		pop	es
 12505 000011D1 E864F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 12506 000011D4 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12507 000011D6 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 12508 000011DB E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 12509 000011DE C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12510                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 12511                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 12512 000011E3 C3                      		retn
 12513                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12514                                  
 12515                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 12516 000011E4 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12517 000011E6 F9                      		stc
 12518                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 12519 000011E7 C3                      		retn
 12520                                  
 12521                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12522                                  
 12523                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12524                                  
 12525                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12526                                  ;	BootIo
 12527                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12528                                  ;
 12529                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 12530                                  ;
 12531                                  ; input :
 12532                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 12533                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 12534                                  ;
 12535                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 12536                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 12537                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 12538                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 12539                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12540                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12541                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 12542                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 12543                                  ;
 12544                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12545                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 12546                                  ;
 12547                                  ; logic:
 12548                                  ;
 12549                                  ; {
 12550                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 12551                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 12552                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 12553                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 12554                                  ; }
 12555                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12556                                  
 12557                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12558                                  BootIo:	
 12559 000011E8 06                      		push	es
 12560 000011E9 57                      		push	di
 12561 000011EA 53                      		push	bx
 12562 000011EB 1E                      		push	ds
 12563 000011EC 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 12564                                  
 12565                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 12566                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 12567                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12568                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 12569                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 12570                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 12571                                  
 12572 000011ED BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 12573 000011F0 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 12574 000011F2 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 12575 000011F6 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 12576 000011F9 E8CEF6                  		call	diskio
 12577 000011FC 5B                      		pop	bx
 12578 000011FD 5F                      		pop	di
 12579 000011FE 07                      		pop	es
 12580 000011FF C3                      		retn
 12581                                  
 12582                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12583                                  
 12584                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12585                                  
 12586                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12587                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 12588                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12589                                  ;
 12590                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 12591                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 12592                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 12593                                  ; history in the flags.
 12594                                  ;
 12595                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 12596                                  ;
 12597                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 12598                                  ;
 12599                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 12600                                  ;
 12601                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12602                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 12603                                  ;
 12604                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12605                                  
 12606                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 12607 00001200 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12608 00001204 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 12609 00001206 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 12610                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12611 00001208 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 12612                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12613                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 12614 0000120D 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12615 0000120F 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 12616 00001214 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12617 00001216 E8F806                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 12618 00001219 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 12619                                  
 12620                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 12621                                  
 12622 0000121B B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 12623 0000121D CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 12624                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 12625                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 12626 0000121F 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12627 00001221 53                      		push	bx
 12628 00001222 BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 12629                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 12630                                  					; physical drive
 12631 00001225 E8C206                  		call	set_changed_dl
 12632 00001228 5B                      		pop	bx
 12633                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 12634 00001229 C3                      		retn
 12635                                  
 12636                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12637                                  
 12638                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12639                                  
 12640                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12641                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 12642                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12643                                  ;
 12644                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12645                                  ;
 12646                                  ; INPUT :
 12647                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12648                                  ;
 12649                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 12650                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 12651                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12652                                  
 12653                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12654                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 12655 0000122A C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 12656 0000122E C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12657                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 12658                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12659 00001231 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 12660                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12661 00001233 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12662                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12663                                  					; unformatted_media
 12664 00001238 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 12665 0000123A FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 12666                                  
 12667                                  GafDone:				
 12668 0000123C 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12669 0000123F C3                      		retn
 12670                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12671                                  
 12672                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12673                                  
 12674                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12675                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 12676                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12677                                  ;
 12678                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12679                                  ;
 12680                                  ; input :
 12681                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12682                                  ;
 12683                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 12684                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12685                                  
 12686                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12687                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 12688 00001240 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 12689 00001244 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12690                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12691 00001247 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 12692                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12693                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 12694 0000124C 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12695 00001250 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 12696                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12697 00001252 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12698                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12699                                  					; unformatted_media
 12700                                  saf_Done:				
 12701 00001257 C3                      		retn
 12702                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12703                                  
 12704                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12705                                  
 12706                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12707                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 12708                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12709                                  ;
 12710                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 12711                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 12712                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 12713                                  ;
 12714                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12715                                  
 12716                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12717                                  ioctl_support_query:
 12718 00001258 06                      		push	es
 12719 00001259 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 12720 0000125D 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12721                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 12722 00001261 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 12723                                  					; See if major code is 8
 12724 00001263 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 12725 00001265 0E                      		push	cs
 12726 00001266 07                      		pop	es
 12727 00001267 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 12728                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12729 0000126A BF[3B0C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 12730                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 12731                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 12732 0000126D 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 12733 0000126F F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 12734 00001271 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 12735 00001273 B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 12736                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12737                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 12738                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 12739                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 12740                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 12741                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12742                                  ioctlsupexit:				
 12743 00001276 07                      		pop	es
 12744                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12745                                  		; cf = 0
 12746                                  		;clc
 12747 00001277 C3                      		retn
 12748                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12749                                  nosupport:				
 12750 00001278 07                      		pop	es
 12751 00001279 E959EE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 12752                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12753                                  
 12754                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12755                                  
 12756                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12757                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 12758                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12759                                  ;
 12760                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 12761                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 12762                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 12763                                  ;	    drive)
 12764                                  ;
 12765                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 12766                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 12767                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 12768                                  ;
 12769                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 12770                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 12771                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 12772                                  ;
 12773                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 12774                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 12775                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 12776                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 12777                                  ;
 12778                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 12779                                  ;
 12780                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 12781                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 12782                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 12783                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 12784                                  ; 
 12785                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12786                                  
 12787                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12788                                  SenseMediaType:				
 12789 0000127C C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 12790 00001280 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12791                                  		; 10/10/2022
 12792                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 12793 00001283 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 12794 00001285 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 12795                                  		;
 12796 00001287 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12797                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 12798                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12799                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 12800 0000128B B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 12801                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 12802 0000128D CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 12803 0000128F 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 12804 00001291 FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 12805                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 12806 00001293 FEC8                    		dec	al
 12807 00001295 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 12808 00001297 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 12809 00001299 0404                    		add	al, 4
 12810 0000129B 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 12811 0000129D 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 12812 0000129F 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 12813 000012A1 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 12814                                  GotMediaType:				
 12815 000012A3 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 12816                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12817                                  		; cf = 0
 12818                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 12819 000012A6 C3                      		retn
 12820                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12821                                  
 12822                                  MediaSenseEr:

 12824 000012AA 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error

 12826 000012AE 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
