 14000                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14001                                  dsk_init:				; 2C7h:1742h = 70h:3CB2h
 14002 000016E9 8A26[7500]              		mov	ah, [drvmax]
 14003 000016ED BF[8706]                		mov	di, dskdrvs
 14004 000016F0 1E                      		push	ds		; pass result in es:di
 14005 000016F1 07                      		pop	es
 14006 000016F2 E9C3EE                  		jmp	SetPtrSav
 14007                                  
 14008                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14009                                  
 14010                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14011                                  ; install_bds installs a bds at location es:di into the current linked list of
 14012                                  ; bds maintained by this device driver. it places the bds at the end of the
 14013                                  ; list. Trashes (at least) ax, bx, di, si
 14014                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14015                                  
 14016                                  install_bds:		
 14017 000016F5 1E                      		push	ds		; save Bios_Data segment
 14018 000016F6 BE[1901]                		mov	si, start_bds	; beginning of chain
 14019                                  
 14020                                  		; ds:si now points to link to first bds
 14021                                  		; assume bds list is non-empty
 14022                                  loop_next_bds:				
 14023 000016F9 C534                    		lds	si, [si]	; [si+BDS.link]
 14024                                  					; fetch	next bds
 14025 000016FB 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14026 000016FF 384404                  		cmp	[si+4],	al	; does this one	share a	physical
 14027                                  					; drive	with new one?
 14028 00001702 7518                    		jnz	short next_bds
 14029 00001704 B310                    		mov	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 14030 00001706 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14031                                  					; set both of them to i_am_mult	if so
 14032 0000170A 085C23                  		or	[si+23h], bl	; [si+BDS.flags]
 14033 0000170D 26806523DF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0DFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags],~fi_own_physical
 14034                                  					; we don't own it
 14035 00001712 8A5C23                  		mov	bl, [si+23h]	; [si+BDS.flags]
 14036                                  					; determine if changeline available
 14037 00001715 80E302                  		and	bl, 2		; fchangeline
 14038 00001718 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14039                                  next_bds:				
 14040 0000171C 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; [si+BDS.link],-1
 14041                                  					; are we at end	of list?
 14042 0000171F 75D8                    		jnz	short loop_next_bds
 14043 00001721 8C4402                  		mov	word [si+2], es ; [si+BDS.link+2],es
 14044                                  					; install bds
 14045 00001724 893C                    		mov	[si], di
 14046 00001726 26C705FFFF              		mov	word [es:di], 0FFFFh ; [es:di+BDS.link],-1
 14047                                  					; set next pointer to null
 14048 0000172B 1F                      		pop	ds
 14049                                  
 14050                                  ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 6.0 Code)
 14051                                  ;
 14052                                  ; **** If the new drive has a higher EOT value, we must alter the
 14053                                  ;      'eot' variable appropriately.
 14054                                  ;
 14055                                  ;		; 01/06/2019
 14056                                  ;		;mov	al,[es:di+52]
 14057                                  ;		mov	al,[es:di+BDS.rsecpertrack]
 14058                                  ;
 14059                                  ;		cmp	al,[eot]
 14060                                  ;		jbe	short _eot_ok
 14061                                  ;		mov	[eot],al
 14062                                  
 14063 0000172C C3                      		retn
 14064                                  
 14065                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14066

 14068                                  ;DRVLET	equ drvlet - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h

 14071                                  DRVLET equ drvlet
 14072                                  SNGMSG equ sngmsg
 14073

 14076                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14077                                  ;  ask to swap the disk in drive a:
 14078                                  ;	es:di -> bds
 14079                                  ;	ds -> Bios_Data
 14080                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14081                                  
 14082                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14083 0000172D F606[CE08]01            swpdsk:		test	byte [IsWin386], 1			
 14084                                  		;test	ds:IsWin386, 1	; Is win386 present?
 14085 00001732 7405                    		jz	short no_win386	; no, skip SetFocus
 14086                                  		
 14087                                  		; set focus to the correct VM
 14088                                  		;;call	far 70h:8D1h	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:179Ah
 14089                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14090 00001734 9A[CF08]7000            		call	DOSBIOSSEG:V86_Crit_SetFocus
 14091                                  		;call	far ptr	V86_Crit_SetFocus ; call far 70h:8D1h
 14092                                  					; call far KERNEL_SEGMENT:V86_Crit_SetFocus
 14093                                  no_win386:				
 14094 00001739 51                      		push	cx
 14095 0000173A 52                      		push	dx
 14096 0000173B 268A5505                		mov	dl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 14097                                  					; get the drive	letter
 14098                                  
 14099                                  ; WARNING : next two instructions assume that if the new disk is for drive B
 14100                                  ;           then existing dsk is drive A & vice versa
 14101                                  
 14102 0000173F 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl
 14103 00001741 80F601                  		xor	dh, 1
 14104 00001744 29C9                    		sub	cx, cx		; nobody has handled swap disk
 14105 00001746 B8004A                  		mov	ax, 4A00h	; multMULT<<8)|multMULTSWPDSK
 14106                                  					; broad	cast code for swap disk
 14107                                  					; Broadcast it
 14108 00001749 CD2F                    		int	2Fh	
 14109 0000174B 41                      		inc	cx		; cx == -1 ?
 14110 0000174C 741E                    		jz	short swpdsk9	; somebody has handled it
 14111                                  
 14112                                  ; using a different drive in a one drive system so request the user change disks
 14113                                  
 14114 0000174E 80C241                  		add	dl, 'A'
 14115                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14116 00001751 2E8816[8B17]            		mov	[cs:DRVLET], dl
 14117                                  		; 16/10/2022
 14118                                  		;;mov	byte [cs:drvlet], dl
 14119                                  		;mov	byte ptr cs:17E4h, dl ; [cs:drvlet]
 14120                                  					; 0070h:3D54h =	2C7h:17E4h
 14121 00001756 BE[6F17]                		mov	si, SNGMSG
 14122                                  		;mov	si, 17C8h	; sngmsg
 14123                                  					; 0070h:3D38h =	2C7h:17C8h
 14124 00001759 53                      		push	bx
 14125 0000175A 2E                      		cs
 14126 0000175B AC                      		lodsb			; get the next character of the message
 14127                                  		;lods	byte ptr cs:[si]
 14128                                  wrmsg_loop:				
 14129 0000175C CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
 14130                                  					; AL = character to display
 14131 0000175E 2E                      		cs
 14132 0000175F AC                      		lodsb
 14133                                  		;lods	byte ptr cs:[si] ; cs lodsb
 14134                                  					; get the next character of the	message
 14135 00001760 08C0                    		or	al, al
 14136 00001762 75F8                    		jnz	short wrmsg_loop
 14137 00001764 E8A0EA                  		call	con_flush	; flush out keyboard queue
 14138                                  					; call rom-bios
 14139 00001767 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 14140 00001769 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
 14141                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
 14142 0000176B 5B                      		pop	bx
 14143                                  swpdsk9:				
 14144 0000176C 5A                      		pop	dx
 14145 0000176D 59                      		pop	cx
 14146 0000176E C3                      		retn
 14147                                  
 14148                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14149                                  
 14150                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 14151                                  
 14152                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14153                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 14154                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14155                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 14156                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14157                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14158                                  
 14159                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14160 0000176F 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14161 00001771 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14161 0000177A 736B6574746520666F-
 14161 00001783 7220647269766520   
 14162                                  
 14163                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14164 0000178B 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14164 00001794 65737320616E79206B-
 14164 0000179D 6579207768656E2072-
 14164 000017A6 656164790D0A       
 14165 000017AC 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14166                                  
 14167                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14168                                  
 14169                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14170                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14171                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14172                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14173                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14174                                  
 14175                                  chkopcnt:		
 14176 000017AE 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14177 000017B3 C3                      		retn
 14178                                  
 14179                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14180                                  
 14181                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14182                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14183                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14184                                  ;
 14185                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14186                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14187                                  
 14188                                  mediacheck:	
 14189 000017B4 E885F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14190 000017B7 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14191 000017B9 E85501                  		call	haschange
 14192 000017BC 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14193 000017BE E84401                  		call	checkromchange
 14194 000017C1 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14195 000017C3 50                      		push	ax
 14196 000017C4 52                      		push	dx
 14197 000017C5 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14198                                  					; set logical drive number
 14199 000017C9 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14200 000017CB CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14201                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14202                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14203 000017CD 5A                      		pop	dx
 14204 000017CE 58                      		pop	ax
 14205 000017CF 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14206 000017D1 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14207                                  
 14208                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14209                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14210                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14211                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14212                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14213                                  ; status.
 14214                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14215 000017D4 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14216 000017D8 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14217                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14218                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14219                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14220                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14221 000017DC 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14222                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14223                                  
 14224                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14225                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14226                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14227                                  
 14228 000017DE 50                      		push	ax
 14229 000017DF 51                      		push	cx
 14230 000017E0 52                      		push	dx
 14231 000017E1 E86FED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14232 000017E4 5A                      		pop	dx
 14233 000017E5 59                      		pop	cx
 14234 000017E6 58                      		pop	ax
 14235 000017E7 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14236 000017E9 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14237                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14238 000017EB 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14239                                  mediaret:				
 14240 000017ED C3                      		retn
 14241                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14242                                  
 14243                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14244                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14245                                  ; or write.
 14246                                  
 14247                                  mediadovolid:				
 14248 000017EE E807EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14249 000017F1 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14250 000017F3 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14251 000017F6 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14252 000017F8 E9D6F3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14253                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14254                                  
 14255                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14256                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14257                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14258                                  ; dos.
 14259                                  ;
 14260                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14261                                  
 14262                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14263                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14264                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14265                                  
 14266                                  checklatchio:	
 14267                                  
 14268                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14269                                  			
 14270 000017FB E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14271 000017FE 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14272                                  
 14273                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14274                                  
 14275 00001800 E80201                  		call	checkromchange
 14276 00001803 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14277                                  
 14278                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14279                                  ; expensive verification.
 14280                                  
 14281 00001805 E8F0ED                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14282 00001808 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14283 0000180A E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14284 0000180D 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14285 0000180F 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14286 00001811 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14287 00001813 E87D00                  		call	returnvid
 14288                                  checklatchret:				
 14289 00001816 E8B8F3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14290                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14291 00001819 F9                      		stc
 14292 0000181A 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14293                                  checkret:				
 14294 0000181B C3                      		retn
 14295                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14296                                  
 14297                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14298                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14299                                  ;
 14300                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14301                                  
 14302                                  checkfatvid:				
 14303 0000181C E8CD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14304 0000181F 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14305 00001821 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14306                                  
 14307                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14308                                  
 14309                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14310                                  
 14311                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14312                                  
 14313                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14314                                  ;
 14315                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14316                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14317                                  ;
 14318                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14319                                  ;
 14320                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14321                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14322                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14323                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14324                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14325                                  ;
 14326                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14327                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14328                                  ; routine.)
 14329                                  ;
 14330                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14331                                  
 14332                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14333                                  check_vid:
 14334                                  
 14335                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14336                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14337                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14338                                  
 14339 00001823 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14340                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14341                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14342 00001828 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14343 0000182A E8E400                  		call	haschange
 14344 0000182D 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14345 0000182F 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14346 00001831 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14347                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14348 00001836 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14349                                  					; if not fat system
 14350 00001838 E8F600                  		call	read_volume_id
 14351 0000183B 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14352 0000183D E89B01                  		call	check_volume_id
 14353 00001840 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14354                                  					; definitely changed
 14355 00001843 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14356                                  
 14357 00001845 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14358                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14359 00001846 E8C200                  		call	resetchanged
 14360                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14361                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14362                                  		;clc
 14363                                  checkfatret:				
 14364 00001849 C3                      		retn
 14365                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14366                                  
 14367                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14368                                  changed_drv:
 14369 0000184A F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14370 0000184B C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14371                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14372 00001850 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14373                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14374                                  
 14375                                  ; extended id check
 14376                                  
 14377                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14378                                  
 14379                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14380                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14381                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14382                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14383                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14384                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14385                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14386                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14387                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14388                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14389                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14390                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14391                                  ;
 14392                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14393                                  
 14394                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14395                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14396 00001851 50                      		push	ax
 14397                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14398                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14399 00001852 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14400 00001855 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14401 00001859 750E                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14402 0000185B A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14403 0000185E 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14404 00001862 7505                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14405 00001864 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; 0
 14406                                  					; don't know
 14407 00001866 58                      		pop	ax
 14408 00001867 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14409                                  					; reset the flag
 14410                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14411                                  
 14412                                  ext_changed:				
 14413 00001869 58                      		pop	ax
 14414 0000186A BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14415                                  					; disk changed!
 14416                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14417                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14418                                  		;clc
 14419 0000186D EBDB                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14420                                  
 14421                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14422                                  
 14423                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14424                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14425                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14426                                  ;
 14427                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14428                                  
 14429                                  checkio:				
 14430 0000186F 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14431 00001872 75D5                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14432 00001874 E837FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14433 00001877 74D0                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14434 00001879 E87CED                  		call	GetBp
 14435 0000187C 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14436 0000187E E89BFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14437 00001881 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14438 00001883 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14439 00001885 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14440 00001887 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14441 00001888 C3                      		retn
 14442                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14443                                  
 14444                                  checkioerr:				
 14445 00001889 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14446                                  
 14447                                  checkioret:				
 14448 0000188C F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14449 0000188D E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr
 14450                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14451                                  
 14452                                  no_error_map:				
 14453 00001890 E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr2
 14454                                  
 14455                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14456                                  
 14457                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14458                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14459                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14460                                  
 14461                                  returnvid:		
 14462 00001893 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14463                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14464 00001896 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14465 00001899 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14466 0000189B F9                      		stc
 14467 0000189C C3                      		retn
 14468                                  
 14469                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14470                                  
 14471                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14472                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14473                                  ;
 14474                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14475                                  ; **trashes si**
 14476                                  
 14477                                  media_set_vid:				
 14478 0000189D BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14479                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14480                                  
 14481                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14482                                  
 14483                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14484                                  
 14485                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14486                                  
 14487                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14488                                  vid_into_packet:
 14489 000018A0 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14490 000018A1 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14491 000018A5 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14492 000018A8 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14493 000018AA 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14494 000018AD 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14495 000018B0 1F                      		pop	ds
 14496                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14497 000018B1 C3                      		retn
 14498                                  
 14499                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14500                                  
 14501                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14502                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14503                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14504                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14505                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14506                                  ;
 14507                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14508                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14509                                  ;
 14510                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14511                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14512                                  ;		carry set
 14513                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14514                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14515                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14516                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14517                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14518                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 14519                                  ;
 14520                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14521                                  
 14522                                  hidensity:
 14523                                  
 14524                                  ; check for correct drive
 14525                                  		
 14526                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14527 000018B2 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14528                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 14529                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 14530 000018B7 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 14531                                  
 14532                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 14533                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 14534                                  
 14535 000018B9 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 14536 000018BE 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 14537                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 14538                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 14539 000018C0 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 14540 000018C3 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 14541                                  
 14542                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 14543                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 14544                                  
 14545 000018C5 26807D2207              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14546                                  					; ffOther
 14547 000018CA 7418                    		jz	short Is720K
 14548 000018CC 26807D2209              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14549                                  					; ff288
 14550 000018D1 7411                    		jz	short Is720K
 14551 000018D3 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 14552 000018D5 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 14553                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 14554                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 14555 000018D8 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 14556                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 14557                                  					; 2 sides
 14558 000018DB BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 14559                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 14560                                  					; & head max
 14561 000018DE 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14562 000018E1 E986ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 14563                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14564                                  
 14565                                  Is720K:					
 14566 000018E4 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14567 000018E7 E947ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 14568                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14569                                  
 14570                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14571                                  ;dofloppy:				
 14572                                  		;retn
 14573                                  
 14574                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14575                                  
 14576                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14577                                  
 14578                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14579                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 14580                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 14581                                  ;
 14582                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 14583                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 14584                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14585                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 14586                                  ;
 14587                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 14588                                  ;
 14589                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 14590                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14591                                  
 14592                                  set_changed_dl:	
 14593 000018EA 06                      		push	es
 14594 000018EB 57                      		push	di
 14595                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 14596                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14597 000018EC C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 14598                                  
 14599                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 14600                                  
 14601                                  scan_bds:				
 14602 000018F0 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14603 000018F4 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 14604                                  
 14605                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 14606                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 14607                                  
 14608 000018F6 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14609                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 14610                                  get_next_bds:				
 14611 000018FA 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 14612                                  					; go to	next bds
 14613 000018FD 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14614 00001900 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 14615 00001902 5F                      		pop	di
 14616 00001903 07                      		pop	es
 14617 00001904 C3                      		retn
 14618                                  
 14619                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14620                                  
 14621                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14622                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 14623                                  ;
 14624                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 14625                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 14626                                  ;		zero reset - change
 14627                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14628                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14629                                  
 14630                                  checkromchange:	
 14631                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 14632                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14633 00001905 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 14634                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14635                                  					; fchanged
 14636 0000190A C3                      		retn
 14637                                  
 14638                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14639                                  
 14640                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14641                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 14642                                  ;
 14643                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14644                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14645                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14646                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14647                                  
 14648                                  resetchanged:	
 14649                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 14650                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14651 0000190B 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 14652                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14653                                  					; ~fchanged
 14654 00001910 C3                      		retn
 14655                                  
 14656                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14657                                  
 14658                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14659                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 14660                                  ;
 14661                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14662                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 14663                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 14664                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14665                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14666                                  
 14667                                  haschange:
 14668                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 14669                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14670 00001911 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14671                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14672                                  					; fchangeline
 14673 00001916 C3                      		retn
 14674                                  
 14675                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14676                                  
 14677                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14678                                  
 14679                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14680                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 14681                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14682                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 14683                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 14684                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14685                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14686                                  
 14687                                  ; set_volume_id
 14688                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 14689                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 14690                                  ;
 14691                                  ;   on entry:
 14692                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 14693                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 14694                                  ;
 14695                                  ;   on exit:
 14696                                  ;	carry clear:
 14697                                  ;	   successful call
 14698                                  ;	carry set
 14699                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 14700                                  
 14701                                  set_volume_id:				
 14702 00001917 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 14703 00001918 50                      		push	ax
 14704 00001919 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 14705 0000191C 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 14706 0000191E E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 14707 00001921 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 14708 00001923 E8A200                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 14709 00001926 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 14710                                  setvret:				
 14711                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14712                                  		; cf = 0
 14713                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 14714 00001929 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 14715 0000192A 5A                      		pop	dx
 14716 0000192B C3                      		retn
 14717                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14718                                  
 14719                                  seterr:					
 14720 0000192C 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 14721 0000192D 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 14722 0000192E C3                      		retn
 14723                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14724 0000192F 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 14725                                  
 14726                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14727                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 14728                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14729                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 14730                                  
 14731                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14732                                  
 14733                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14734                                  
 14735                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14736                                  ;
 14737                                  ;   on entry:
 14738                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14739                                  ;
 14740                                  ;   on exit:
 14741                                  ;	carry clear
 14742                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 14743                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 14744                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 14745                                  ;
 14746                                  ;	carry set:
 14747                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 14748                                  
 14749                                  read_volume_id:
 14750 00001931 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 14751 00001932 51                      		push	cx
 14752 00001933 53                      		push	bx
 14753 00001934 50                      		push	ax
 14754 00001935 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 14755 00001936 57                      		push	di
 14756 00001937 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 14757 00001938 07                      		pop	es
 14758 00001939 BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14759 0000193C BE[FE08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14760 0000193F B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 14761 00001942 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14762 00001944 5F                      		pop	di
 14763 00001945 07                      		pop	es
 14764 00001946 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 14765                                  					; # of fats
 14766 0000194A 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 14767                                  					; sectors / fat
 14768 0000194E F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 14769 00001950 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 14770                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 14771                                  					;
 14772                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 14773                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14774 00001954 2EA3[2F19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 14775                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 14776                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 14777 00001958 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 14778                                  					; # root dir entries
 14779 0000195C B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 14780 0000195E D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 14781 00001960 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 14782                                  next_sec:				
 14783 00001962 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 14784 00001963 2EA1[2F19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14785                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 14786                                  					; get sector #
 14787 00001967 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 14788                                  					; sectors / track
 14789 0000196B 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14790 0000196D F7F1                    		div	cx
 14791                                  
 14792                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 14793                                  
 14794 0000196F 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 14795                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 14796 00001970 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 14797 00001972 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14798 00001974 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 14799                                  					; # heads on this disc
 14800 00001978 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 14801 0000197A 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 14802 0000197C E8FBED                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 14803                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 14804 0000197F 7243                    		jb	short readviderr
 14805 00001981 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 14806 00001984 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 14807                                  fvid_loop:				
 14808 00001986 803F00                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 14809 00001989 7436                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 14810 0000198B 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 14811 0000198E 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 14812 00001990 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 14813 00001993 7511                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 14814                                  ent_loop:				
 14815 00001995 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 14816 00001998 E2EC                    		loop	fvid_loop
 14817 0000199A 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 14818 0000199B 2EFF06[2F19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14819                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 14820                                  					; next sector
 14821 000019A0 E2C0                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 14822                                  notfound:				
 14823 000019A2 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14824 000019A4 EB16                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 14825                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14826                                  
 14827                                  found_vid:				
 14828 000019A6 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14829 000019A7 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 14830 000019A9 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 14831 000019AA 57                      		push	di
 14832 000019AB 1E                      		push	ds
 14833 000019AC 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 14834 000019AD BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14835 000019B0 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 14836                                  					; length of string minus nul
 14837 000019B3 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 14838 000019B5 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 14839 000019B7 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 14840 000019B8 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14841 000019BA 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 14842 000019BB 07                      		pop	es
 14843                                  fvid_ret:				
 14844 000019BC 58                      		pop	ax
 14845                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14846                                  		; cf = 0
 14847                                  		;clc
 14848                                  rvidret:				
 14849 000019BD 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 14850 000019BE 59                      		pop	cx
 14851 000019BF 5A                      		pop	dx
 14852 000019C0 C3                      		retn
 14853                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14854                                  
 14855                                  no_vid:					
 14856 000019C1 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14857 000019C2 EBDE                    		jmp	short notfound	; not found
 14858                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14859                                  
 14860                                  readviderr:				
 14861 000019C4 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 14862 000019C5 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 14863 000019C6 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 14864                                  
 14865                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14866                                  
 14867                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14868                                  ;
 14869                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 14870                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 14871                                  
 14872                                  transfer_volume_id:	
 14873 000019C8 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14874 000019C9 56                      		push	si
 14875 000019CA 51                      		push	cx
 14876 000019CB BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14877                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14878 000019CE 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14879                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14880 000019D1 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14881 000019D4 FC                      		cld
 14882 000019D5 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14883 000019D7 59                      		pop	cx
 14884 000019D8 5E                      		pop	si
 14885 000019D9 5F                      		pop	di
 14886 000019DA C3                      		retn
 14887                                  
 14888                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14889                                  
 14890                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 14891                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 14892                                  ;
 14893                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 14894                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 14895                                  
 14896                                  check_volume_id:	
 14897 000019DB 57                      		push	di
 14898 000019DC 51                      		push	cx
 14899 000019DD BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14900                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14901 000019E0 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14902                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14903 000019E3 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14904 000019E6 FC                      		cld
 14905 000019E7 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 14906 000019E9 59                      		pop	cx
 14907 000019EA 5F                      		pop	di
 14908 000019EB C3                      		retn
 14909                                  
 14910                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14911                                  
 14912                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14913                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 14914                                  ;
 14915                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 14916                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 14917                                  ;
 14918                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 14919                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 14920                                  ;
 14921                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 14922                                  
 14923                                  fat_check:		
 14924 000019EC 50                      		push	ax
 14925 000019ED 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 14926 000019EF A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 14927 000019F2 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 14928                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 14929 000019F6 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 14930 000019F8 4E                      		dec	si
 14931                                  okret1:					
 14932 000019F9 58                      		pop	ax
 14933 000019FA C3                      		retn
 14934                                  
 14935                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14936                                  
 14937                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 14938                                  		;times 7 db 0
 14939                                  
 14940                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 14941                                  
 14942                                  		; 09/12/2022
 14943                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 14944                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 14945                                  
 14946                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14947                                  
 14948                                  		; 09/12/2022
 14949                                  		;db 0
 14950                                  
 14951                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 14952                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 14953                                  
 14954                                  %if number2mod>0 & number2mod<16
 14955 000019FB 00<rep 5h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 14956                                  %endif
 14957                                  
 14958                                  ;align 16
 14959                                  
 14960                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14961                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 14962                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 14963                                  ; 13/12/2022
 14964                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 14965                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)

 14978                                  ;=============================================================================
 14979                                  ; (IO.SYS) SYSINIT SEGMENT
