 29511                                  ;        BX    = 0
 29512                                  ;        CH    = 0
 29513                                  ; ------------------------------------------------------
 29514                                  
 29515                                  gxn20:	
 29516                                  	mov	cl,[es:si]	; Now DX:AX=current total, CH=0/CL=char
 29517                                  	inc	si
 29518                                  
 29519                                  	call	toDigit		; Accepts only valid digits, A-F -> 10-16
 29520                                  	jc	short gxnQ	; <- Ah... wasn't a digit. Stop.
 29521                                  
 29522                                  	call	mul32		; Multiply DX:AX by gnradix
 29523                                  	jc	short gxnX	; (if it's too big, error out)
 29524                                  
 29525                                  	add	ax,cx		; Add the digit
 29526                                  	adc	dx,bx		; (BX is 0!)--Adds 1 iff last add wrapped
 29527                                  	;jc	short gxnX	; If _that_ wrapped, it's too big.
 29528                                  	;jmp	short gxn20
 29529                                  	jnc	short gxn20
 29530                                  gxnE:	
 29531                                  	;stc			; In this case, we need to set the carry
 29532                                  	jmp	short gxnX	; and leave--there were no digits given.
 29533                                  gxnQ:	
 29534                                  	dec	si		; Don't read in the offensive character.
 29535                                  	clc			; And clear carry, so they know it's okay.
 29536                                  gxnX:	
 29537                                  	pop	ds
 29538                                  	pop	cx
 29539                                  	pop	bx
 29540                                  	retn
 29541                                  
 29542                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29543                                  ;*** mul32 - multiplies the number in DX:AX by gnradix
 29544                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29545                                  ; ENTRY:   DX:AX = the number to be multiplied, BX = 0, gnradix = multiplier
 29546                                  ; EXIT:    DX:AX has been multiplied by gnradix if carry clear; BX still 0
 29547                                  ; ERROR:   Carry set if number was too large
 29548                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX, DX
 29549                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29550                                  
 29551                                  mul32:
 29552                                  	push	ax		; DX=old:hi, AX=old:lo, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 29553                                  	mov	ax,dx		; DX=old:hi, AX=old:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 29554                                  	mul	word [cs:gnradix] ; DX=?, AX=new:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 29555                                  	jc	short m32E	; Too big?
 29556                                  
 29557                                  	mov	dx,ax		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:hi, TOS=old:lo, BX=0
 29558                                  	pop	ax		; DX=new:hi, AX=old:lo, TOS=orig, BX=0
 29559                                  
 29560                                  	xchg	dx,bx		; DX=0, AX=old:lo, TOS=orig, BX=new:hi
 29561                                  	mul	word [cs:gnradix] ; DX=carry,  AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=new:hi
 29562                                  	xchg	dx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=carry
 29563                                  	add	dx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=carry
 29564                                  	xor	bx,bx		; DX=new:hi, AX=new:lo, TOS=orig, BX=0
 29565                                  	retn
 29566                                  m32E:	
 29567                                  	pop	ax
 29568                                  	retn
 29569                                  
 29570                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29571                                  ;*** toPara - divides DX:AX by 16; result in AX only (discards extra DX data)
 29572                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29573                                  ; ENTRY:   DX:AX = the number to be divided
 29574                                  ; EXIT:    Interpereting DX:AX as bytes, AX=paragraph equivalent, 0xFFFF max
 29575                                  ; ERROR:   None
 29576                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX, DX
 29577                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29578                                  ; Note: The 386 has a 32-bit SHR, which would work perfectly for this... but we
 29579                                  ;       can't ensure a 386 host machine. Sorry.
 29580                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29581                                  
 29582                                  toPara:
 29583                                  	push	cx		; DX:AX=HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh:LLLL llll llll llll
 29584                                  
 29585                                  	mov	cl,4		;
 29586                                  	shr	ax,cl		; DX:AX=HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh:0000 LLLL llll llll
 29587                                  	xchg	ax,dx		; DX:AX=0000 LLLL llll llll:HHHH hhhh hhhh hhhh
 29588                                  	mov	cl,12
 29589                                  	shl	ax,cl		; DX:AX=0000 LLLL llll llll:hhhh 0000 0000 0000
 29590                                  	or	ax,dx		;    AX=hhhh LLLL llll llll
 29591                                  
 29592                                  	pop	cx
 29593                                  	retn
 29594                                  
 29595                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29596                                  ;*** UmbHead - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 29597                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29598                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 29599                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 29600                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 29601                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 29602                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29603                                  ; Early in the boot-cycle, the pointer used to obtain this value isn't set up;
 29604                                  ; to be precise, before a UMB provider is around. In this event, the pointer
 29605                                  ; is always set to 0xFFFF; it changes once a provider is around. On most
 29606                                  ; machines (all of 'em I've seen), it changes to 0x9FFF at that point.
 29607                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29608                                  
 29609                                  UmbHead:
 29610                                  	; 13/05/2019 (because of callers, pushs & pops are not needed here)
 29611                                  
 29612                                  	;push	si ; ?
 29613                                  	;push	ds ; ? 
 29614                                  	;push	es
 29615                                  	;push	bx ; *	
 29616                                  
 29617                                  	; 09/04/2019
 29618                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 29619                                  
 29620                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 29621                                  	int	21h
 29622                                  
 29623                                  	mov	ax,[es:DOS_UMB_HEAD]	; And read what's in ES:[008C]
 29624                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 29625                                  	je	short uhE		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 29626                                  
 29627                                  	clc				; Else, it isn't (CLC done by prev cmp)
 29628                                  	;jmp	short uhX
 29629                                  	; 12/12/2022
 29630                                  	retn
 29631                                  uhE:	
 29632                                  	stc
 29633                                  uhX:	
 29634                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 29635                                  	;pop	es
 29636                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 29637                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 29638                                  	retn
 29639                                  
 29640                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29641                                  ;*** isSysMCB - sets ZF if ES points to an MCB owned by "SC" + (8 or 9)
 29642                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29643                                  ; ENTRY:  ES:0 should point to a valid MCB
 29644                                  ; EXIT:   ZF set if owned by SC+8 or SC+9 (for japan)
 29645                                  ; USES:   Flags
 29646                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29647                                  
 29648                                  isSysMCB:
 29649                                  	;push	ax
 29650                                  
 29651                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 29652                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 29653                                  	;je	short ism10
 29654                                  	;cmp	ax,JapanPSPOwner	; 9 (for Japan) is valid
 29655                                  	;;je	short ism10
 29656                                  	;;jmp	short ismX		; Anything else isn't.
 29657                                  	;jne	short ismX
 29658                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8  ; 09/04/2019
 29659                                  	jne	short ismX 
 29660                                  ism10:	
 29661                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]	; Check the name...
 29662                                  	;cmp	ax,'SC' ; 4353h
 29663                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 29664                                  ismX:	
 29665                                  	;pop	ax
 29666                                  	retn
 29667                                  
 29668                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 29669                                  
 29670                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29671                                  ;*** AddrToUmb - converts a segment address in AX to its appropriate UMB number
 29672                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29673                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a segment address
 29674                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain the UMB number which contains the address (0==conv)
 29675                                  ; ERROR:  If the address is above UM Range, AX will return as FFFF.
 29676                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 29677                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29678                                  ; An address in the following areas is treated as:
 29679                                  ;    0      <-> umbhead (0x9FFF)          = Conventional memory
 29680                                  ;    0x9FFF <-> addr of first UM sys MCB  = UMB #1
 29681                                  ;      ...
 29682                                  ;    addr of last UM sys MCB <-> TOM      = invalid; returns #0xFFFF
 29683                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29684                                  
 29685                                  AddrToUmb:
 29686                                  	push	cx
 29687                                  	push	dx
 29688                                  	push	es
 29689                                  
 29690                                  	mov	dx,ax		; DX = address to search for
 29691                                  
 29692                                  	call	UmbHead		; AX = first segment
 29693                                  	jc	short atuE	; If it couldn't get it, error out.
 29694                                  
 29695                                  	mov	es,ax		; ES = first UMB segment
 29696                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now... (cx = UMB#)
 29697                                  
 29698                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 29699                                  ; ATU10--ES - Current MCB address
 29700                                  ;        DX - Address given for conversion
 29701                                  ;        CX - Current UMB #
 29702                                  ; ----------------------------------------
 29703                                  
 29704                                  atu10:	mov	ax,es
 29705                                          cmp	ax,dx		; Present segment >= given segment?
 29706                                  	jae	short atuX	; Yep--done.
 29707                                  
 29708                                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if this is a system MCB
 29709                                  	jnz	short atu20
 29710                                  
 29711                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ a system MCB, we're in a new UMB.
 29712                                  atu20:	
 29713                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 29714                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 29715                                  	je	short atu30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 29716                                  
 29717                                  	;NextMCB es, ax
 29718                                  
 29719                                  	mov     ax,es
 29720                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 29721                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 29722                                  	inc     ax
 29723                                  	mov     es,ax
 29724                                  	
 29725                                  	jmp	short atu10
 29726                                  
 29727                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29728                                  ; if we get to atu30, they specified a number that was past the last MCB.
 29729                                  ; make sure it's not _inside_ that MCB before we return an error condition.
 29730                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29731                                  
 29732                                  atu30:	
 29733                                  	mov	ax,es
 29734                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 29735                                  	cmp	ax,dx		; Present >= given?
 29736                                  	jae	short atuX	; Yep! It _was_ inside.
 29737                                  atuE:	
 29738                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Else, fall through with UMB # == -1
 29739                                  	dec	cx		; (that makes it return 0xFFFF and sets CF)
 29740                                  atuX:	
 29741                                  	mov	ax, cx		; Return the UMB number in AX
 29742                                  	
 29743                                  	pop	es	
 29744                                  	pop	dx
 29745                                  	pop	cx
 29746                                  	retn
 29747                                  
 29748                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29749                                  ;*** convUMB - checks after GetXNum to convert an address to a UMB number
 29750                                  ;            -- if GetXNum read a hex number, we interperete that as a segment
 29751                                  ; address rather than a UMB number... and use that address to look up a UMB.
 29752                                  ; This routine checks for that condition and calls AddrToUmb if necessary.
 29753                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29754                                  ; ENTRY:  AX contains a UMB number or segment, gnradix has been set by GetXNum
 29755                                  ; EXIT:   AX will contain a UMB number
 29756                                  ; ERROR:  None
 29757                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 29758                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29759                                  
 29760                                  convUMB:
 29761                                  	cmp	word [cs:gnradix],16
 29762                                  	jne	short cu10	; If it didn't read in hex, it's not an address
 29763                                  	call	AddrToUmb	; Else, convert the address to a UMB number
 29764                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 29765                                  	jne	short cu10
 29766                                  	inc	ax		; If too high, ignore it (make it conventional)
 29767                                  cu10:	
 29768                                  	retn
 29769                                  
 29770                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29771                                  ;*** setUMBs - links umbs and sets allocation strategy for a load
 29772                                  ;            -- if LoadHigh, the allocation strategy MAY be LOW_FIRST instead
 29773                                  ; of the usual HIGH_FIRST.  See the code.
 29774                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29775                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 29776                                  ; EXIT:   None
 29777                                  ; ERROR:  None
 29778                                  ; USES:   Flags, fm_umb, fm_strat
 29779                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29780                                  
 29781                                  setUMBs:
 29782                                  	push	ax
 29783                                  	push	bx
 29784                                  	call	fm_link
 29785                                  	pop	bx
 29786                                  	pop	ax
 29787                                  	retn
 29788                                  
 29789                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29790                                  ;*** loadLow - returns AL==0 if UMB0 == 0, else AL==1
 29791                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29792                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 29793                                  ; EXIT:   AL==0 if mem strategy should be set to LOW_FIRST, else AL==1
 29794                                  ;         Carry set if UMB0 not specified (_NOT_ an error)
 29795                                  ; ERROR:  None
 29796                                  ; USES:   Flags, fm_strat, fm_umb
 29797                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29798                                  ; We want to set the memory strategy to LOW_FIRST if the user specified a
 29799                                  ; load UMB, and it is 0.  That 0 can be either from the user having _specified_
 29800                                  ; zero (/L:0;...), or from having specified a too-big min size (/L:1,99999999)
 29801                                  ; such that the load UMB is too small, and shouldn't be used.
 29802                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29803                                  
 29804                                  loadLow:
 29805                                  	;push	ds
 29806                                  	;push	cs		; Point DS into appropriate data segment
 29807                                  	;pop	ds	
 29808                                  
 29809                                  	;mov	al,[UmbLoad]
 29810                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad]
 29811                                  	cmp	al,UNSPECIFIED ; 0FFh, -1
 29812                                  	jne	short ll10
 29813                                  
 29814                                  	stc
 29815                                  ll15:
 29816                                  	mov	al,1		; Return with AL==1 && STC if no UMBs specified
 29817                                  	;stc
 29818                                  	;jmp	short llX
 29819                                  	retn
 29820                                  ll10:	
 29821                                  	or	al,al		; AL=the load UMB: Is it == 0?
 29822                                  	;jz	short llX	; Yep... CF==0 (from OR) && AL=0, so just exit
 29823                                  
 29824                                  	jnz	short ll15	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 29825                                  	retn
 29826                                  
 29827                                  	;mov	al,1
 29828                                  	;clc
 29829                                  ;llX:
 29830                                  	;pop	ds		; Return DS to where it was
 29831                                  	;retn
 29832                                  
 29833                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29834                                  ;*** HideUMBs - links UMBs and hides upper-memory as appropriate
 29835                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29836                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 29837                                  ; EXIT:   None
 29838                                  ; ERROR:  None
 29839                                  ; USES:   Flags, fm_strat, fm_umb
 29840                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29841                                  
 29842                                  HideUMBs:
 29843                                  	push	ax
 29844                                  	push	cx
 29845                                  	push	ds
 29846                                  	push	es
 29847                                  
 29848                                  	call	UmbTest		; See if we REALLY linked in anything...
 29849                                  	jc	short husX	; ...if not, there's nothing for us to do.
 29850                                  
 29851                                  	call	FixMem		; Concatenate adjacent free MCBs in upper mem
 29852                                  	call	setUMBs		; Link UMBs and set memory-allocation strategy
 29853                                  
 29854                                  	;putdata fInHigh,1	; Remember that we're now running high
 29855                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],1
 29856                                  
 29857                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB	; See if they gave us a list to leave free
 29858                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 29859                                  
 29860                                  	cmp	al,UNSPECIFIED	; If they didn't,
 29861                                  	je	short husX	; then we shouldn't do this loop:
 29862                                  
 29863                                  	xor	cx,cx
 29864                                  
 29865                                  ; -----------------------------------------------
 29866                                  ; HUS10-CX - UMB number (after inc, 1==first UMB)
 29867                                  ; -----------------------------------------------
 29868                                  
 29869                                  hus10:	inc	cx		; For each UMB:
 29870                                  	cmp	cx,MAXUMB ; 16
 29871                                  	jae	short hus20
 29872                                  
 29873                                  	mov	al,cl		; (stopping as soon as we're outside of the
 29874                                  	push	es
 29875                                  	call	findUMB		; valid range of UMBs)
 29876                                  	pop	es		; push/pop: trash what findumb finds.  :-)
 29877                                  	jc	short hus20
 29878                                  
 29879                                  	call	_hideUMB_	; hide what we need to hide.
 29880                                  
 29881                                  	jmp	short hus10
 29882                                  hus20:	
 29883                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB	; Now check if they offered /L:0
 29884                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0	
 29885                                  
 29886                                  	or	al,al		; --Is the load UMB 0? (-1==unspecified)
 29887                                  	jnz	short husX	; If not, we're done.
 29888                                  
 29889                                  	call	hl_unlink	; If so, however, fix UMBs and strategy.
 29890                                  husX:	
 29891                                  	pop	es
 29892                                  	pop	ds
 29893                                  	pop	cx
 29894                                  	pop	ax
 29895                                  	retn
 29896                                  
 29897                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29898                                  ;*** GetLoadUMB - Returns the load UMB number in AL (-1 if not specified)
 29899                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29900                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 29901                                  ; EXIT:   AL == load UMB
 29902                                  ; ERROR:  None
 29903                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 29904                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29905                                  
 29906                                  ;GetLoadUMB:
 29907                                  ;	;getdata al, UmbLoad
 29908                                  ;	push	ds
 29909                                  ;	push	cs
 29910                                  ;	pop	ds
 29911                                  ;	mov	al,[UmLoad]
 29912                                  ;	pop	ds
 29913                                  ;	retn
 29914                                  
 29915                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29916                                  ;*** GetLoadSize - Returns the load UMB minimum size (0 if not specified)
 29917                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29918                                  ; ENTRY:  None
 29919                                  ; EXIT:   AX == load UMB minimum size
 29920                                  ; ERROR:  None
 29921                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 29922                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29923                                  
 29924                                  GetLoadSize:
 29925                                  	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 29926                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad]
 29927                                  	jmp	short GetSize
 29928                                  
 29929                                  	;push	bx
 29930                                  	;;push	si
 29931                                  	;push	ds
 29932                                  	;push	cs
 29933                                  	;pop	ds
 29934                                  
 29935                                  	;mov	al,[UmbLoad]
 29936                                  
 29937                                  	;xor	ah,ah			;    ax==UMB
 29938                                  	;mov	bx,UmbSize		;    bx==array
 29939                                  	;shl	al,1	                ;    ax==offset
 29940                                  	;;add	ax,bx			;    ax==element index
 29941                                  	;;mov	si,ax			; ds:si==element index
 29942                                  
 29943                                  	;;lodsw				;    ax==size
 29944                                  
 29945                                  	;add	bx,ax
 29946                                  	;mov	ax,[bx]
 29947                                  
 29948                                  	;pop	ds
 29949                                  	;;pop	si
 29950                                  	;pop	bx
 29951                                  	;retn
 29952                                  
 29953                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29954                                  ;*** GetSize - Returns the UMB in AL's minimum size (0 if not specified)
 29955                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29956                                  ; ENTRY:  AL == a UMB number
 29957                                  ; EXIT:   AX == UMB minimum size, as specified by the user
 29958                                  ; ERROR:  None
 29959                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 29960                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29961                                  
 29962                                  GetSize:
 29963                                  	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 29964                                  
 29965                                  	push	bx
 29966                                  	;push	si
 29967                                  	;push	ds
 29968                                  	;push	cs
 29969                                  	;pop	ds
 29970                                  
 29971                                  	xor	ah,ah			;    ax==UMB
 29972                                  	mov	bx,UmbSize		;    bx==array
 29973                                  	shl	al,1	                ;    ax==offset
 29974                                  	;add	ax,bx			;    ax==element index
 29975                                  	;mov	si,ax			; ds:si==element index
 29976                                  
 29977                                  	;lodsw				;    ax==size
 29978                                  
 29979                                  	add	bx,ax
 29980                                  	;mov	ax,[bx]
 29981                                  	mov	ax,[cs:bx]
 29982                                  
 29983                                  	;pop	ds
 29984                                  	;pop	si
 29985                                  	pop	bx
 29986                                  	retn
 29987                                  
 29988                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29989                                  ;*** StoLoadUMB - Overrides the load UMB number with what's in AL
 29990                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29991                                  ; ENTRY:   AL == new load UMB
 29992                                  ; EXIT:    None
 29993                                  ; ERROR:   None
 29994                                  ; USES:    Flags, AX
 29995                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29996                                  ; CAUTION: Should only be used if /L:... was used.  Logically, that is the only
 29997                                  ;          time you would ever need this, so that's okay.
 29998                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 29999                                  
 30000                                  ;StoLoadUMB:
 30001                                  ;	;putdata UmbLoad, al
 30002                                  ;	push	es
 30003                                  ;	push	cs
 30004                                  ;	pop	es
 30005                                  ;	mov	[es:UmbLoad],al
 30006                                  ;	pop	es
 30007                                  ;	retn
 30008                                  
 30009                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30010                                  ;*** StoLoadSize - Overrides the load UMB minimum size with what's in AX
 30011                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30012                                  ; ENTRY:  AL == new load size
 30013                                  ; EXIT:   None
 30014                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30015                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30016                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30017                                  
 30018                                  StoLoadSize:
 30019                                  	push	dx
 30020                                  
 30021                                  	;getdata dl, UmbLoad		; Put UMB# in DL and size in AX
 30022                                  	;
 30023                                  	;push	ds
 30024                                  	;push	cs
 30025                                  	;pop	ds
 30026                                  	;mov	dl,[UmbLoad]
 30027                                  	;pop	ds	
 30028                                  
 30029                                  	mov	dl,[cs:UmbLoad]
 30030                                  
 30031                                  	cmp	dl,UNSPECIFIED ; 0FFh
 30032                                  	je	short sls10
 30033                                  
 30034                                  	call	stowSiz			; We've got a function to do just this
 30035                                  sls10:	
 30036                                  	pop	dx
 30037                                  	retn
 30038                                  
 30039                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30040                                  ;*** hideUMB - marks as HIDDEN all FREE elements in UMB passed as AL
 30041                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30042                                  ; ENTRY:    AL must indicate a valid UMB; 0==conv && is invalid.
 30043                                  ; EXIT:     None; free elements in UMB marked as hidden
 30044                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30045                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30046                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30047                                  
 30048                                  hideUMB:
 30049                                  	push	ax
 30050                                  	push	es
 30051                                  
 30052                                  	call	findUMB		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 30053                                  	jc	short huX
 30054                                  
 30055                                  ; ------------------------------------------------
 30056                                  ; HU10--ES - MCB inside UMB; if it's a system MCB,
 30057                                  ;            we're not in the same UMB, so exit.
 30058                                  ; ------------------------------------------------
 30059                                  
 30060                                  hu10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30061                                  	jz	short huX	; If it is, we've finished the UMB.
 30062                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30063                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30064                                  	jnz	short hu20
 30065                                  
 30066                                  	call	hideMCB
 30067                                  hu20:	
 30068                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30069                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end  ;'Z'
 30070                                  	jz	short huX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30071                                  
 30072                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30073                                  	mov     ax,es
 30074                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30075                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30076                                  	inc     ax
 30077                                  	mov     es,ax
 30078                                  
 30079                                  	jmp	short hu10
 30080                                  huX:	
 30081                                  	pop	es
 30082                                  	pop	ax
 30083                                  	retn
 30084                                  
 30085                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30086                                  ;*** isTiny - returns with ZF set if user didn't specify /S
 30087                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30088                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30089                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if user DIDN'T specify /S
 30090                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30091                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30092                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30093                                  
 30094                                  isTiny:
 30095                                  	push	ax
 30096                                  
 30097                                  	;getdata al, fUmbTiny
 30098                                  	;
 30099                                  	;push	ds
 30100                                  	;push	cs
 30101                                  	;pop	ds
 30102                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny]
 30103                                  	;pop	ds
 30104                                  
 30105                                  	mov	al,[cs:fUmbTiny]		
 30106                                  
 30107                                  	or	al,al
 30108                                  	pop	ax
 30109                                  	retn
 30110                                  
 30111                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30112                                  ;*** isFreeMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FREE
 30113                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30114                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30115                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is free, else !ZF
 30116                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30117                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30118                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30119                                  
 30120                                  ;isFreeMCB:
 30121                                  ;	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30122                                  ;	retn
 30123                                  
 30124                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30125                                  ;*** hideMCB - marks as HIDDEN the MCB at ES:0
 30126                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30127                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30128                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB marked as HIDDEN
 30129                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30130                                  ; USES:     None
 30131                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30132                                  
 30133                                  hideMCB:
 30134                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 30135                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0], 'HI' ; 4948h
 30136                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2], 'DD' ; 4444h
 30137                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4], 'EN' ; 4E45h
 30138                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6], '  ' ; 2020h	
 30139                                  	retn
 30140                                  
 30141                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30142                                  ;*** unHideMCB - marks as FREE the MCB at ES:0
 30143                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30144                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30145                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB marked as FREE
 30146                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30147                                  ; USES:     None
 30148                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30149                                  
 30150                                  unHideMCB:
 30151                                  	push	ax
 30152                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],FreePSPOwner ; 0
 30153                                  	mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30154                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 30155                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 30156                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 30157                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 30158                                  	pop	ax
 30159                                  	retn
 30160                                  
 30161                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30162                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 30163                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 30164                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30165                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30166                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 30167                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 30168                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 30169                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30170                                  
 30171                                  findUMB:
 30172                                  	push	ax
 30173                                  	push	cx
 30174                                  	push	dx
 30175                                  
 30176                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30177                                  
 30178                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 30179                                  
 30180                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30181                                  	mov	es,ax
 30182                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30183                                  
 30184                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30185                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 30186                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 30187                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 30188                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30189                                  
 30190                                  fu10:	
 30191                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 30192                                  	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 30193                                  
 30194                                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30195                                  	jnz	short fu20
 30196                                  
 30197                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 30198                                  fu20:	
 30199                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30200                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30201                                  	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30202                                  
 30203                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30204                                  	mov     ax,es
 30205                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30206                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30207                                  	inc     ax
 30208                                  	mov     es,ax
 30209                                  
 30210                                  	jmp	short fu10
 30211                                  fuE:	
 30212                                  	stc
 30213                                  fuX:
 30214                                  	pop	dx
 30215                                  	pop	cx
 30216                                  	pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 30217                                  	retn
 30218                                  
 30219                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30220                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 30221                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30222                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30223                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 30224                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 30225                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 30226                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30227                                  
 30228                                  BigFree:
 30229                                  	push	bx
 30230                                  	push	cx
 30231                                  
 30232                                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 30233                                  	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 30234                                  
 30235                                  	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 30236                                  	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 30237                                  
 30238                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30239                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 30240                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 30241                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 30242                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30243                                  
 30244                                  bf10:	
 30245                                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 30246                                  	jz	short bf30
 30247                                  
 30248                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30249                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30250                                  	jnz	short bf20
 30251                                  
 30252                                  	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30253                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 30254                                  	cmp	cx,ax
 30255                                  	jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 30256                                  
 30257                                  	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 30258                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 30259                                  	mov	cx,ax
 30260                                  
 30261                                  bf20:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30262                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 30263                                  	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 30264                                  
 30265                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 30266                                  	mov     ax,es
 30267                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30268                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30269                                  	inc     ax
 30270                                  	mov     es,ax
 30271                                  
 30272                                  	jmp	short bf10
 30273                                  
 30274                                  bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 30275                                  	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 30276                                  	or	bx,bx
 30277                                  	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 30278                                  bfE:	
 30279                                  	stc
 30280                                  bfX:
 30281                                  	pop	cx
 30282                                  	pop	bx
 30283                                  	retn
 30284                                  
 30285                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30286                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 30287                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30288                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30289                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 30290                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30291                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30292                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30293                                  
 30294                                  isSpecified:
 30295                                  	push	ax
 30296                                  
 30297                                  	xor	bh,bh
 30298                                  	mov	bl,al
 30299                                  
 30300                                  	;getdata al, DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 30301                                  	;
 30302                                  	;push	ds
 30303                                  	;push	cs
 30304                                  	;pop	ds
 30305                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 30306                                  	;pop	ds
 30307                                  	
 30308                                  	mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 30309                                  	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 30310                                  
 30311                                  	pop	ax
 30312                                  	retn
 30313                                  
 30314                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30315                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 30316                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30317                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 30318                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 30319                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 30320                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30321                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30322                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 30323                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 30324                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 30325                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 30326                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 30327                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30328                                  
 30329                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 30330                                  
 30331                                  shrinkMCB:
 30332                                  	;pushreg <bx, cx, es>
 30333                                  	push	bx
 30334                                  	push	cx
 30335                                  	push	es
 30336                                  
 30337                                  	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 30338                                  	mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 30339                                  
 30340                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30341                                  	sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 30342                                  	;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 30343                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 30344                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30345                                  	cmp	cx,bx
 30346                                  	jb	short smE ; (*)
 30347                                  
 30348                                  	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30349                                  	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30350                                  
 30351                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 30352                                  	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 30353                                  
 30354                                  	add	ax,bx
 30355                                  	inc	ax
 30356                                  	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 30357                                  
 30358                                  	mov	ax,cx
 30359                                  	sub	ax,bx
 30360                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30361                                  	; ax > 0
 30362                                  	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 30363                                  
 30364                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30365                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 30366                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 30367                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 30368                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30369                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 30370                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 30371                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 30372                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 30373                                  
 30374                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30375                                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 30376                                  
 30377                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30378                                  	; cf=0
 30379                                  	;clc
 30380                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30381                                  	;jmp	short smX
 30382                                  smE:	
 30383                                  	; 18/12/2022
 30384                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 30385                                  	;stc
 30386                                  smX:	
 30387                                  	;popreg	<es, cx, bx>
 30388                                  	pop	es
 30389                                  	pop	cx
 30390                                  	pop	bx
 30391                                  	retn
 30392                                  
 30393                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30394                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 30395                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30396                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 30397                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 30398                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30399                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 30400                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30401                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 30402                                  ;
 30403                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 30404                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 30405                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 30406                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 30407                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 30408                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 30409                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 30410                                  ;       Endif
 30411                                  ;    Endif
 30412                                  ; Endif
 30413                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 30414                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 30415                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 30416                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 30417                                  ;    ENDIF
 30418                                  ; ENDIF
 30419                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30420                                  
 30421                                  _hideUMB_:
 30422                                  	push	bx
 30423                                  	push	dx
 30424                                  	push	es
 30425                                  
 30426                                  	mov	al,cl
 30427                                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 30428                                  	jz	short hu_20
 30429                                  
 30430                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 30431                                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 30432                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 30433                                  
 30434                                  	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 30435                                  	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 30436                                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 30437                                  	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 30438                                  
 30439                                  	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 30440                                  	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 30441                                  
 30442                                  	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 30443                                  	jbe	short hu_10
 30444                                  
 30445                                  	mov	al,cl		;   Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 30446                                  	call	unMarkUMB
 30447                                  	jmp	short hu_20
 30448                                  hu_10:	
 30449                                  	call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 30450                                  	jz	short hu_20
 30451                                  
 30452                                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 30453                                  	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 30454                                  
 30455                                  	mov	dx,es
 30456                                  	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 30457                                  
 30458                                  hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 30459                                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 30460                                  	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 30461                                  
 30462                                  	xor	dx,dx
 30463                                  hu_30:	
 30464                                  	mov	al,cl
 30465                                  
 30466                                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 30467                                  
 30468                                  	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 30469                                  	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 30470                                  
 30471                                  	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 30472                                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 30473                                  hu_X:	
 30474                                  	pop	es
 30475                                  	pop	dx
 30476                                  	pop	bx
 30477                                  	retn
 30478                                  
 30479                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30480                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 30481                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30482                                  ; Entry:  None
 30483                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 30484                                  ; Error:  None
 30485                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 30486                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30487                                  
 30488                                  UnFreeze:
 30489                                  	push	ax
 30490                                  	push	es
 30491                                  
 30492                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 30493                                  	jc	short ufX
 30494                                  
 30495                                  	mov	es,ax
 30496                                  
 30497                                  ; ------------------------------
 30498                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 30499                                  ; ------------------------------
 30500                                  
 30501                                  uf10:	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 30502                                  	jnz	short uf20
 30503                                  	call	unHideMCB
 30504                                  uf20:	
 30505                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30506                                  
 30507                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30508                                  	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30509                                  
 30510                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30511                                  	mov     ax,es
 30512                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30513                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30514                                  	inc     ax
 30515                                  	mov     es,ax
 30516                                  
 30517                                  	jmp	short uf10
 30518                                  ufX:	
 30519                                  	pop	es
 30520                                  	pop	ax
 30521                                  	retn
 30522                                  
 30523                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30524                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 30525                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30526                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30527                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 30528                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30529                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30530                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30531                                  
 30532                                  isFrozMCB:
 30533                                  	;push	ax
 30534                                  
 30535                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 30536                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 30537                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 30538                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30539                                  
 30540                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 30541                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 30542                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 30543                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30544                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 30545                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 30546                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 30547                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30548                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 30549                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 30550                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30551                                  	jne	short ifmX
 30552                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 30553                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30554                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30555                                  ifmX:	
 30556                                  	;pop	ax
 30557                                  	retn
 30558                                  
 30559                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30560                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 30561                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30562                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30563                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 30564                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30565                                  ; USES:     None
 30566                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30567                                  
 30568                                  frezMCB:
 30569                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; 8
 30570                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 30571                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 30572                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30573                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30574                                  	retn
 30575                                  
 30576                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30577                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 30578                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30579                                  ; Entry:  None
 30580                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 30581                                  ; Error:  None
 30582                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 30583                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30584                                  
 30585                                  FreezeUM:
 30586                                  	push	ax
 30587                                  	push	cx
 30588                                  	push	dx
 30589                                  	push	es
 30590                                  
 30591                                  	;call	GetLoadUMB
 30592                                  	mov	al,[cs:UmbLoad] ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30593                                  
 30594                                  	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30595                                  	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 30596                                  
 30597                                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30598                                  	mov	es,ax
 30599                                  	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30600                                  
 30601                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 30602                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 30603                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 30604                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 30605                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 30606                                  
 30607                                  fum10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30608                                  	jnz	short fum20
 30609                                  
 30610                                  	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 30611                                  fum20:	
 30612                                  	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 30613                                  	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 30614                                  
 30615                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 30616                                  	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30617                                  	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 30618                                  
 30619                                  	call	frezMCB
 30620                                  fum30:	
 30621                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30622                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30623                                  	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30624                                  
 30625                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 30626                                  	mov     ax,es
 30627                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30628                                  	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30629                                  	inc     ax
 30630                                  	mov     es,ax
 30631                                  	
 30632                                  	jmp	short fum10
 30633                                  
 30634                                  fumX:	pop	es
 30635                                  	pop	dx
 30636                                  	pop	cx
 30637                                  	pop	ax
 30638                                  	retn
 30639                                  
 30640                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30641                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 30642                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30643                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30644                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 30645                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30646                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)
 30647                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30648                                  
 30649                                  UmbTest:
 30650                                  	push	ax
 30651                                  	push	bx
 30652                                  	push	ds
 30653                                  	push	es
 30654                                  
 30655                                  	call	fm_link			; Link in UMBs (if not already linked)
