 30656                                  	call	WalkMem			; Check to see if they're really linked
 30657                                  	pushf				; And remember what we found out
 30658                                  	call	fm_unlink		; Unlink UMBs (if WE have linked 'em)
 30659                                  	popf				; And restore what we found out.
 30660                                  
 30661                                  	pop	es
 30662                                  	pop	ds
 30663                                  	pop	bx
 30664                                  	pop	ax
 30665                                  	retn
 30666                                  
 30667                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30668                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 30669                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30670                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30671                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 30672                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30673                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30674                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30675                                  
 30676                                  WalkMem:
 30677                                  	push	ax ; ?
 30678                                  	push	bx ; ?
 30679                                  	push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 30680                                  		   	
 30681                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 30682                                  	int	21h
 30683                                  
 30684                                  	mov	ax,[es:bx-2]
 30685                                  	mov	es,ax
 30686                                  
 30687                                  ; ------------------------------
 30688                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 30689                                  ; ------------------------------
 30690                                  
 30691                                  um10:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30692                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ;  'Z'
 30693                                  	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 30694                                  
 30695                                  	;NextMCB es, bx			; Move to the next MCB
 30696                                  
 30697                                  	mov     bx,es
 30698                                  	;add	bx,[es:3]
 30699                                  	add     bx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30700                                  	inc     bx
 30701                                  	mov     es,bx
 30702                                  		
 30703                                  	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 30704                                  um20:	
 30705                                  	mov	ax,es
 30706                                  
 30707                                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF iff ax < 9FFF.
 30708                                  
 30709                                  	pop	es ; ?
 30710                                  	pop	bx ; ?
 30711                                  	pop	ax ; ?
 30712                                  	retn
 30713                                  
 30714                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30715                                  ;*** hl_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0; restores strategy too
 30716                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30717                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 30718                                  ; EXIT:     None
 30719                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30720                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 30721                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30722                                  
 30723                                  hl_unlink:
 30724                                  	xor	bh,bh
 30725                                  
 30726                                  	;getdata bl,fm_umb		; Restore original link-state
 30727                                  	;
 30728                                  	;push	ds
 30729                                  	;push	cs
 30730                                  	;pop	ds
 30731                                  	;mov	bl,[fm_umb]
 30732                                  	;pop	ds
 30733                                  
 30734                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]
 30735                                  
 30736                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30737                                  	int	21h
 30738                                  	retn
 30739                                  
 30740                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30741                                  ; HIGHEXIT.INC (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 30742                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30743                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30744                                  
 30745                                  ;   Module:   HIGHEXIT.INC - Code executed after LoadHigh or DeviceHigh
 30746                                  ;   Date:     May 14, 1992
 30747                                  
 30748                                  ;   Modification log:
 30749                                  ;
 30750                                  ;     DATE    WHO      DESCRIPTION
 30751                                  ;   --------  -------  --------------------------------------------------------
 30752                                  ;   05/14/92  t-richj  Original
 30753                                  ;   06/21/92  t-richj  Final revisions before check-in
 30754                                  
 30755                                  UMB_HeadIdx	equ	8Ch	; Offset from ES (after func52h) to get UMBHead
 30756                                  
 30757                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30758                                  ;*** UnHideUMBs - Marks HIDDEN elements as FREE
 30759                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30760                                  ; ENTRY:  None; perhaps, earlier, HideUMBs was called... if not, we have
 30761                                  ;               very little to do, as no elelments will be marked as HIDDEN.
 30762                                  ; EXIT:   Sets InHigh to zero; carry clear if HideUMBs was called earlier.
 30763                                  ; ERROR:  None
 30764                                  ; USES:   fInHigh (from highvar.inc), carry flag
 30765                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30766                                  
 30767                                  UnHideUMBs:
 30768                                  	push	ax		; Save ax for what we're about to do
 30769                                  
 30770                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30771                                  ; BUGBUG t-richj 11-8-92: The following six lines were commented out for a good
 30772                                  ;    length of time. Those six constitute a check of whether or not we should
 30773                                  ;    indeed clean up the upper-memory chain; without such a check, COMMAND.COM
 30774                                  ;    will destroy the current link-state and memory-allocation strategy after
 30775                                  ;    every command execution.
 30776                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30777                                  
 30778                                  	;getdata al,fInHigh	; Get InHigh from data segment
 30779                                  	;
 30780                                  	;push	ds
 30781                                  	;push	cs
 30782                                  	;pop	ds
 30783                                  	;mov	al,[fInHigh]
 30784                                  	;pop	ds	
 30785                                  
 30786                                  	mov	al,[cs:fInHigh]
 30787                                  
 30788                                  	or	al,al
 30789                                  	jnz	short uhu10	; If didn't call loadhigh/devicehigh earlier,
 30790                                  
 30791                                  	pop	ax		; then there's nothing to do here... so
 30792                                  	stc			; restore everything and return. Just like
 30793                                  	retn			; that.
 30794                                  uhu10:	
 30795                                  	call	linkumb		; Make sure UMBs are linked in.
 30796                                  	call	FreeUMBs
 30797                                  
 30798                                  	;putdata fInHigh,0	; We're leaving, so update fInHigh.
 30799                                  	;
 30800                                  	;push	es
 30801                                  	;push	cs
 30802                                  	;pop	es
 30803                                  	;mov	byte [es:fInHigh],0
 30804                                  	;pop	ds	
 30805                                  
 30806                                  	mov	byte [cs:fInHigh],0	
 30807                                  
 30808                                  	call	he_unlink	; Unlink UMBs
 30809                                  
 30810                                  	pop	ax
 30811                                  	; 12/12/2022
 30812                                  	;clc	; 12/12/2022 (this clc may not be necessary!?)
 30813                                  	retn
 30814                                  
 30815                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30816                                  ;*** he_unlink - unlinks UMBs if fm_umb is set to 0
 30817                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30818                                  ; ENTRY:    fm_umb == 1 : leave linked, else unlink
 30819                                  ; EXIT:     None
 30820                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30821                                  ; USES:     AX, BX
 30822                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30823                                  
 30824                                  he_unlink:
 30825                                  	xor	bh, bh
 30826                                  
 30827                                  	;getdata bl, fm_umb	; Restore original link-state
 30828                                  	mov	bl,[cs:fm_umb]	
 30829                                  
 30830                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30831                                  	int	21h
 30832                                  	retn
 30833                                  
 30834                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30835                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 30836                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30837                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30838                                  ; EXIT:     None; HIDDEN memory elements returned to FREE
 30839                                  ; ERROR:    None (ignore CF)
 30840                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30841                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30842                                  
 30843                                  FreeUMBs:
 30844                                  	push	ax
 30845                                  	push	es
 30846                                  
 30847                                  	call	HeadUmb		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 30848                                  	jc	short fusX
 30849                                  
 30850                                  	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 30851                                  fus10:	
 30852                                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30853                                  	jnz	short fus20
 30854                                  	call	freeMCB
 30855                                  fus20:	   
 30856                                  	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30857                                  	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30858                                  	jz	short fusX	; That means this was the last MCB--that's it.
 30859                                  
 30860                                  	mov	ax,es
 30861                                  	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30862                                  	inc	ax
 30863                                  	mov	es,ax		; Go on forward.
 30864                                  
 30865                                  	jmp	short fus10
 30866                                  fusX:	
 30867                                  	pop	es
 30868                                  	pop	ax
 30869                                  	retn
 30870                                  
 30871                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30872                                  ;*** isHideMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is HIDDEN
 30873                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30874                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30875                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF
 30876                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30877                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30878                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30879                                  
 30880                                  isHideMCB:
 30881                                  	;push	ax
 30882                                  
 30883                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner ; If the owner's SYSTEM
 30884                                  	jne	short ihm_x				; then check for HIDDEN
 30885                                  
 30886                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]
 30887                                  	;cmp	ax,'HI' ; 4948h
 30888                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 30889                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 30890                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 30891                                  	;cmp	ax,'DD' ; 4444h
 30892                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 30893                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 30894                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 30895                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 30896                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 30897                                  	jne	short ihm_x
 30898                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 30899                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 30900                                  	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 30901                                  ihm_x:	
 30902                                  	;pop	ax
 30903                                  	retn
 30904                                  
 30905                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30906                                  ;*** freeMCB - marks as free the MCB at ES:0
 30907                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30908                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 30909                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB free'd
 30910                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30911                                  ; USES:     AX
 30912                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30913                                  
 30914                                  freeMCB:
 30915                                  	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30916                                  	mov	ax,'  '
 30917                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax
 30918                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax
 30919                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax
 30920                                  	mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax
 30921                                  	retn
 30922                                  
 30923                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30924                                  ;*** HeadUmb - returns in AX the address of the first UMB block (0x9FFF)
 30925                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30926                                  ; ENTRY:  Nothing
 30927                                  ; EXIT:   AX contains 0x9FFF for most systems
 30928                                  ; ERROR:  Carry set if pointer is 0xFFFF (if not set up yet--DH runs into this)
 30929                                  ; USES:   Flags, AX
 30930                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30931                                  
 30932                                  HeadUmb:
 30933                                  	; 13/05/2019
 30934                                  
 30935                                  	;push	si ; ?
 30936                                  	;push	ds ; ?
 30937                                  	;push	es
 30938                                  	;push	bx ; *
 30939                                  
 30940                                  	; 09/04/2019
 30941                                  	; !!! No need to save es,bx,ds,si above !!! (es,bx are changed here)
 30942                                  
 30943                                  	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 30944                                  	int	21h
 30945                                  			; DOS - 2+ internal - GET LIST OF LISTS
 30946                                  			; Return: ES:BX -> DOS list of lists
 30947                                  	;mov	ax,[es:8Ch]
 30948                                  	mov	ax,[es:UMB_HeadIdx]	; And read what's in ES:008C
 30949                                  	cmp	ax,0FFFFh
 30950                                  	;je	short xhu_e		; If it's 0xFFFF, it's an error...
 30951                                  
 30952                                  	;clc				; Else, it isn't.
 30953                                  	;jmp	short xhu_x
 30954                                  xhu_e:	
 30955                                  	;stc
 30956                                  	cmc	; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0 ; *
 30957                                  xhu_x:	
 30958                                  	;pop	bx ; *
 30959                                  	;pop	es	
 30960                                  	;pop	ds ; ?
 30961                                  	;pop	si ; ?
 30962                                  	retn
 30963                                  
 30964                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30965                                  ;*** linkumb - links UMBs not already linked in; updates fm_umb as needed
 30966                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30967                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 30968                                  ; EXIT:     fm_umb == 0 if not linked in previously, 1 if already linked in
 30969                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30970                                  ; USES:     AX, BX, fm_umb
 30971                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30972                                  
 30973                                  linkumb:
 30974                                  	mov	ax,DOS_GET_UMBLINK ; 5802h
 30975                                  	int	21h			; Current link-state is now in al
 30976                                  
 30977                                  	or	al,al			; BUGBUG: proper check?
 30978                                  	jnz	short lumbX		; Jumps if UMBs already linked in
 30979                                  
 30980                                  	mov	ax,DOS_SET_UMBLINK ; 5803h
 30981                                  	mov	bx,1
 30982                                  	int	21h
 30983                                  lumbX:
 30984                                  	retn
 30985                                  
 30986                                  %endif
 30987                                  
 30988                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 30989                                  ; (SYSINIT:2B5Fh)
 30990                                  
 30991                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30992                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 30993                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 30994                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 30995                                  
 30996                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30997                                  ;
 30998                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 30999                                  ;
 31000                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 31001                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 31002                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 31003                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 31004                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 31005                                  ;
 31006                                  ;	Output : none
 31007                                  ;
 31008                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 31009                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 31010                                  ;
 31011                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31012                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 31013                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 31014                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 31015                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 31016                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31017                                  
 31018                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31019                                  InitDevLoad:
 31020                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31021                                  	; ds = cs
 31022 00002818 803E[071F]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31023                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 31024                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 31025 0000281D 741F                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 31026                                  
 31027                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31028                                  ;	cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 31029                                  ;	je	short InitForConv
 31030                                  ;
 31031                                  ;; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 31032                                  ;; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 31033                                  ;; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 31034                                  ;; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 31035                                  ;; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 31036                                  ;; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 31037                                  ;
 31038                                  ;	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 31039                                  ;
 31040                                  ;	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 31041                                  ;	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 31042                                  ;	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 31043                                  ;	pushf
 31044                                  ;	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 31045                                  ;	popf
 31046                                  ;
 31047                                  ;	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 31048                                  ;
 31049                                  ;	jmp	short InitForHi
 31050                                  
 31051                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31052                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 31053                                  InitForConv:
 31054                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31055                                  	; ds = cs
 31056 0000281F E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 31057                                  					;  current UMB ?
 31058 00002822 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 31059 00002824 E84F04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 31060 00002827 E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 31061 0000282A 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 31062                                  					;  in low memory
 31063                                  InitForHi:
 31064                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31065                                  	; ds = cs
 31066                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 31067                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 31068                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 31069 0000282C A1[FD1E]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 31070 0000282F 8B16[F91E]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 31071 00002833 0316[FB1E]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 31072 00002837 EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 31073                                  
 31074                                  InitForLo:
 31075                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31076                                  	; ds = cs
 31077                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 31078 00002839 C606[071F]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31079                                  initforlo_x:
 31080                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31081                                  	; ds = cs
 31082                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 31083                                  					;  we are loading low
 31084                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 31085                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 31086 0000283E A1[E003]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 31087 00002841 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 31088                                  idl1:
 31089 00002845 E86C00                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 31090                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31091                                  	; ds = cs
 31092                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 31093                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 31094                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 31095                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 31096 00002848 A3[EC1E]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 31097 0000284B 8916[EE1E]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 31098 0000284F C706[F01E]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 31099 00002855 A3[F21E]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 31100 00002858 C3                      	retn
 31101                                  
 31102                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31103                                  ;
 31104                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 31105                                  ;

 31163                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31164                                  ;
 31165                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 31166                                  ;
 31167                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 31168                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 31169                                  ;		 the device.
 31170                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 31171                                  ;
 31172                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 31173                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 31174                                  ;	UMB.
 31175                                  ;
 31176                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 31177                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 31178                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 31179                                  ;
 31180                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31181                                  
 31182                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31183                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 31184

 31186                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31187                                  	; ds = cs
 31188 0000286F BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 31189 00002872 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31190 00002875 CD21                    	int	21h
 31191                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 31192                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 31193                                  
 31194 00002877 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31195 00002879 742C                    	jz	short gufd_err
 31196                                  
 31197 0000287B 4B                      	dec	bx
 31198                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31199                                  	; ds = cs
 31200 0000287C 391E[EA1E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 31201                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 31202 00002880 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 31203 00002882 43                      	inc	bx
 31204                                  
 31205 00002883 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31206 00002886 CD21                    	int	21h
 31207 00002888 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 31208                                  
 31209                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31210                                  	;dec	ax
 31211                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 31212                                  	;
 31213                                  PrepareMark:
 31214 0000288A 1E                      	push	ds
 31215 0000288B 48                      	dec	ax
 31216 0000288C 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 31217 0000288E C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31218 00002894 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31219 0000289A 40                      	inc	ax
 31220 0000289B 1F                      	pop	ds
 31221                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31222                                  	; ds = cs
 31223                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31224                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31225                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31226 0000289C 891E[FB1E]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 31227 000028A0 A3[F91E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31228 000028A3 A3[FD1E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31229                                  	;
 31230                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31231                                  	; cf=0
 31232                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 31233 000028A6 C3                      	retn
 31234                                  gufd_err:
 31235 000028A7 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 31236                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31237                                  	; ds = cs
 31238                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 31239                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31240                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax

 31242 000028AC A3[F91E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31243 000028AF A3[FD1E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31244 000028B2 F9                      	stc
 31245 000028B3 C3                      	retn

 31248                                  ;
 31249                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 31250                                  ;
 31251                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 31252                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 31253                                  ;
 31254                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 31255                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 31256                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 31257                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 31258                                  ;
 31259                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 31260                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 31261                                  ;
 31262                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31263                                  
 31264                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31265                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 31266                                  
 31267                                  DevSetMark:
 31268 000028B4 06                      	push	es

 31270 000028B6 1E                      	push	ds
 31271 000028B7 56                      	push	si

 31273 000028BA 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 31274 000028C0 40                      	inc	ax
 31275 000028C1 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 31276                                  
 31277                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 31278                                  
 31279 000028C5 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 31280 000028C6 2EC536[F803]            	lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 31281                                  
 31282 000028CB 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31283 000028CD FC                      	cld
 31284                                  dsm_again:
 31285 000028CE AC                      	lodsb
 31286 000028CF 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 31287 000028D1 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 31288 000028D3 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31289 000028D5 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31290                                  isit_slash:
 31291 000028D7 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 31292 000028D9 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 31293 000028DB 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31294 000028DD EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31295                                  isit_null:
 31296 000028DF 08C0                    	or	al,al
 31297 000028E1 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 31298 000028E3 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 31299                                  
 31300 000028E5 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 31301 000028E8 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 31302                                  dsm_next_char:
 31303 000028EB AC                      	lodsb
 31304 000028EC 08C0                    	or	al, al
 31305 000028EE 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 31306 000028F0 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 31307 000028F2 7403                    	je	short blankout
 31308 000028F4 AA                      	stosb

 31310                                  blankout:

 31313 000028FB F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 31314                                  dsm_exit:

 31317 000028FF 1F                      	pop	ds
 31318 00002900 5F                      	pop	di
 31319 00002901 07                      	pop	es
 31320 00002902 C3                      	retn

 31324                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 31325                                  ;
 31326                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 31327                                  ;
 31328                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 31329                                  ;
 31330                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 31331                                  ;	in DevSize
 31332                                  ;
 31333                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31334                                  
 31335                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31336                                  SizeDevice:
 31337                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31338                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 31339 00002903 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 31340 00002904 06                      	push	es
 31341 00002905 1F                      	pop	ds
 31342 00002906 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 31343 00002908 B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 31344 0000290B CD21                    	int	21h
 31345 0000290D 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 31346                                  
 31347 0000290F 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 31348 00002911 B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 31349 00002914 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 31350 00002916 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 31351 00002918 CD21                    	int	21h
 31352 0000291A 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 31353 0000291C 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 31354 0000291F 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31355 00002922 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 31356 00002926 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 31357 00002928 2EC706[EA1E]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 31358                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 31359 0000292F EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 31360                                  szdev1:
 31361 00002931 B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 31362 00002933 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 31363 00002935 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 31364 00002937 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 31365 00002939 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 31366                                  	;
 31367                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31368 0000293B 2E3B06[081F]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31369                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 31370                                  	; 14/08/2023
 31371 00002940 7305                    	jnb	short szdev2
 31372 00002942 2EA1[081F]              	mov     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31373                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31374 00002946 F8                      	clc
 31375                                  szdev2:
 31376 00002947 2EA3[EA1E]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size
 31377                                  
 31378                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31379                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31380                                  	; cf=0
 31381                                  	;clc
 31382                                  sd_close:

 31384                                  					;  carry flag
 31385 0000294C B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 31386 0000294F CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 31387 00002951 9D                      	popf
 31388                                  sd_err:
 31389                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31390                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 31391 00002952 1F                      	pop     ds ; *
 31392 00002953 C3                      	retn

 31702                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31703                                  ;
 31704                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 31705                                  ;
 31706                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 31707                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 31708                                  ;
 31709                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 31710                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 31711                                  ;
 31712                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 31713                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 31714                                  ;
 31715                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31716                                  
 31717                                  ; 13/05/2019
 31718                                  
 31719                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31720                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 31721                                  GetHexNum:
 31722 00002A37 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 31723 00002A39 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 31724                                  ghn_next:
 31725 00002A3B 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 31726 00002A3E 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 31727 00002A41 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 31728 00002A43 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 31729 00002A46 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 31730 00002A48 50                      	push	ax
 31731 00002A49 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 31732 00002A4B E83706                  	call	delim
 31733 00002A4E 58                      	pop	ax
 31734                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31735 00002A4F B90400                  	mov	cx, 4
 31736 00002A52 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 31737 00002A54 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 31738                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 31739                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31740 00002A57 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 31741                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31742                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31743                                  ghn_shift1:
 31744 00002A59 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 31745 00002A5B D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 31746 00002A5D E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 31747 00002A5F 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 31748 00002A61 46                      	inc	si
 31749 00002A62 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 31750                                  ghn_into_paras:
 31751 00002A64 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 31752 00002A67 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31753 00002A6A F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 31754 00002A6E 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 31755                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31756                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31757                                  ghn_shift2:
 31758 00002A70 F8                      	clc
 31759 00002A71 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 31760 00002A73 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 31761 00002A75 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 31762 00002A77 F8                      	clc
 31763 00002A78 C3                      	retn
 31764                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31765                                  ghn_err:
 31766                                  gnib_err:
 31767 00002A79 F9                      	stc
 31768                                  ghn_ret:
 31769                                  gnib_ret:
 31770 00002A7A C3                      	retn

 31779                                  ;

 31892                                  ;
 31893                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 31894                                  ;
 31895                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 31896                                  ;
 31897                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 31898                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 31899                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 31900                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block

 31903                                  ;				CY
 31904                                  ;

 31906                                  ;

 31910                                  	; 31/12/2022

 31915                                  					;   possible

 31929

 31931 00002AEF 7502                    	jne	short ua_err		; N: error

 31934                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31935                                  	; cf=0
 31936                                  	;clc 
 31937                                  ua_done:
 31938 00002AF1 58                      	pop	ax

 31944                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31945                                  ;
 31946                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 31947                                  ;
 31948                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 31949                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 31950                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 31951                                  ;			; DS = data
 31952                                  ;
 31953                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 31954                                  ;
 31955                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 31956                                  ;
 31957                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31958                                  
 31959                                  umb_insert:
 31960 00002AF6 1E                      	push	ds
 31961                                  
 31962                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31963                                  	; ds = cs
 31964                                  
 31965                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 31966 00002AF7 8E1E[161F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 31967                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 31968 00002AFB 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 31969 00002AFF 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 31970 00002B01 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31971                                  ui_next:
 31972 00002B03 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 31973                                  					;    new block
 31974 00002B05 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 31975                                  					; Q: is current block the
 31976                                  					;    last
 31977 00002B07 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31978 00002B0D 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 31979                                  					; N: get next block
 31980 00002B0F 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 31981                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 31982 00002B11 E8E200                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31983 00002B14 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 31984                                  
 31985                                  ui_insert:
 31986 00002B16 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 31987 00002B18 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 31988                                  
 31989 00002B19 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 31990 00002B1B F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 31991                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 31992 00002B1D C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 31993                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 31994 00002B22 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 31995                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 31996 00002B28 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 31997                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 31998 00002B2C C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 31999                                  
 32000                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32001                                  
 32002 00002B32 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32003 00002B34 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32004 00002B3A 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 32005                                  					; mark as free
 32006 00002B41 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 32007                                  					; start & end of new block
 32008 00002B44 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 32009                                  
 32010                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 32011

 32013 00002B4B 43                      	inc	bx
 32014 00002B4C 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 32015 00002B4E 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 32016                                  
 32017                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 32018                                  					; this block
 32019 00002B4F 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 32020                                  	
 32021 00002B51 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32022 00002B57 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32023 00002B5E 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32024 00002B62 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32025                                  
 32026 00002B69 EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 32027                                  
 32028                                  ui_append:
 32029                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 32030 00002B6B 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 32031 00002B70 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 32032                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 32033                                  					; block for the next arena.
 32034                                  	; 13/05/2019
 32035 00002B76 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32036                                  
 32037 00002B7C 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 32038 00002B7E 40                      	inc	ax
 32039 00002B7F 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 32040                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 32041 00002B81 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32042                                  
 32043 00002B83 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 32044                                  
 32045 00002B85 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32046 00002B8B 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32047 00002B92 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32048 00002B96 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 32049                                  
 32050                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32051 00002B9D 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32052 00002B9F 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32053 00002BA5 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 32054                                  					; mark as free
 32055 00002BAC 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32056 00002BAD 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32057                                  ui_done:
 32058                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 32059 00002BB2 1F                      	pop	ds
 32060                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32061                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 32062 00002BB3 C3                      	retn

 32064                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32065                                  
 32066                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32067                                  ;
 32068                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 32069                                  ;
 32070                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 32071                                  ;	iff it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 32072                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 32073                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 32074                                  ;
 32075                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 32076                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 32077                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 32078                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 32079                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 32080                                  ;
 32081                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32082                                  
 32083                                  umb_coalesce:
 32084                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32085                                  	; ds = cs
 32086 00002BB4 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 32087                                  
 32088 00002BB5 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 32089                                  
 32090                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32091                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32092 00002BB7 8E06[161F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32093 00002BBB 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 32094                                  uc_nextfree:
 32095 00002BC0 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32096 00002BC2 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32097                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 32098 00002BC4 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 32099 00002BC9 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 32100                                  					; N: get next arena
 32101 00002BCB E82100                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 32102 00002BCE 72E2                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32103 00002BD0 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 32104                                  uc_again:
 32105 00002BD2 E81A00                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 32106 00002BD5 72DB                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32107                                  uc_check:
 32108 00002BD7 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 32109 00002BDC 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 32110                                  					; Y: coalesce
 32111 00002BDE 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 32112 00002BE3 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 32113                                  	;add	[3],cx
 32114 00002BE4 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 32115 00002BE8 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 32116 00002BEB 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 32117 00002BED EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 32118                                  
 32119                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32120                                  ;uc_done:

 32134                                  get_next:
 32135 00002BEF 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'

 32155                                  ;
 32156                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 32157                                  ;
 32158                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32159                                  
 32160                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32161                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 32162                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 32163                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32164                                  	; ds = cs
 32165 00002C02 E8D3FE                  	call	umb_allocate
 32166 00002C05 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32167                                  
 32168                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 32169                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 32170                                  
 32171                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32172                                  	; ds = cs
 32173                                  
 32174 00002C07 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 32175 00002C09 B106                    	mov	cl,6
 32176 00002C0B D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 32177                                  
 32178 00002C0D 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 32179 00002C0F 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 32180                                  
 32181 00002C11 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32182                                  
 32183 00002C13 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 32184 00002C16 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 32185                                  	
 32186 00002C18 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32187 00002C1E 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32188                                  					
 32189 00002C25 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32190 00002C29 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32191                                  
 32192                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 32193                                  
 32194 00002C30 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 32195 00002C32 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32196 00002C38 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 32197                                  					; mark as free 
 32198 00002C3F 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32199 00002C40 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32200                                  
 32201                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32202                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32203 00002C45 8E06[161F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 32204 00002C49 BF8C00                  	mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 32205 00002C4C 26890D                  	mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 32206                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 32207                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 32208                                  
 32209                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 32210                                  
 32211 00002C4F BF2400                  	mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 32212 00002C52 268E05                  	mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 32213 00002C55 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 32214                                  ;scan_next
 32215                                  ; 09/12/2022
 32216                                  scannext:
 32217 00002C57 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 32218 00002C5B 740C                    	je	short got_last
 32219

 32221 00002C5F 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32222 00002C64 40                      	inc	ax
 32223 00002C65 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32224                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 32225                                  	; 09/12/2022
 32226 00002C67 EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 32227                                  got_last:
 32228 00002C69 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 32229 00002C6F 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32230                                  	;clc
 32231                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32232                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32233                                  	; cf=0
 32234                                  	;clc
 32235 00002C75 C3                      	retn
 32236                                  
 32237                                  ; 11/12/2022
 32238                                  ;;lfu_err:
 32239                                  ;	;stc
 32240                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32241                                  ;	; 11/12/2022

 32243                                  ;	;stc
 32244                                  ;	retn

 32247                                  ;
 32248                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 32249                                  ;
 32250                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 32251                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 32252                                  ;
 32253                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32254                                  
 32255                                  ShrinkUMB:
 32256                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32257                                  	; ds = cs
 32258 00002C76 833E[F91E]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 32259                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 32260 00002C7B 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 32261 00002C7D 06                      	push	es
 32262 00002C7E 53                      	push	bx
 32263                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32264                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 32265                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32266                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32267 00002C7F 8B1E[FD1E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 32268 00002C83 2B1E[F91E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32269 00002C87 8E06[F91E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 32270                                  	
 32271 00002C8B B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 32272 00002C8E CD21                    	int	21h
 32273                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 32274                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 32275                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 32276 00002C90 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32277 00002C92 48                      	dec	ax
 32278 00002C93 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32279 00002C95 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 32280 00002C9C 5B                      	pop	bx
 32281 00002C9D 07                      	pop	es
 32282                                  su_exit:

 32300                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 32301 00002CA6 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 32302                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32303 00002CA8 8E06[161F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32304                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 32305 00002CAC 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 32306 00002CB1 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 32307                                  ulu_next:
 32308 00002CB6 E836FF                  	call	get_next
 32309 00002CB9 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 32310 00002CBB 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 32311 00002CBD 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 32312 00002CBF 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32313 00002CC1 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 32314                                  ulu_found:
 32315                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 32316 00002CC3 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32317                                  ulu_x:

 32319 00002CC9 1F                      	pop	ds

 32322                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32323                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 32324                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32325                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32326                                  
 32327                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 32328                                  ;
 32329                                  ; Summary:
 32330                                  ;
 32331                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 32332                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 32333                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 32334                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 32335                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 32336                                  ;
 32337                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 32338                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 32339                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 32340                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 32341                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 32342                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 32343                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 32344                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 32345                                  ;
 32346                                  ; Example:
 32347                                  ;
 32348                                  ;   [menu]
 32349                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 32350                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 32351                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 32352                                  ;
 32353                                  ;   [network]
 32354                                  ;   include misc
 32355                                  ;   device=foo
 32356                                  ;
 32357                                  ;   [misc]
 32358                                  ;   device=bar
 32359                                  ;   include alternate
 32360                                  ;
 32361                                  ;   [alternate]
 32362                                  ;   device=tar
 32363                                  ;
 32364                                  ;
 32365                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 32366                                  ;
 32367                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 32368                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 32369                                  ;
 32370                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 32371                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 32372                                  ;   following order:
 32373                                  ;
 32374                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 32375                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 32376                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 32377                                  ;
 32378                                  
 32379                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 32380                                  
 32381                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 32382                                  
 32383                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 32384                                  
 32385                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 32386                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 32387                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 32388                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 32389                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 32390                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 32391                                  
 32392                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32393                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32394                                  
 32395                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 32396                                  
 32397                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32398                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 32399                                  
 32400 00002CCB 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0

 32406                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in

 32411                                  setparms:

 32413 00002CCD 50                      	push	ax
 32414 00002CCE 53                      	push	bx
 32415 00002CCF 51                      	push	cx
 32416 00002CD0 52                      	push	dx
 32417                                  
 32418 00002CD1 0E                      	push	cs
 32419 00002CD2 1F                      	pop	ds
 32420                                  
 32421 00002CD3 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 32422 00002CD5 8A1E[0E37]              	mov	bl,[drive]
 32423                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32424 00002CD9 43                      	inc	bx
 32425                                  	;inc	bl			; get it correct for ioctl call
 32426                                  					; (1=a,2=b...)
 32427 00002CDA BA[E635]                	mov	dx,deviceparameters

 32429 00002CDF B00D                    	mov	al,GENERIC_IOCTL ; 0Dh
 32430 00002CE1 B508                    	mov	ch,RAWIO ; 8
 32431 00002CE3 B140                    	mov	cl,SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS ; 40h
 32432 00002CE5 CD21                    	int	21h
 32433                                  
 32434                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32435                                  ;
 32436                                  ;	;;mov	ax,Bios_Data		; get Bios_Data segment

 32442                                  ;	test	word [cs:switches],flagec35 ; 4

 32454 00002CF2 B87000                  	mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h

 32460 00002CFB 0806[3105]              	or	[ec35_flag],al		; set the bit in the permanent flags

 32466                                  ;;	sectors per track than any old ones.

 32499                                  	;mov	word [deviceparameters+2],0
 32500 00002D13 C706[E835]0000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],0
