 32509                                  
 32510                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32511                                  ;
 32512                                  ; procedure : parseline
 32513                                  ;
 32514                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 32515                                  ;
 32516                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32517                                  
 32518                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32519                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 32520                                  
 32521                                  parseline:
 32522                                  	push	ds
 32523                                  
 32524                                  	push	cs
 32525                                  	pop	ds
 32526                                  
 32527                                  nextswtch:
 32528                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 32529                                  	je	short done_line
 32530                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 32531                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 32532                                  
 32533                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 32534                                  
 32535                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 32536                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 32537                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 32538                                  	je	short getparm
 32539                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 32540                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 32541                                  
 32542                                  getparm:
 32543                                  	call	check_switch
 32544                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 32545                                  	jc	short swterr
 32546                                  getnext:
 32547                                  	call	getchr
 32548                                  	jc	short done_line
 32549                                  	jmp	short nextswtch
 32550                                  swterr:
 32551                                  	jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 32552                                  
 32553                                  done_line:
 32554                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32555                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 32556                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 32557                                  	jnz	short okay
 32558                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 32559                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 32560                                  
 32561                                  okay:
 32562                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 32563                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 32564                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 32565                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 32566                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 32567                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32568                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32569                                  	; cf=0
 32570                                  	;clc
 32571                                  	call	setdeviceparameters
 32572                                  exitpl:
 32573                                  	pop	ds
 32574                                  	retn
 32575                                  put_back:
 32576                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 32577                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 32578                                  	jmp	short done_line
 32579                                  
 32580                                  %endif
 32581                                  
 32582                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32583                                  ;
 32584                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 32585                                  ;
 32586                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 32587                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 32588                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 32589                                  ; error.
 32590                                  ;
 32591                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32592                                  
 32593                                  check_switch:
 32594 00002D21 E817FA                  	call	getchr
 32595                                  	;jc	short err_check
 32596 00002D24 724E                    	jc	short err_chk
 32597 00002D26 24DF                            and     al,0DFh                 ; convert it to upper case
 32598 00002D28 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 32599                                  	;jb	short err_check
 32600 00002D2A 7248                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32601 00002D2C 3C5A                    	cmp	al,'Z'
 32602 00002D2E 7743                    	ja	short err_check
 32603                                  
 32604 00002D30 06                      	push	es
 32605                                  
 32606 00002D31 0E                      	push	cs
 32607 00002D32 07                      	pop	es
 32608                                  
 32609 00002D33 8A0E[A237]              	mov	cl,[switchlist]		; get number of valid switches
 32610 00002D37 B500                    	mov	ch,0
 32611 00002D39 BF[A337]                	mov	di,1+switchlist		; point to string of valid switches
 32612 00002D3C F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 32613                                  
 32614 00002D3E 07                      	pop	es
 32615 00002D3F 7532                    	jnz	short err_check
 32616                                  
 32617 00002D41 B80100                  	mov	ax,1
 32618 00002D44 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; set bit to indicate switch
 32619 00002D46 8B1E[0F37]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far
 32620 00002D4A 09C3                    	or	bx,ax			; save this with other switches
 32621 00002D4C 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32622                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32623 00002D4E A8F8                    	test	al,switchnum ; 0F8h
 32624                                  	;test	ax,switchnum ; 0F8h	; test against switches that require number to follow
 32625 00002D50 741E                    	jz	short done_swtch
 32626                                  
 32627 00002D52 E8E6F9                  	call	getchr
 32628 00002D55 721A                    	jc	short err_swtch
 32629                                  
 32630 00002D57 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 32631 00002D59 7516                    	jne	short err_swtch
 32632                                  
 32633 00002D5B E8DDF9                  	call	getchr
 32634 00002D5E 53                      	push	bx			; preserve switches
 32635                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32636                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],' '	; allow space separators
 32637                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32638                                  	; ds = cs

 32640 00002D64 E8D803                  	call	getnum
 32641                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 32642                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32643 00002D67 C606[2A03]00            	mov	byte [sepchr],0
 32644 00002D6C 5B                      	pop	bx			; restore switches
 32645                                  
 32646                                  ; because getnum does not consider carriage-return or line-feed as ok, we do
 32647                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected
 32648                                  ; further on (hopefully).
 32649                                  
 32650 00002D6D E80500                  	call	process_num
 32651                                  
 32652                                  done_swtch:
 32653                                  	;clc
 32654                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32655                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32656                                  	; cf=0
 32657                                  	;clc
 32658 00002D70 C3                      	retn
 32659                                  
 32660                                  err_swtch:
 32661 00002D71 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 32662                                  err_check:
 32663 00002D73 F9                      	stc
 32664                                  err_chk:
 32665 00002D74 C3                      	retn

 32667                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32668                                  ;
 32669                                  ; procedure : process_num
 32670                                  ;
 32671                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 32672                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 32673                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 32674                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 32675                                  ;
 32676                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32677                                  
 32678                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32679                                  	; (SYSINIT:3156h)
 32680                                  process_num:
 32681 00002D75 850E[0F37]              	test	[switches],cx		; if this switch has been done before,
 32682 00002D79 752B                    	jnz	short done_ret		; ignore this one.
 32683                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32684 00002D7B F6C108                  	test	cl,flagdrive ; 8
 32685                                  	;test	cx,flagdrive ; 8
 32686 00002D7E 7404                    	jz	short try_f
 32687 00002D80 A2[0E37]                	mov	byte [drive],al
 32688                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32689                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 32690                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32691                                  	; cf=0
 32692 00002D83 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 32693                                  try_f:
 32694                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32695 00002D84 F6C180                  	test	cl,flagff ; 80h
 32696                                  	;test	cx,flagff ; 80h
 32697 00002D87 7404                    	jz	short try_t
 32698                                  
 32699                                  ; ensure that we do not get bogus form factors that are not supported
 32700                                  
 32701                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+1],al
 32702 00002D89 A2[E735]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],al
 32703                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32704                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 32705                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32706                                  	; cf=0
 32707 00002D8C C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 32708                                  try_t:
 32709 00002D8D 09C0                    	or	ax,ax
 32710 00002D8F 7415                    	jz	short done_ret		; if number entered was 0, assume default value
 32711                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32712 00002D91 F6C110                  	test	cl,flagcyln ; 10h
 32713                                  	;test	cx,flagcyln ; 10h
 32714 00002D94 7404                    	jz	short try_s
 32715                                  
 32716                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+4],ax
 32717 00002D96 A3[EA35]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],ax
 32718                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32719                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 32720                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32721                                  	; cf=0
 32722 00002D99 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 32723                                  try_s:
 32724                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32725 00002D9A F6C120                  	test	cl,flagseclim ; 20h
 32726                                  	;test	cx,flagseclim ; 20h
 32727 00002D9D 7404                    	jz	short try_h
 32728 00002D9F A3[0C37]                	mov	[slim],ax
 32729                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32730                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 32731                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32732                                  	; cf=0
 32733 00002DA2 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 32734                                  
 32735                                  ; must be for number of heads
 32736                                  
 32737                                  try_h:
 32738 00002DA3 A3[0A37]                	mov	[hlim],ax
 32739                                  done_ret:
 32740                                  	;clc
 32741                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32742                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32743                                  	; cf=0 (test instruction resets cf)
 32744                                  	;clc
 32745 00002DA6 C3                      	retn
 32746                                  
 32747                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32748                                  %if 1
 32749                                  
 32750                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 32752                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32753                                  ;
 32754                                  ; procedure : parseline
 32755                                  ;
 32756                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 32757                                  ;
 32758                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32759                                  
 32760                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32761                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 32762                                  parseline:
 32763                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32764                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 32765                                  
 32766                                  	;push	ds ; *
 32767                                  
 32768                                  	;push	cs ; *
 32769                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 32770                                  
 32771                                  nextswtch:
 32772 00002DA7 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 32773 00002DA9 741C                    	je	short done_line
 32774 00002DAB 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 32775 00002DAD 7421                    	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 32776                                  
 32777                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 32778                                  
 32779 00002DAF 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 32780 00002DB1 760F                    	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 32781 00002DB3 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'
 32782 00002DB5 7402                    	je	short getparm
 32783 00002DB7 F9                      	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 32784                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 32785                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32786                                  swterr:
 32787 00002DB8 C3                      	retn
 32788                                  
 32789                                  getparm:
 32790 00002DB9 E865FF                  	call	check_switch
 32791 00002DBC 891E[0F37]              	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 32792 00002DC0 72F6                    	jc	short swterr
 32793                                  getnext:
 32794 00002DC2 E876F9                  	call	getchr
 32795                                  	;jc	short done_line
 32796                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 32797                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32798 00002DC5 73E0                    	jnc	short nextswtch
 32799                                  ;swterr:
 32800                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 32801                                  
 32802                                  done_line:
 32803                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32804 00002DC7 F606[0F37]08            	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 32805                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 32806 00002DCC 750C                    	jnz	short okay
 32807 00002DCE F9                      	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 32808                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 32809                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32810 00002DCF C3                      	retn
 32811                                  
 32812                                  ;exitpl:
 32813                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32814                                  	; ds = cs
 32815                                  	;;pop	ds ; *
 32816                                  	;retn
 32817                                  
 32818                                  put_back:
 32819 00002DD0 FF06[D203]              	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 32820 00002DD4 FF0E[D603]              	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 32821 00002DD8 EBED                    	jmp	short done_line
 32822                                  
 32823                                  okay:
 32824 00002DDA A1[0F37]                	mov	ax,[switches]
 32825 00002DDD 83E003                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 32826 00002DE0 A3[E835]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 32827 00002DE3 C706[0C36]0000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 32828                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 32829                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32830                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32831                                  	; cf=0
 32832                                  	;clc
 32833                                  	;call	setdeviceparameters
 32834                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32835                                  	;jmp	short setdeviceparameters
 32836                                  
 32837                                  %endif

 32841                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32842                                  ;
 32843                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 32844                                  ;
 32845                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 32846                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 32847                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 32848                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 32849                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 32850                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 32851                                  ;
 32852                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 32853                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 32854                                  ;
 32855                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 32856                                  ;
 32857                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32858                                  
 32859                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32860                                  
 32861                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32862                                  setdeviceparameters:
 32863                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32864                                  	; ds = cs
 32865                                  	
 32866 00002DE9 06                      	push	es
 32867                                  
 32868 00002DEA 0E                      	push	cs
 32869 00002DEB 07                      	pop	es
 32870                                  
 32871 00002DEC 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 32872 00002DEE 8A1E[E735]              	mov	bl,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 32873 00002DF2 80FB00                  	cmp	bl,DEV_5INCH ; 0
 32874 00002DF5 7506                    	jne	short got_80
 32875                                  
 32876 00002DF7 C706[EA35]2800          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 32877                                  							; 48 tpi=40 cyl
 32878                                  got_80:
 32879 00002DFD D1E3                    	shl	bx,1			; get index into bpb table
 32880 00002DFF 8BB7[8E37]              	mov	si,[bpbtable+bx]	; get address of bpb
 32881                                  
 32882                                  	;mov	di,deviceparameters+7	
 32883                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32884 00002E03 BF[ED35]                	mov	di,deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB ; es:di -> bpb
 32885 00002E06 B91F00                  	mov	cx,A_BPB.size ; 31
 32886 00002E09 FC                      	cld
 32887                                  	;repe	movsb
 32888                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32889 00002E0A F3A4                    	rep	movsb
 32890                                  
 32891 00002E0C 07                      	pop	es
 32892                                  
 32893                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32894 00002E0D F606[0F37]20            	test	byte [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 32895                                  	;test	word [switches],flagseclim ; 20h
 32896 00002E12 7406                    	jz	short see_heads
 32897                                  
 32898 00002E14 A1[0C37]                	mov	ax,[slim]
 32899                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+20],ax
 32900 00002E17 A3[FA35]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],ax
 32901                                  
 32902                                  see_heads:
 32903                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32904 00002E1A F606[0F37]40            	test	byte [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 32905                                  	;test	word [switches],flagheads ; 40h
 32906 00002E1F 7406                    	jz	short heads_not_altered
 32907                                  
 32908 00002E21 A1[0A37]                	mov	ax,[hlim]
 32909                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+22],ax	
 32910 00002E24 A3[FC35]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax
 32911                                  
 32912                                  heads_not_altered:
 32913                                  
 32914                                  ; set up correct media descriptor byte and sectors/cluster
 32915                                  ;   sectors/cluster is always 2 except for any one sided disk or 1.44M
 32916                                  
 32917                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+9],2
 32918                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32919                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],2
 32920                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32921 00002E27 B80200                  	mov	ax,2	
 32922 00002E2A A2[EF35]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 2
 32923                                  
 32924 00002E2D B3F0                    	mov	bl,0F0h			; get default mediabyte
 32925                                  
 32926                                  ;	preload the mediadescriptor from the bpb into bh for convenient access
 32927                                  
 32928                                  	;mov	bh,[deviceparameters+17]
 32929                                  	; 02/11/2022
 32930 00002E2F 8A3E[F735]              	mov	bh,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 32931                                  
 32932                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32933                                  	; ax = 2
 32934 00002E33 3906[FC35]              	cmp	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],ax ; >2 heads?
 32935                                  	;cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS],2 ; >2 heads?
 32936 00002E37 773C                    	ja	short got_correct_mediad ; just use default if heads>2
 32937                                  
 32938 00002E39 7524                    	jne	short only_one_head	; one head, do one head stuff
 32939                                  
 32940                                  ;	two head drives will use the mediadescriptor from the bpb
 32941                                  
 32942 00002E3B 88FB                    	mov	bl,bh			; get mediadescriptor from bpb
 32943                                  
 32944                                  ;	two sided drives have two special cases to look for. One is
 32945                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 32946                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 32947                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 32948                                  
 32949                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 32950                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 32951                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.
 32952                                  
 32953 00002E3D 833E[FA35]12            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],18
 32954 00002E42 7509                    	jne	short not_144m
 32955 00002E44 833E[EA35]50            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 32956 00002E49 7502                    	jne	short not_144m
 32957                                  
 32958                                  ;	We've got cyl=80, heads=2, secpertrack=18. Set cluster size to 1.
 32959                                  
 32960 00002E4B EB24                    	jmp	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 32961                                  
 32962                                  ;	check for 320K
 32963                                  
 32964                                  not_144m:
 32965 00002E4D 833E[EA35]28            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],40
 32966 00002E52 7521                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 32967 00002E54 833E[FA35]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 32968 00002E59 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad
 32969                                  
 32970 00002E5B B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh
 32971 00002E5D EB16                    	jmp	short got_correct_mediad
 32972                                  
 32973                                  only_one_head:
 32974                                  
 32975                                  ;	if we don't have a 360K drive, then just go use 0f0h as media descr.
 32976                                  
 32977 00002E5F 803E[E735]00            	cmp	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_5INCH ; 0
 32978 00002E64 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 32979                                  
 32980                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 32981                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 32982                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 32983                                  
 32984 00002E66 B3FC                    	mov	bl,0FCh			; single sided 9 sector media id
 32985 00002E68 833E[FA35]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 32986                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32987 00002E6D 7502                    	jne	short got_one_secperclus_drive ; okay if anything besides 8
 32988                                  
 32989 00002E6F B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 32990                                  
 32991                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 32992                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 32993                                  
 32994                                  got_one_secperclus_drive:
 32995                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32996                                  	; ax = 2
 32997 00002E71 48                      	dec	ax  ; ax = 1
 32998 00002E72 A2[EF35]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],al ; 1
 32999                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER],1
 33000                                  
 33001                                  got_correct_mediad:
 33002 00002E75 881E[F735]              	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_MEDIADESCRIPTOR],bl
 33003                                  
 33004                                  ;	 Calculate the correct number of Total Sectors on medium
 33005                                  
 33006 00002E79 A1[EA35]                	mov	ax,[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS]
 33007 00002E7C F726[FC35]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_HEADS]
 33008 00002E80 F726[FA35]              	mul	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 33009 00002E84 A3[F535]                	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS],ax
 33010 00002E87 F8                      	clc				; we currently return no errors
 33011                                  
 33012 00002E88 C3                      	retn
 33013                                  
 33014                                  ;	M047 -- end rewritten routine
 33015                                  
 33016                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33017                                  ;
 33018                                  ; procedure : organize
 33019                                  ;
 33020                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33021                                  
 33022                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)

 33025                                  organize:
 33026                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33027                                  	; ds = cs
 33028 00002E89 8B0E[D203]              	mov	cx,[count]
 33029                                  	;mov	cx,[cs:count]
 33030 00002E8D E326                    	jcxz	nochar1
 33031                                  
 33032                                  ;ifndef	MULTI_CONFIG
 33033                                  ;
 33034                                  ;;   In MULTI_CONFIG, we map to upper case on a line-by-line basis,
 33035                                  ;;   because we the case of values in SET commands preserved
 33036                                  ;
 33037                                  ;	call	mapcase
 33038                                  ;endif
 33039                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33040 00002E8F E81B02                  	call	mapcase
 33041                                  
 33042 00002E92 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 33043 00002E94 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 33044 00002E96 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 33045                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)	
 33046                                  	;;mov	byte [cs:com_level],0
 33047                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33048                                  	;mov	[cs:com_level],al ; 0
 33049                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33050                                  	; ds = cs
 33051 00002E98 A2[CC03]                	mov	[com_level],al ; 0
 33052                                  org1:
 33053 00002E9B E8B101                  	call	skip_comment
 33054 00002E9E 740D                    	jz	short end_commd_line	; found a comment string and skipped.
 33055 00002EA0 E89601                  	call	get2			; not a comment string. then get a char.
 33056 00002EA3 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf ; 0Ah
 33057 00002EA5 7406                    	je	short end_commd_line	; starts with a blank line.
 33058 00002EA7 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' ; 20h
 33059 00002EA9 76F0                    	jbe	short org1		; skip leading control characters
 33060 00002EAB EB0A                    	jmp	short findit
 33061                                  
 33062                                  end_commd_line:
 33063 00002EAD AA                      	stosb				; store line feed char in buffer for the linecount.
 33064                                  	;mov	byte [cs:com_level],0	; reset the command level.
 33065                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33066                                  	; ds = cs
 33067 00002EAE C606[CC03]00            	mov	byte [com_level],0
 33068 00002EB3 EBE6                    	jmp	short org1
 33069                                  
 33070                                  nochar1:
 33071 00002EB5 F9                      	stc
 33072 00002EB6 C3                      	retn
 33073                                  
 33074                                  findit:
 33075 00002EB7 51                      	push	cx
 33076 00002EB8 56                      	push	si
 33077 00002EB9 57                      	push	di
 33078 00002EBA 89F5                    	mov	bp,si
 33079 00002EBC 4D                      	dec	bp
 33080 00002EBD BE[5535]                        mov     si,comtab		; prepare to search command table
 33081 00002EC0 B500                    	mov	ch,0
 33082                                  findcom:
 33083 00002EC2 89EF                    	mov	di,bp
 33084 00002EC4 8A0C                    	mov	cl,[si]
 33085 00002EC6 46                      	inc	si
 33086 00002EC7 E324                    	jcxz	nocom
 33087                                  
 33088                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33089                                  
 33090                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 33091                                  ;
 33092                                  ;;   Simplify future parsing by collapsing ";" onto "REM", and at the same
 33093                                  ;;   time skip the upcoming delimiter test (since ";" need not be followed by
 33094                                  ;;   anything in particular)
 33095                                  ;
 33096                                  ;       cmp     byte [es:di],CONFIG_SEMICOLON  ; ';'
 33097                                  ;       je	short semicolon
 33098                                  ;loopcom:
 33099                                  ;       mov     al,[es:di]
 33100                                  ;       inc     di

 33486                                  ;
 33487                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 33488                                  ;
 33489                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 33490                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 33491                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 33492                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 33493                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 33494                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 33495                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 33496                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 33497                                  ;
 33498                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33499                                  
 33500                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33501                                  
 33502                                  skip_comment:
 33503 0000304F E3EE                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 33504                                  
 33505                                  	; 04/01/2023
 33506                                  	; ds = cs	
 33507                                  
 33508 00003051 803E[CC03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 33509                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 33510 00003056 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 33511                                  
 33512 00003058 803E[CD03]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 33513                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 33514 0000305D 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 33515                                  
 33516 0000305F 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 33517                                  	
 33518 00003062 3806[CE03]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 33519                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 33520 00003066 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 33521                                  
 33522 00003068 803E[CD03]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 33523                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 33524 0000306D 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 33525                                  
 33526 0000306F 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 33527                                  	
 33528 00003073 3806[CF03]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 33529                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 33530 00003077 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 33531                                  skip_cmmt:
 33532 00003079 E3C4                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 33533 0000307B 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 33534 0000307E 46                      	inc	si
 33535 0000307F 49                      	dec	cx
 33536 00003080 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 33537 00003082 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 33538                                  no_commt:
 33539 00003084 C3                      	retn

 33546                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33547                                  ;
 33548                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 33549                                  ;
 33550                                  ;   INPUT
 33551                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 33552                                  ;
 33553                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33554                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 33555                                  ;
 33556                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33557                                  ;       All
 33558                                  ;
 33559                                  ;   HISTORY
 33560                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 33561                                  ;
 33562                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33563                                  
 33564                                  kbd_read:
 33565                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 33566                                          jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 33567                                  
 33568                                          push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 33569                                          sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 33570                                          mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 33571                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 33572                                  kbd_loop:
 33573                                          mov     ah,1            ;
 33574                                          int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 33575                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 33576                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 33577                                          int     16h             ;
 33578                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 33579                                          jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 33580                                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 33581                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 33582                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33583                                  	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 33584                                  
 33585                                  	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?
 33586                                          jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 33587                                  kbd_loopdone:
 33588                                          pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 33589                                  kbd_nodelay:
 33590                                          sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 33591                                          mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 33592                                          int     16h             ;
 33593                                          test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 33594                                          jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 33595                                          inc     bx              ; yes
 33596                                          inc     bx
 33597                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 33598                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 33599                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 33600                                          mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 33601                                          int     16h             ;
 33602                                          jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 33603                                          or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 33604                                          jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 33605                                  
 33606                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 33607                                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 33608                                          je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 33609                                  	
 33610                                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 33611                                          jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 33612                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 33613                                          mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 33614                                          call    print
 33615                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 33616                                  	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4           ;
 33617                                          jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 33618                                  kbd_notf5:
 33619                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 33620                                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 33621                                          je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 33622                                  
 33623                                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 33624                                          jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 33625                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 33626                                          mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 33627                                          call    print           ;
 33628                                          mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 33629                                          mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 33630                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 33631                                          mov     ah,0            ;
 33632                                          int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 33633                                          mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 33634                                          or      bx,bx           ;
 33635                                          jz	short kbd_clean	;
 33636                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 33637                                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 33638                                          jb	short kbd_exit	;
 33639                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 33640                                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 33641                                          stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 33642                                          retn			;
 33643                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 33644                                          clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 33645                                          retn			;
 33646                                  
 33647                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33648                                  ;
 33649                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 33650                                  ;
 33651                                  ;   INPUT
 33652                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 33653                                  ;
 33654                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33655                                  ;       None
 33656                                  ;
 33657                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33658                                  ;       None
 33659                                  ;
 33660                                  ;   HISTORY
 33661                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 33662                                  ;
 33663                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33664                                  
 33665                                  set_numlock:
 33666                                          push    ax
 33667                                          push    ds
 33668                                          sub     ax,ax
 33669                                          mov     ds,ax
 33670                                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 33671                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 33672                                          jne	short not_off	; no
 33673                                          and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 33674                                          jmp     short set_done
 33675                                  not_off:
 33676                                          cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 33677                                          stc
 33678                                          jne	short set_done	; no
 33679                                          or      byte [0417h],20h
 33680                                  set_done:
 33681                                          pop     ds
 33682                                          pop     ax
 33683                                          retn
 33684                                  
 33685                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33686                                  
 33687                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33688                                  ;
 33689                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 33690                                  ;
 33691                                  ;   INPUT
 33692                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 33693                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 33694                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 33695                                  ;
 33696                                  ;   OUTPUT
 33697                                  ;       Same as above;  the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 33698                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 33699                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 33700                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 33701                                  ;
 33702                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 33703                                  ;       All
 33704                                  ;
 33705                                  ;   NOTES
 33706                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 33707                                  ;
 33708                                  ;   HISTORY
 33709                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33710                                  ;
 33711                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33712                                  
 33713                                  menu_check:
 33714                                  
 33715                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present;  if so, then
 33716                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 33717                                  
 33718                                          push    cx              ;
 33719                                          push    si              ;
 33720                                          sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 33721                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 33722                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 33723                                          jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 33724                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 33725                                          jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 33726                                          inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 33727                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 33728                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 33729                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 33730                                          jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 33731                                          or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 33732                                          jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 33733                                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 33734                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 33735                                          jmp     short swchk_nextline
 33736                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 33737                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 33738                                          jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 33739                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 33740                                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 33741                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 33742                                          cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 33743                                          je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 33744                                          cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 33745                                          jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 33746                                          call    get_char        ;
 33747                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 33748                                          cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 33749                                          jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 33750                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 33751                                          jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 33752                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 33753                                          cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 33754                                          jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 33755                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 33756                                          jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 33757                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 33758                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 33759                                          jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 33760                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 33761                                          pop     si              ;
 33762                                          pop     cx              ;
 33763                                  
 33764                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 33765                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 33766                                  
 33767                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 33768                                          jnz	short menu_search
 33769                                  ;
 33770                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 33771                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 33772                                  ;
 33773                                          call    kbd_read
 33774                                          jnc	short menu_search
 33775                                          jmp	menu_abort
 33776                                  
 33777                                  ;   Search for MENU block;  it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 33778                                  
 33779                                  menu_search:
 33780                                          sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 33781                                          mov     di,szMenu	;
 33782                                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 33783                                          jnc	short menu_found ;
 33784                                          mov     byte [szBoot],0
 33785                                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 33786                                  
 33787                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 33788                                  
 33789                                  menu_color:
 33790                                          push    cx              ;
 33791                                          push    dx              ;
 33792                                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 33793                                          call    get_number	; get first number
 33794                                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 33795                                          mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 33796                                          and     dl,0F0h         ;
 33797                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 33798                                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 33799                                          jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 33800                                          call    get_number	; get next number
 33801                                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 33802                                          mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 33803                                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 33804                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 33805                                          shl     bl,cl           ;
 33806                                          or      dl,bl           ;
 33807                                  check_color:                    ;
 33808                                          cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 33809                                          jne	short set_color	; no
 33810                                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 33811                                  set_color:
 33812                                          mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 33813                                          pop     dx              ;
 33814                                          pop     cx              ;
 33815                                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 33816                                  
 33817                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 33818                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 33819                                  
 33820                                  menu_found:
 33821                                          mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 33822                                          mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 33823                                          mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 33824                                          and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 33825                                  
 33826                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 33827                                          sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 33828                                  
 33829                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 33830                                  
 33831                                  menu_process:
 33832                                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 33833                                          jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 33834                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 33835                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 33836                                          je	short to_menu_getdefault
 33837                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 33838                                          je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 33839                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 33840                                          je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 33841                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 33842                                          je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 33843                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 33844                                          je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 33845                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 33846                                          je	short menu_numlock ;
 33847                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 33848                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 33849                                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 33850                                          je	short menu_nextitem ;
 33851                                          stc                     ;
 33852                                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 33853                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 33854                                  menu_numlock:
 33855                                          call    set_numlock
 33856                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 33857                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 33858                                          jmp     short menu_getdefault
 33859                                  
 33860                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 33861                                  
 33862                                  menu_default:
 33863                                          mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 33864                                          cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 33865                                          jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 33866                                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 33867                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 33868                                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 33869                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 33870                                          mov     si,bx           ;
 33871                                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 33872                                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 33873                                          jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 33874                                          mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 33875                                  timeout_ok:                     ;
 33876                                          mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 33877                                  timeout_skip:
 33878                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem
 33879                                  
 33880                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 33881                                  
 33882                                  menu_item:
 33883                                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 33884                                          jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 33885                                          mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 33886                                          call    srch_block      ;
 33887                                          je	short menu_itemfound ;
 33888                                          stc                     ;
 33889                                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 33890                                          jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 33891                                  
 33892                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 33893                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 33894                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 33895                                  
 33896                                  menu_itemfound:
 33897                                          inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 33898                                          mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 33899                                          mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 33900                                          add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 33901                                  
 33902                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 33903                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 33904                                  ;   description...
 33905                                  
 33906                                          mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 33907                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 33908                                          mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 33909                                          call    skip_token      ;
 33910                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 33911                                          call    skip_delim      ;
 33912                                          jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 33913                                          xchg    bx,di           ;
 33914                                          mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 33915                                  
 33916                                  menu_nextitem:
 33917                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 33918                                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 33919                                  
 33920                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 33921                                  
 33922                                  menu_getdefault:
 33923                                          or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 33924                                          jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 33925                                          sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 33926                                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 33927                                  menu_valid:
 33928                                          sub     bx,bx           ;
 33929                                          mov     [bMaxBlock],dl  ; first, record how many blocks we found
 33930                                          mov     di,[offDefBlock];
 33931                                          or      di,di           ; does a default block exist?
 33932                                          jz	short menu_nodefault ; no
 33933                                          inc     bx              ; yes, walk name table, looking for default
 33934                                  menu_chkdefault:
 33935                                          push    bx              ;
 33936                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 33937                                          mov     si,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 33938                                          mov     cx,128          ; arbitrary maximum length of a name
 33939                                          push    ds              ;
 33940                                          push    es              ;
 33941                                          pop     ds              ;
 33942                                          call    comp_names      ; is this block the same as the default?
 33943                                          pop     ds              ;
 33944                                          pop     bx              ;
 33945                                          je	short menu_setdefault ; yes
 33946                                          inc     bx              ;
 33947                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done searching?
 33948                                          jbe	short menu_chkdefault ; not yet
 33949                                  menu_nodefault:
 33950                                          mov     bl,1            ; if no default, force default to #1
 33951                                  menu_setdefault:
 33952                                          mov     [bDefBlock],bl  ; yes, this will be the initial current block
 33953                                  
 33954                                  ;   If the timeout was explicitly set to 0 (or technically, anything that
 33955                                  ;   failed to resolve to a number, like "NONE" or "EAT POTATOES"), then we're
 33956                                  ;   supposed to skip menu display and run with the specified default block;
 33957                                  ;   however, if the user hit Enter prior to boot, thereby requesting fully
 33958                                  ;   INTERACTIVE boot, then we shall display the menu block anyway (though still
 33959                                  ;   with no timeout)
 33960                                  
 33961                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],0 ; is timeout zero? (ie, assume default)
 33962                                          jne	short menu_display ; no
 33963                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; yes, but was INTERACTIVE requested?
 33964                                          jnz	short menu_display ; yes, so *don't* assume default after all
 33965                                          jmp     not_topmenu	;
 33966                                  
 33967                                  ;   Reset the mode, so that we know screen is clean and cursor is home
 33968                                  
 33969                                  menu_display:
 33970                                          mov     ah,0Fh          ; get current video mode
 33971                                          int     10h             ;
 33972                                          mov     ah,00h          ; just re-select that mode
 33973                                          int     10h             ;
 33974                                          push    es              ;
 33975                                          mov     ax,40h          ; reach down into the ROM BIOS data area
 33976                                          mov     es,ax           ; and save the current (default) video page
 33977                                          mov     ax,[es:004Eh]   ; start address and page #, in case the
 33978                                          mov     [wCRTStart],ax  ; undocumented QUIET option was enabled
 33979                                          mov     al,[es:0062h]   ;
 33980                                          mov     [bCRTPage],al   ;
 33981                                          mov     ax,[bMenuPage]	; select new page for menu
 33982                                          int     10h             ;
 33983                                          mov     ax,0600h        ; clear entire screen
 33984                                          mov     bh,[bMenuColor] ; using this color
 33985                                          sub     cx,cx           ; upper left row/col
 33986                                          ;mov	dl,[es:CRT_Cols] 
 33987                                          mov	dl,[es:4Ah]
 33988                                  	dec     dl              ;
 33989                                          ;mov	dh,[es:CRT_Rows];
 33990                                          mov	dh,[es:84h]
 33991                                  	or      dh,dh           ; # of rows valid?
 33992                                          jnz	short menu_clear ; hopefully
 33993                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; no, use a default
 33994                                  menu_clear:
 33995                                          int     10h             ; clear the screen using the req. attribute
 33996                                          pop     es              ;
 33997                                          mov     [bLastRow],dh   ; save DH
 33998                                          mov     dx,_$MenuHeader
 33999                                          call    print           ; cursor now on row 3 (numbered from 0)
 34000                                  
 34001                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34002                                          jnz     short menu_nostatus
 34003                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 34004                                          mov     dh,[bLastRow]   ; restore DH
 34005                                          mov     dl,0            ; print the status line on row DH, col 0,
 34006                                          mov     ah,02h          ; now that we can trash the cursor position
 34007                                          int     10h             ;
 34008                                          mov     dx,_$StatusLine
 34009                                          call    print           ;
 34010                                          mov     ah,3            ; get cursor position
 34011                                          int     10h             ;
 34012                                          sub     dl,2            ;
 34013                                          mov     [bLastCol],dl   ; save column where status char will go
 34014                                  
 34015                                  menu_nostatus:
 34016                                          mov     bx,1            ; now prepare to display all the menu items
 34017                                  menu_disploop:
 34018                                          call    print_item	; print item #BL
 34019                                          inc     bx              ; why "inc bx"?  because it's a 1-byte opcode
 34020                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; all done?
 34021                                          jbe	short menu_disploop ; not yet
 34022                                  
 34023                                  ;   Set cursor position to just below the menu items
 34024                                  
 34025                                          mov     dl,0            ; select column
 34026                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 34027                                          add     dh,4            ; select row below menu
 34028                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
