 34029                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position beneath the block list
 34030                                          int     10h             ;
 34031                                  
 34032                                          mov     dx,_$MenuPrmpt
 34033                                          call    print           ;
 34034                                          call    select_item     ; make a selection, return # in BX
 34035                                          mov     dx,crlfm	
 34036                                          call    print           ;
 34037                                          push    word [bDisableUI]
 34038                                          or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 34039                                          call    show_status     ; clear the status line now
 34040                                          pop     word [bDisableUI]
 34041                                  
 34042                                  ;   Now begins the "re-organization" process...
 34043                                  
 34044                                  menu_autoselect:
 34045                                          cmp     bx,-1           ; clean boot requested?
 34046                                          jne	short normal_boot ; no
 34047                                          call    disable_autoexec; basically, add a /D to the command.com line
 34048                                  menu_abort:
 34049                                          sub     cx,cx           ; then immediately exit with 0 config.sys image
 34050                                          jmp	menu_exit	;
 34051                                  
 34052                                  normal_boot:
 34053                                          cmp     bx,-2           ; back to top-level menu?
 34054                                          jne	short not_topmenu ; no
 34055                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; yes, start all over
 34056                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34057                                          jmp     menu_search
 34058                                  
 34059                                  not_topmenu:
 34060                                          cmp     byte [abBlockType+bx],CONFIG_SUBMENU
 34061                                          jne	short not_submenu
 34062                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 34063                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34064                                          call    srch_block      ; THIS CANNOT FAIL!
 34065                                          mov     si,di           ;
 34066                                          mov     cx,bx           ; ES:SI and CX are ready for another round
 34067                                          jmp     menu_found
 34068                                  
 34069                                  not_submenu:
 34070                                          add     bx,bx           ; get BX -> name of selected block
 34071                                          mov     bx,[aoffBlockName+bx]
 34072                                  
 34073                                  ;   BX should now either be ZERO (meaning no block has been selected) or
 34074                                  ;   the offset relative to ES of the block name to be processed (along with
 34075                                  ;   all the "common" lines of course)
 34076                                  
 34077                                  no_selection:
 34078                                          mov     [offDefBlock],bx; save selection
 34079                                          mov     cx,[count]      ; reset ES:SI and CX for reprocessing
 34080                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34081                                          push    ds              ;
 34082                                          mov     ds,[config_wrkseg]; this is where we'll store new config.sys image
 34083                                          sub     di,di           ;
 34084                                  
 34085                                  ;   ES:SI-> config.sys, DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace
 34086                                  ;
 34087                                  ;   Work our way through the config.sys image again, this time copying
 34088                                  ;   all lines that are (A) "common" lines outside any block or (B) lines
 34089                                  ;   within the requested block.  Lines inside INCLUDEd blocks are transparently
 34090                                  ;   copied by copy_block in a recursive fashion;  the amount of recursion is
 34091                                  ;   limited by the fact INCLUDE statements are REMed by copy_block as they are
 34092                                  ;   processed and by the number of unique INCLUDE stmts in config.sys...
 34093                                  ;
 34094                                  ;   BUGBUG 20-Mar-1992 JeffPar: If we can figure out the lower bound of the
 34095                                  ;   stack we're running on, then we should check it inside copy_block
 34096                                  
 34097                                  copyblock_loop:
 34098                                          push    bx              ; save selected block name
 34099                                          call    copy_block      ; process (named or common) block
 34100                                          pop     bx              ;
 34101                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34102                                  
 34103                                  ;   copy_block can only return for two reasons:  it hit eof or a new block
 34104                                  
 34105                                  copyblock_begin:
 34106                                          push    ax              ;
 34107                                          push    cx              ;
 34108                                          push    si              ;
 34109                                          push    di              ; always do "common" blocks
 34110                                          mov     di,szCommon
 34111                                          push    ds              ;
 34112                                          push    cs              ;
 34113                                          pop     ds              ;
 34114                                          call    comp_names      ;
 34115                                          pop     ds              ;
 34116                                          pop     di              ;
 34117                                          pop     si              ;
 34118                                          pop     cx              ;
 34119                                          pop     ax              ;
 34120                                          je	short copyblock_check
 34121                                          or      bx,bx           ; is there a block name to check?
 34122                                          jz	short copyblock_skip ; no
 34123                                          push    di              ;
 34124                                          mov     di,bx           ; check block against given block name
 34125                                          push    ds              ;
 34126                                          push    es              ;
 34127                                          pop     ds              ;
 34128                                          call    comp_names      ; is this the block we really want to do?
 34129                                          pop     ds              ;
 34130                                          pop     di              ;
 34131                                  copyblock_check:
 34132                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34133                                          jne	short copyblock_skip  ;
 34134                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34135                                          jmp	short copyblock_loop 
 34136                                  
 34137                                  copyblock_skip:                 ;
 34138                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; this ain't the block we wanted, so skip it
 34139                                          call    get_char        ;
 34140                                          jc	short move_config ; hit eof
 34141                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34142                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ;
 34143                                          je	short copyblock_begin
 34144                                          jmp     short copyblock_skip ; anything else is just skipped
 34145                                  ;
 34146                                  ;   To create as little risk to the rest of SysInit as little as possible,
 34147                                  ;   and to free the workspace at "config_wrkseg" for creating an environment,
 34148                                  ;   copy the new config.sys image to "confbot"
 34149                                  ;
 34150                                  move_config:
 34151                                          mov     cx,di           ; now copy workspace at DS:DI to "confbot"
 34152                                          push    cx              ;
 34153                                  ;
 34154                                  ;   But first, copy the CONFIG=<configuration><0> string to the workspace,
 34155                                  ;   since the configuration name only currently exists in the "confbot" area
 34156                                  ;
 34157                                   	;mov	cx,7
 34158                                  	mov     cx,szMenu-szBoot-1
 34159                                          mov     si,szBoot	; first copy the CONFIG= part
 34160                                          inc     di              ; skip a byte, in case absolutely nothing
 34161                                                                  ; was copied to the workspace, because we always
 34162                                                                  ; zero the first byte of the workspace (below)
 34163                                  copy_boot: 
 34164                                  	;lods    byte ptr cs:[si];
 34165                                          cs
 34166                                  	lodsb
 34167                                  	mov     [di],al         ;
 34168                                          inc     di              ;
 34169                                          loop    copy_boot       ;
 34170                                  
 34171                                          push    es              ; then copy the configuration name
 34172                                          mov     cx,128-7        ; put an upper limit on the name, to be safe
 34173                                          mov     si,[cs:offDefBlock]; ES:SI -> default block name
 34174                                          or      si,si           ; valid?
 34175                                          jnz	short l1	; yes
 34176                                          push    cs              ;
 34177                                          pop     es              ;
 34178                                          mov     si,szCommon
 34179                                  l1:     mov     al,[es:si]      ;
 34180                                          call    any_delim       ;
 34181                                          je	short l2	;
 34182                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 34183                                          inc     si              ;
 34184                                          inc     di              ;
 34185                                          loop    l1              ;
 34186                                  l2:     mov     byte [di],lf	; terminate the configuration string
 34187                                          pop     es              ;
 34188                                  
 34189                                  ;   Now we can copy "config_wrkseg" (DS) to "confbot" (ES)
 34190                                  
 34191                                          sub     di,di           ;
 34192                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 34193                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34194                                          pop     cx              ; recover the size of "config_wrkseg"
 34195                                  
 34196                                          push    cx              ;
 34197                                          rep     movsb           ; moved!
 34198                                          pop     cx              ;
 34199                                          mov     ax,ds           ;
 34200                                          pop     ds              ;
 34201                                  
 34202                                  ;   Now that the config_wrkseg is available once again, we shall
 34203                                  ;   use it to create an environment. The first thing to go in will be
 34204                                  ;   the "CONFIG=configuration" thing. It is also important to zero
 34205                                  ;   the first byte of the workspace, so that copy_envvar knows the buffer
 34206                                  ;   is empty.
 34207                                  
 34208                                          push    es              ;
 34209                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 34210                                          inc     si              ; ES:SI -> "CONFIG=configuration"
 34211                                          mov     byte [es:0],0	;empty the environment block
 34212                                          call    copy_envvar     ; copy envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 34213                                          pop     es
 34214                                  
 34215                                  ;   Before returning, restore the default video page setting but do NOT
 34216                                  ;   do it using INT 10h's Set Active Page function, because if the menu was
 34217                                  ;   displayed on a different page, then it's because we don't want to see
 34218                                  ;   all the device driver/TSR goop (which goes to the default page)
 34219                                  
 34220                                  menu_done:
 34221                                          cmp     byte [bMenuPage],0
 34222                                          je	short menu_exit	;
 34223                                          push    es              ;
 34224                                          mov     ax,40h          ;
 34225                                          mov     es,ax           ;
 34226                                          mov     ax,[wCRTStart]  ;
 34227                                          mov     [es:004Eh],ax   ;
 34228                                          mov     al,[bCRTPage]   ;
 34229                                          mov     [es:0062h],al   ;
 34230                                          pop     es              ;
 34231                                  menu_exit:
 34232                                          mov     [count],cx      ; set new counts
 34233                                          mov     [org_count],cx  ;
 34234                                          sub     si,si           ; always return ES:SI pointing to config.sys
 34235                                          retn
 34236                                  
 34237                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34238                                  ;
 34239                                  ;   copy_envvar:  copy the envvar at ES:SI to "config_wrkseg"
 34240                                  ;
 34241                                  ;   INPUT
 34242                                  ;    ES:SI -> environment variable (in the form "var=string<cr/lf>")
 34243                                  ;
 34244                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34245                                  ;       config_envlen (ie, where to put next envvar) updated appropriately
 34246                                  ;       carry set if error (eg, missing =); clear otherwise
 34247                                  ;
 34248                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34249                                  ;       None
 34250                                  ;
 34251                                  ;   NOTES
 34252                                  ;       None
 34253                                  ;
 34254                                  ;   HISTORY
 34255                                  ;       Created 29-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34256                                  ;
 34257                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34258                                  
 34259                                  copy_envvar:
 34260                                          push    cx              ;
 34261                                          push    si              ;
 34262                                          push    ds              ;
 34263                                          push    es              ;
 34264                                          push    es              ;
 34265                                          mov     es,[config_wrkseg] ; ES:DI to point to next available byte
 34266                                          pop     ds                 ; DS:SI to point to envvar
 34267                                  
 34268                                  ;   Have to calculate the length of the variable name (and if we hit
 34269                                  ;   the end of the line before we hit '=', then it's curtains for this
 34270                                  ;   config.sys line)
 34271                                  ;
 34272                                  ;   The check for NULL is important because copy_envvar is also used to copy
 34273                                  ;   the initial CONFIG= setting, which will have been zapped by a NULL if no
 34274                                  ;   menu block existed (in order to prevent the creation of an environment)
 34275                                  
 34276                                          sub     cx,cx           ;
 34277                                  copy_varlen:                    ;
 34278                                          lodsb                   ;
 34279                                          or      al,al           ; NULL?
 34280                                          stc                     ;
 34281                                          jz	short copy_envexit ; yes, abort
 34282                                          cmp     al,cr          ;
 34283                                          stc                     ;
 34284                                          je	short copy_envexit
 34285                                          cmp     al,lf          ;
 34286                                          stc                     ;
 34287                                          je	short copy_envexit
 34288                                          inc     cx              ;
 34289                                          cmp     al,'='          ;
 34290                                          jne	short copy_varlen
 34291                                          mov     al,0            ;
 34292                                          mov     ah,[si]         ; save char after '='
 34293                                          sub     si,cx           ; back up to given varname
 34294                                          dec     cx              ; CX == # of bytes in varname
 34295                                          sub     di,di           ; start looking for DS:SI at ES:0
 34296                                  copy_varsrch:
 34297                                          cmp     byte [es:di],al
 34298                                          je	short copy_envprep ; search failed, just copy var
 34299                                          mov     bx,di           ; ES:BX -> start of this varname
 34300                                          push    cx              ;
 34301                                          push    si              ;
 34302                                          repe    cmpsb           ;
 34303                                          pop     si              ;
 34304                                          pop     cx              ;
 34305                                          jne	short copy_varnext ; no match, skip to next varname
 34306                                          cmp     byte [es:di],'='
 34307                                          jne     short copy_varnext ; no match, there's more characters
 34308                                  
 34309                                  ;   Previous occurrence of variable has been found; determine the
 34310                                  ;   entire length and then destroy it
 34311                                  
 34312                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 34313                                          repne   scasb           ; guaranteed to get null (since we put it there)
 34314                                          push    si              ;
 34315                                          mov     si,di           ;
 34316                                          mov     di,bx           ;
 34317                                          mov     cx,[cs:config_envlen]
 34318                                          sub     cx,si           ; destroy variable now
 34319                                  	;rep movs byte ptr es:[di],byte ptr es:[si]
 34320                                  	;;db 0F3h,26h,0A4h ; MSDOS 6.21 IO:SYS - SYSINIT:4724h
 34321                                  
 34322                                  	rep	; 0F3h
 34323                                  	es	; 26h
 34324                                  	movsb	; 0A4h
 34325                                  
 34326                                  	pop     si
 34327                                  copy_envprep:
 34328                                          cmp     ah,cr          ; if there is nothing after the '='
 34329                                          je	short copy_envdel ; then just exit with variable deleted
 34330                                          cmp     ah,lf           ;
 34331                                          je	short copy_envdel
 34332                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 34333                                  
 34334                                  copy_varnext:                   ;
 34335                                          push    cx              ;
 34336                                          mov     cx,-1           ;
 34337                                          repne   scasb           ;
 34338                                          pop     cx              ;
 34339                                          jmp	short copy_varsrch
 34340                                  
 34341                                  copy_envloop:                   ;
 34342                                          lodsb                   ;
 34343                                          cmp     al,cr           ;
 34344                                          je	short copy_envdone
 34345                                          cmp     al,lf           ;
 34346                                          je	short copy_envdone
 34347                                          stosb                   ;
 34348                                          jmp     short copy_envloop
 34349                                  
 34350                                  copy_envdone:                   ;
 34351                                          sub     al,al           ; do SUB to clear carry as well
 34352                                          stosb                   ; always null-terminate these puppies
 34353                                  copy_envdel:                    ;
 34354                                          mov     [es:di],al      ; and stick another null to terminate the env.
 34355                                          mov     [cs:config_envlen],di
 34356                                  
 34357                                  copy_envexit:                   ;
 34358                                          pop     es              ;
 34359                                          pop     ds              ;
 34360                                          pop     si              ;
 34361                                          pop     cx              ;
 34362                                  
 34363                                  copy_done:	; 18/12/2022
 34364                                          retn
 34365                                  
 34366                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34367                                  ;
 34368                                  ;   copy_block:  copy the current block to the new config.sys workspace
 34369                                  ;
 34370                                  ;   INPUT
 34371                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 34372                                  ;    ES:SI -> remaining bytes in "organized" config.sys memory image
 34373                                  ;    DS:DI -> new config.sys workspace (equal in size to the original
 34374                                  ;             config.sys image) where the current block is to be copied
 34375                                  ;
 34376                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34377                                  ;       Same as above
 34378                                  ;       AL also equals the last character read from the organized image
 34379                                  ;
 34380                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34381                                  ;       All
 34382                                  ;
 34383                                  ;   NOTES
 34384                                  ;       None
 34385                                  ;
 34386                                  ;   HISTORY
 34387                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34388                                  ;
 34389                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34390                                  
 34391                                  copy_block:
 34392                                          call    get_char        ; check for include
 34393                                          jc	short copy_done	;
 34394                                  	and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34395                                  	cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; another BEGIN implies END as well
 34396                                          je	short copy_done ;
 34397                                  
 34398                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE ; 'J'
 34399                                          mov     al,ah           ; AL == the original line code
 34400                                          jne	short copy_line	; not an "include" line
 34401                                  
 34402                                  ;   We have hit an "INCLUDE" line; first, REM out the line so that we
 34403                                  ;   never try to include the block again (no infinite include loops please),
 34404                                  ;   then search for the named block and call copy_block again.
 34405                                  
 34406                                          mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM ; '0'
 34407                                          push    di              ;
 34408                                  
 34409                                          mov     di,szMenu
 34410                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE MENU
 34411                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 34412                                  
 34413                                          mov     di,szCommon
 34414                                          call    comp_names_safe ; don't allow INCLUDE COMMON
 34415                                          je	short copy_skip	;
 34416                                  
 34417                                          mov     di,si           ; try to find the block
 34418                                          call    srch_block      ;
 34419                                          mov     dx,di           ;
 34420                                          pop     di              ;
 34421                                          jne	short copy_error ; no such block
 34422                                          push    cx              ;
 34423                                          mov     cx,bx           ;
 34424                                          push    si              ;
 34425                                          dec     dx              ;
 34426                                          mov     si,dx           ;
 34427                                          call    skip_line       ; skip the rest of the "block name" line
 34428                                          call    copy_block      ; and copy in the rest of that block
 34429                                          pop     si              ;
 34430                                          pop     cx              ;
 34431                                          sub     al,al           ; force skip_opt_line to skip...
 34432                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 34433                                  
 34434                                  copy_skip:
 34435                                          pop     di
 34436                                  copy_error:
 34437                                          clc                     ;
 34438                                          call    print_error     ; note that carry is clear, no pause
 34439                                          jmp     short copy_nextline
 34440                                  
 34441                                  ;   Copy the line at ES:SI to the current location at DS:DI
 34442                                  
 34443                                  copy_line:
 34444                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 34445                                          inc     di              ;
 34446                                          cmp     al,' '          ; is this is a "real" line with a "real" code?
 34447                                          jb	short copy_nextline ; no
 34448                                          cmp     byte [cs:config_multi],0
 34449                                          je	short copy_loop	; not a multi-config config.sys, don't embed #s
 34450                                          call    get_linenum	; BX == line # of line @ES:SI
 34451                                          mov     [di],bx         ; stash it immediately following the line code
 34452                                          inc     di              ;
 34453                                          inc     di              ;
 34454                                          jmp     short copy_next ;
 34455                                  copy_loop:                      ;
 34456                                          call    get_char        ;
 34457                                          jc	short copy_done ; end of file
 34458                                          mov     [di],al         ;
 34459                                          inc     di              ;
 34460                                  copy_next:
 34461                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah	; done with line?
 34462                                          jne	short copy_loop	; nope
 34463                                  
 34464                                  copy_nextline:
 34465                                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34466                                          jmp     short copy_block
 34467                                  
 34468                                  	; 18/12/2022
 34469                                  ;copy_done:
 34470                                          ;retn
 34471                                  
 34472                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34473                                  ;
 34474                                  ;   get_linenum:  return line # (in BX) of current line (@ES:SI)
 34475                                  ;
 34476                                  ;   INPUT
 34477                                  ;    ES:SI -> some line in the config.sys memory image
 34478                                  ;
 34479                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34480                                  ;       BX == line # (relative to 1)
 34481                                  ;
 34482                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34483                                  ;       DX
 34484                                  ;
 34485                                  ;   NOTES
 34486                                  ;       None
 34487                                  ;
 34488                                  ;   HISTORY
 34489                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34490                                  ;
 34491                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34492                                  
 34493                                  get_linenum:
 34494                                          push    ax              ;
 34495                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX == line # (to be returned)
 34496                                          push    cx              ;
 34497                                          mov     dx,si           ; DX == the offset we're looking for
 34498                                          push    si              ;
 34499                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 34500                                          sub     si,si           ; prepare to scan entire file
 34501                                  get_linenum_loop:               ;
 34502                                          call    skip_line       ;
 34503                                          jc	short get_linenum_done
 34504                                          inc     bx              ;
 34505                                          cmp     si,dx           ; have we exceeded the desired offset yet?
 34506                                          jb	short get_linenum_loop ; no
 34507                                  get_linenum_done:               ;
 34508                                          pop     si              ;
 34509                                          pop     cx              ;
 34510                                          pop     ax              ;
 34511                                          retn
 34512                                  
 34513                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34514                                  ;
 34515                                  ;   srch_block:  searches entire config.sys for block name @ES:DI
 34516                                  ;
 34517                                  ;   INPUT
 34518                                  ;       ES -> config.sys image
 34519                                  ;    ES:DI -> block name to find
 34520                                  ;
 34521                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34522                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found
 34523                                  ;    ES:DI -> just past the name in the block heading, if found
 34524                                  ;       BX == # bytes remaining from that point, if found
 34525                                  ;
 34526                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34527                                  ;       None
 34528                                  ;
 34529                                  ;   NOTES
 34530                                  ;       This differs from "find_block" in that it searches the ENTIRE
 34531                                  ;       config.sys image, not merely the remaining portion, and that it
 34532                                  ;       takes a pointer to block name that is *elsewhere* in the image
 34533                                  ;       (ie, ES) as opposed to some string constant in our own segment (DS).
 34534                                  ;
 34535                                  ;   HISTORY
 34536                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34537                                  ;
 34538                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34539                                  
 34540                                  srch_block:	          ; returns BX -> named block in CONFIG.SYS
 34541                                          push    ax              ;
 34542                                          push    cx              ;
 34543                                          mov     cx,[cs:count]   ;
 34544                                          push    si              ;
 34545                                          sub     si,si           ;
 34546                                          push    ds              ;
 34547                                          push    es              ;
 34548                                          pop     ds              ;
 34549                                          call    find_block      ;
 34550                                          mov     di,si           ;
 34551                                          mov     bx,cx           ;
 34552                                          pop     ds              ;
 34553                                          pop     si              ;
 34554                                          pop     cx              ;
 34555                                          pop     ax              ;
 34556                                  find_exit: ; 16/04/2019
 34557                                          retn			;
 34558                                  
 34559                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34560                                  ;
 34561                                  ;   find_block:  searches rest of config.sys for block name @DS:DI
 34562                                  ;
 34563                                  ;   INPUT
 34564                                  ;    DS:DI -> block name to find
 34565                                  ;    ES:SI -> remainder of config.sys image
 34566                                  ;       CX == remaining size of config.sys image
 34567                                  ;
 34568                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34569                                  ;       ZF flag set, if found (also, CF set if EOF)
 34570                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the search stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 34571                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34572                                  ;
 34573                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34574                                  ;       AX
 34575                                  ;
 34576                                  ;   NOTES
 34577                                  ;       This differs from "srch_block" in that it searches only the
 34578                                  ;       remaining portion of the config.sys image and leaves SI and CX
 34579                                  ;       pointing to where the search left off, and that it takes a pointer
 34580                                  ;       to search string in our own segment (DS:DI instead of ES:DI).
 34581                                  ;
 34582                                  ;   HISTORY
 34583                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34584                                  ;
 34585                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34586                                  
 34587                                  find_block:
 34588                                          call    get_char        ; get line code
 34589                                          jc	short find_exit	; end of file
 34590                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY
 34591                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; beginning of a block?
 34592                                          je	short check_line ; no
 34593                                          cmp     al,CONFIG_INCLUDE
 34594                                          jne	short next_line	;
 34595                                          or	byte [cs:config_multi],1
 34596                                          jmp     short next_line ;
 34597                                  check_line:
 34598                                          or      byte [cs:config_multi],1
 34599                                          call    comp_names      ; compare block names
 34600                                          jbe	short find_exit	; end of file, or names matched
 34601                                  next_line:
 34602                                          call    skip_opt_line   ; no, so skip to next line
 34603                                          jmp	short find_block  ;
 34604                                  ;find_exit:
 34605                                  ;	retn
 34606                                  
 34607                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34608                                  ;
 34609                                  ;   comp_names:  compares keyword @DS:DI to position in config.sys @ES:SI
 34610                                  ;
 34611                                  ;   INPUT
 34612                                  ;    DS:DI -> keyword to compare
 34613                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 34614                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 34615                                  ;
 34616                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34617                                  ;       ZF flag set, if match (also, CF set if EOF)
 34618                                  ;    ES:SI -> where the comparison stopped (at end of block name or EOF)
 34619                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 34620                                  ;
 34621                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34622                                  ;       AX
 34623                                  ;
 34624                                  ;   NOTES
 34625                                  ;       None
 34626                                  ;
 34627                                  ;   HISTORY
 34628                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34629                                  ;
 34630                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34631                                  
 34632                                  comp_names:
 34633                                          push    di              ;
 34634                                  comp_loop:                      ;
 34635                                          call    get_char        ;
 34636                                          jc	short comp_exit	;
 34637                                          call    any_delim       ; is next character a delimiter?
 34638                                          mov     ah,[di]         ; (get next character we're supposed to match)
 34639                                          je	short comp_almost ; yes, it *could* be a match
 34640                                          inc     di              ;
 34641                                          and     ax,~2020h ; 0DFDFh 
 34642                                  				; BUGBUG -- assumes both names are alphanumeric -JTP
 34643                                          cmp     al,ah           ; match?
 34644                                          je	short comp_loop ; yes, keep looking at the characters
 34645                                          clc                     ; prevent erroneous eof indication: clear carry
 34646                                  comp_exit:                      ;
 34647                                          pop     di              ;
 34648                                          retn			;
 34649                                  comp_almost:                    ;
 34650                                          xchg    al,ah           ; we don't know for sure if it's a match
 34651                                          call    any_delim       ; until we verify that the second string has
 34652                                          xchg    al,ah           ; been exhausted also...
 34653                                          jmp     comp_exit       ; if we are, this call to any_delim will tell...
 34654                                  
 34655                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34656                                  
 34657                                  comp_names_safe:
 34658                                          push    ax
 34659                                          push    cx
 34660                                          push	si
 34661                                          push    ds
 34662                                          push    cs
 34663                                          pop     ds
 34664                                          call    comp_names
 34665                                          pop     ds
 34666                                  	pop	si
 34667                                          pop     cx
 34668                                          pop     ax
 34669                                          retn
 34670                                  
 34671                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34672                                  ;
 34673                                  ;   print_item:  display menu item #BL
 34674                                  ;
 34675                                  ;   INPUT
 34676                                  ;       BL == menu item # to display
 34677                                  ;
 34678                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34679                                  ;       Menu item displayed, with appropriate highlighting if BL == bDefBlock
 34680                                  ;
 34681                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34682                                  ;       None
 34683                                  ;
 34684                                  ;   NOTES
 34685                                  ;       This function saves/restores the current cursor position, so you
 34686                                  ;       needn't worry about it.
 34687                                  ;
 34688                                  ;   HISTORY
 34689                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34690                                  ;
 34691                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34692                                  
 34693                                  print_item:		; prints menu item #BL (1 to N)
 34694                                          push    ax              ;
 34695                                          push    bx              ;
 34696                                          push    cx              ;
 34697                                          push    dx              ;
 34698                                          push    si              ;
 34699                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 34700                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; always page zero
 34701                                          int     10h             ; DH/DL = row/column
 34702                                          push    dx              ; save it
 34703                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 34704                                          mov     dh,bl           ;
 34705                                          add     dh,3            ;
 34706                                          mov     dl,5            ;
 34707                                          int     10h             ; set cursor position for correct row/col
 34708                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 34709                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert menu item # to ASCII digit
 34710                                          mov     ah,[bMenuColor] ; normal attribute
 34711                                          cmp     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; are we printing the current block?
 34712                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 34713                                          or      ah,70h          ; yes, set bgnd color to white
 34714                                          mov     ch,ah           ;
 34715                                          mov     cl,4            ;
 34716                                          rol     ch,cl           ;
 34717                                          cmp     ch,ah           ; are fgnd/bgnd the same?
 34718                                          jne	short print_other ; no
 34719                                          xor     ah,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 34720                                  print_other:                    ;
 34721                                          mov     bh,0            ;
 34722                                          add     bx,bx           ;
 34723                                          mov     di,[aoffBlockDesc+bx]
 34724                                          mov     bl,ah           ; put the attribute in the correct register now
 34725                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ; get correct video page #
 34726                                          mov     ah,09h          ; write char/attr
 34727                                          mov     cx,1            ;
 34728                                          int     10h             ;
 34729                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 34730                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34731                                          int     10h             ;
 34732                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+'.'    ;
 34733                                          mov	ax,092Eh
 34734                                  	int     10h             ; display '.'
 34735                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 34736                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34737                                          int     10h             ;
 34738                                          ;mov	ax,0900h+' '    ;
 34739                                          mov	ax,0920h
 34740                                  	int     10h             ; display ' '
 34741                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 34742                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34743                                          int     10h             ;
 34744                                          push    es              ;
 34745                                  print_loop:                     ;
 34746                                          mov     al,[es:di]	; get a character of the description
 34747                                          inc     di              ;
 34748                                          cmp     al,TAB ; 9	; substitute spaces for tabs
 34749                                          jne	short print_nontab ;
 34750                                          mov     al,' '          ;
 34751                                  print_nontab:                   ;
 34752                                          cmp     al,' '          ;
 34753                                          jb	short print_done ; stop at the 1st character < space
 34754                                          cmp     al,'$'          ;
 34755                                          je	short print_done ; also stop on $
 34756                                          mov     ah,09h          ; display function #
 34757                                          int     10h             ;
 34758                                          inc     dl              ; increment column
 34759                                          cmp     dl,78           ; far enough?
 34760                                          jae	short print_done ; yes
 34761                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34762                                          int     10h             ;
 34763                                          jmp     print_loop      ;
 34764                                  print_done:                     ;
 34765                                          pop     es              ;
 34766                                          pop     dx              ;
 34767                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 34768                                          int     10h             ; restore previous row/col
 34769                                          pop     si              ;
 34770                                          pop     dx              ;
 34771                                          pop     cx              ;
 34772                                          pop     bx              ;
 34773                                          pop     ax              ;
 34774                                          retn			;
 34775                                  
 34776                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34777                                  ;
 34778                                  ;   select_item:  wait for user to select menu item, with time-out
 34779                                  ;
 34780                                  ;   INPUT
 34781                                  ;       None
 34782                                  ;
 34783                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34784                                  ;       BX == menu item # (1-N), or -1 for clean boot
 34785                                  ;       Selected menu item highlighted
 34786                                  ;       Cursor positioned beneath menu, ready for tty-style output now
 34787                                  ;
 34788                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34789                                  ;       None
 34790                                  ;
 34791                                  ;   NOTES
 34792                                  ;       None
 34793                                  ;
 34794                                  ;   HISTORY
 34795                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34796                                  ;
 34797                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34798                                  
 34799                                  select_item:		; returns digit value in BX (trashes AX/CX/DX)
 34800                                          mov     bl,[bDefBlock]  ; BL will be the default block #
 34801                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 34802                                          call    disp_num        ;
 34803                                          call    show_status     ; display current interactive status
 34804                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 34805                                          je	short input_key	; no time-out, just go to input
 34806                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME ; 2Ch
 34807                                          int     21h             ;
 34808                                          mov     bh,dh           ; BH = initial # of seconds
 34809                                  check_time:
 34810                                          mov     al,[secTimeOut] ;
 34811                                          sub     al,[secElapsed] ;
 34812                                          jae	short show_time	;
 34813                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2  ; disable all further prompting
 34814                                          mov     byte [secElapsed],0
 34815                                          jmp	select_done	; time's up!
 34816                                  show_time:
 34817                                          push    bx              ;
 34818                                          mov     bl,al           ; save # in BL
 34819                                          mov     bh,[bMenuPage]  ;
 34820                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 34821                                          int     10h             ;
 34822                                          push    dx              ;
 34823                                  	add	dl,8		; move cursor to the right
 34824                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 34825                                          int     10h             ;
 34826                                          mov     dx,_$TimeOut
 34827                                          call    print           ; print the "Time remaining: " prompt
 34828                                          mov     al,bl           ; recover # from BL
 34829                                          cbw                     ; this works because AL is always <= 90
 34830                                          mov     cl,10           ;
 34831                                          div     cl              ; AL = tens digit, AH = ones digit
 34832                                          mov     cl,ah           ;
 34833                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 34834                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 34835                                          int     10h             ; write TTY tens digit
 34836                                          mov     al,cl           ;
 34837                                          add     al,'0'          ;
 34838                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ;
 34839                                          int     10h             ; write TTY ones digit
 34840                                          pop     dx
 34841                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position back to where it was
 34842                                          int     10h             ;
 34843                                          pop     bx              ;
 34844                                  input_key:
 34845                                          mov     ah,RAW_CON_IO ; 6
 34846                                          mov     dl,0FFh         ; input request
 34847                                          int     21h             ;
 34848                                          jnz	short got_key	;
 34849                                          cmp     byte [secTimeOut],-1; is there a time-out?
 34850                                          je	short input_key	; no, just go back to input
 34851                                          mov     ah,GET_TIME     ;
 34852                                          int     21h             ; DH = seconds
 34853                                          mov     ah,dh           ;
 34854                                          sub     dh,bh           ; should generally be zero or one
 34855                                          mov     bh,ah           ;
 34856                                          jnc	short got_time	;
 34857                                          mov     dh,1            ; it wrapped back to zero, so assume one
 34858                                  got_time:
 34859                                          or      dh,dh           ; any change?
 34860                                          jz	short input_key	; no
 34861                                          add     [secElapsed],dh ;
 34862                                          jmp	short check_time ;
 34863                                  got_key:
 34864                                          push    ax              ;
 34865                                          mov     ax,-1           ; zap both secTimeOut and secElapsed
 34866                                          xchg    [secTimeOut],ax
 34867                                          cmp     al,-1           ; was time-out already disabled?
 34868                                          je	short timeout_disabled ; yes
 34869                                          push    bx              ; let's disable # seconds display
 34870                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 34871                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 34872                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be safe
 34873                                          int     10h             ; to completely obliterate # seconds display
 34874                                          pop     bx   		;
 34875                                  
 34876                                  timeout_disabled:
 34877                                          pop     ax              ;
 34878                                          or      al,al           ; extended key pressed?
 34879                                          jnz	short normal_key ; no
 34880                                          int     21h             ; get the next part of the key then
 34881                                          jz	short input_key	; hmmm, what happened to the second part?
 34882                                  
 34883                                          cmp     al,48h          ; up arrow?
 34884                                          jne	short not_up	; no
 34885                                          cmp     bl,1            ; are we as up as up can get?
 34886                                          jbe	short input_key	; yes, ignore it
 34887                                          dec     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 34888                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 34889                                          dec     bl              ; and then print the new current item
 34890                                          jmp     short print1
 34891                                  not_up:
 34892                                          cmp     al,50h          ; down arrow?
 34893                                          jne	short not_down	; no
 34894                                          cmp     bl,[bMaxBlock]  ; are we as down as down can get?
 34895                                          jae	short to_input_key ; yes, ignore it
 34896                                          inc     byte [bDefBlock] ;
 34897                                          call    print_item      ; re-print the current item
 34898                                          inc     bx              ; and then print the new current item
 34899                                  print1: 
 34900                                  	mov     al,bl           ;
 34901                                  print2: 
 34902                                  	call    print_item      ;
 34903                                          call    disp_num        ;
 34904                                  to_input_key:
 34905                                          jmp     input_key       ;
 34906                                  not_down:
 34907                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34908                                          jnz	short to_input_key ; don't allow F8 or F5
 34909                                          cmp     al,42h          ; F8 function key?
 34910                                          jne	short not_f8	; no
 34911                                          xor     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 34912                                          call    show_status     ;
 34913                                          jmp     input_key	;
 34914                                  not_f8:
 34915                                          cmp     al,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 34916                                          jne	short to_input_key ; no
 34917                                          mov     bx,-1           ; special return code (-1) indicating clean boot
 34918                                          mov     al,' '          ; don't want to display anything really;
 34919                                          jmp     short disp_input; just want to display the cr/lf sequence...
 34920                                  
 34921                                  normal_key:
 34922                                          cmp     al,0Dh          ; Enter?
 34923                                          je	short select_done ; yes
 34924                                          cmp     al,08h          ; backspace?
 34925                                          jne	short not_backspace ; no
 34926                                          mov     bx,-2 ; 0FFFEh	; yes, special return code
 34927                                          retn			;
 34928                                  not_backspace:
 34929                                          sub     al,'0'          ; is greater than '0'?
 34930                                          jbe	short to_input_key ; no
 34931                                          cmp     al,[bMaxBlock]  ; is less than or equal to the maximum digit?
 34932                                          ja	short to_input_key ; no
 34933                                          mov	[bDefBlock],al  ;
 34934                                          call    print_item      ; redisplay the current selection
 34935                                          mov     bl,al           ; set new selection
 34936                                          jmp	short print2
 34937                                  
 34938                                  select_done:
 34939                                          mov     bh,0            ; return a full 16-bit value (for indexing)
 34940                                          mov     al,bl           ;
 34941                                          add     al,'0'          ; convert it into a digit, then display it
 34942                                  
 34943                                  	; fall into disp_input
 34944                                  
 34945                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34946                                  
 34947                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34948                                  ;
 34949                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 34950                                  ;
 34951                                  ;   INPUT
 34952                                  ;       AL == character to display
 34953                                  ;
 34954                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34955                                  ;       None
 34956                                  ;
 34957                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34958                                  ;       None
 34959                                  ;
 34960                                  ;   NOTES
 34961                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 34962                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 34963                                  ;
 34964                                  ;   HISTORY
 34965                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34966                                  ;
 34967                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34968                                  
 34969                                  disp_input:
 34970                                          push    ax
 34971                                          cmp     al,' '
 34972                                          jae	short disp_ok
 34973                                          mov     al,' '
 34974                                  disp_ok:
 34975                                          mov     dl,al
 34976                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 34977                                          int     21h
 34978                                          mov     dx,crlfm
 34979                                          call    print
 34980                                          pop     ax
 34981                                          retn
 34982                                  
 34983                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34984                                  
 34985                                  disp_num:
 34986                                          push    bx
 34987                                          add     al,'0'
 34988                                          mov     ah,0Ah
 34989                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 34990                                          mov     cx,1
 34991                                          int     10h
 34992                                          pop     bx
 34993                                          retn
 34994                                  
 34995                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34996                                  ;
 34997                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 34998                                  ;
 34999                                  ;   INPUT
 35000                                  ;       None
 35001                                  ;
 35002                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35003                                  ;       None
 35004                                  ;
 35005                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35006                                  ;       None
 35007                                  ;
 35008                                  ;   NOTES
 35009                                  ;       None
 35010                                  ;
 35011                                  ;   HISTORY
 35012                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35013                                  ;
 35014                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35015                                  
 35016                                  show_status:
 35017                                          push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 35018                                          mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35019                                          mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35020                                          int     10h             ;
 35021                                          push    dx              ; save it
 35022                                          mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35023                                          mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 35024                                          test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35025                                          jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 35026                                          mov     dl,0            ;
 35027                                          int     10h             ;
 35028                                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35029                                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 35030                                          int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 35031                                          jmp     short show_done ;
 35032                                  show_onoff: 
 35033                                          int     10h
 35034                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 35035                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 35036                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 35037                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 35038                                  
 35039                                          mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 35040                                          cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 35041                                          jne	short show_noton ; no
 35042                                          mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 35043                                  show_noton:                     ;
 35044                                          mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 35045                                          int     10h             ;
 35046                                  show_done:                      ;
 35047                                          pop     dx              ;
 35048                                          mov     ah,02h          ;
 35049                                          int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 35050                                          pop     bx              ;
 35051                                          retn			;
 35052                                  
 35053                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35054                                  
 35055                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35056                                  ;
 35057                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 35058                                  ;
 35059                                  ;   INPUT
 35060                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35061                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35062                                  ;
 35063                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35064                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 35065                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 35066                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 35067                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35068                                  ;
 35069                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35070                                  ;       AX
 35071                                  ;
 35072                                  ;   NOTES
 35073                                  ;       None
 35074                                  ;
 35075                                  ;   HISTORY
 35076                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35077                                  ;
 35078                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35079                                  
 35080                                  skip_token:
 35081                                          call    get_char
 35082                                          jc	short skip_token_done
 35083                                          call    any_delim
 35084                                          jne	short skip_token
 35085                                  skip_check_eol:
 35086                                          cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 35087                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35088                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35089                                          je	short skip_token_eol
 35090                                          clc
 35091                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 35092                                  	retn
