 35093                                  skip_token_eol:
 35094                                          stc
 35095                                  skip_token_done:
 35096                                          retn
 35097                                  
 35098                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35099                                  ;
 35100                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 35101                                  ;
 35102                                  ;   INPUT
 35103                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35104                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35105                                  ;
 35106                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35107                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35108                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 35109                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 35110                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35111                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 35112                                  ;
 35113                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35114                                  ;       AX
 35115                                  ;
 35116                                  ;   NOTES
 35117                                  ;       None
 35118                                  ;
 35119                                  ;   HISTORY
 35120                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35121                                  ;
 35122                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35123                                  
 35124                                  skip_delim:       ; returns carry set if eol/eof
 35125                                          call    get_char        ;
 35126                                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 35127                                          jc	short skip_token_done ;
 35128                                          call    delim           ;
 35129                                          je	short skip_delim ;
 35130                                          jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 35131                                  
 35132                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35133                                  ;
 35134                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 35135                                  ;
 35136                                  ;   INPUT
 35137                                  ;       AL == last character read
 35138                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35139                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35140                                  ;
 35141                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35142                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35143                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 35144                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35145                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35146                                  ;
 35147                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35148                                  ;       AX
 35149                                  ;
 35150                                  ;   NOTES
 35151                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 35152                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 35153                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 35154                                  ;
 35155                                  ;   HISTORY
 35156                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35157                                  ;
 35158                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35159                                  
 35160                                  skip_opt_line:
 35161                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35162                                          je	short skip_line_done
 35163                                       
 35164                                  	; fall into skip_line
 35165                                  
 35166                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35167                                  ;
 35168                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 35169                                  ;
 35170                                  ;   INPUT
 35171                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35172                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35173                                  ;
 35174                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35175                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35176                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35177                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35178                                  ;
 35179                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35180                                  ;       AX
 35181                                  ;
 35182                                  ;   NOTES
 35183                                  ;       None
 35184                                  ;
 35185                                  ;   HISTORY
 35186                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35187                                  ;
 35188                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35189                                  
 35190                                  skip_line:
 35191                                          call    get_char
 35192                                          jc	short skip_line_done
 35193                                          cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35194                                          jne	short skip_line
 35195                                  skip_line_done:
 35196                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 35197                                          retn
 35198                                  
 35199                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35200                                  ;
 35201                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 35202                                  ;
 35203                                  ;   INPUT
 35204                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35205                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35206                                  ;
 35207                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35208                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 35209                                  ;       BX == binary #
 35210                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 35211                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35212                                  ;
 35213                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35214                                  ;       AX
 35215                                  ;
 35216                                  ;   NOTES
 35217                                  ;       None
 35218                                  ;
 35219                                  ;   HISTORY
 35220                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35221                                  ;
 35222                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35223                                  
 35224                                  ; 13/05/2019
 35225                                  
 35226                                  get_number:
 35227                                          sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 35228                                  num_loop:
 35229                                          call    get_char        ;
 35230                                          jc	short num_done	;
 35231                                          cmp     al,'0'          ; convert to value
 35232                                          jb	short num_done	; no more number
 35233                                          cmp     al,'9'          ;
 35234                                          ja	short num_done	;
 35235                                          push    ax              ;
 35236                                          mov     ax,10           ;
 35237                                          push    dx              ;
 35238                                          mul     bx              ;
 35239                                          pop     dx              ;
 35240                                          mov     bx,ax           ;
 35241                                          pop     ax              ;
 35242                                          sub     al,'0'          ;
 35243                                          cbw                     ;
 35244                                          add     bx,ax           ;
 35245                                          jmp	short num_loop	;
 35246                                  
 35247                                  	; 18/12/2022
 35248                                  ;num_done:
 35249                                          ;retn
 35250                                  
 35251                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35252                                  ;
 35253                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 35254                                  ;
 35255                                  ;   INPUT
 35256                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35257                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35258                                  ;
 35259                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35260                                  ;       AL == next character
 35261                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 35262                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35263                                  ;
 35264                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35265                                  ;       AX
 35266                                  ;
 35267                                  ;   NOTES
 35268                                  ;       None
 35269                                  ;
 35270                                  ;   HISTORY
 35271                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35272                                  ;
 35273                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35274                                  
 35275                                  get_char:
 35276                                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 35277                                          jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 35278                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 35279                                  	es	
 35280                                  	lodsb
 35281                                          mov     ah,al           ;
 35282                                          retn			;
 35283                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 35284                                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 35285                                  nearby_ret:
 35286                                          retn
 35287                                  
 35288                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35289                                  ;
 35290                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 35291                                  ;
 35292                                  ;   INPUT
 35293                                  ;       AL == current command code
 35294                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35295                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 35296                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 35297                                  ;
 35298                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35299                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 35300                                  ;
 35301                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35302                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 35303                                  ;
 35304                                  ;   NOTES
 35305                                  ;       None
 35306                                  ;
 35307                                  ;   HISTORY
 35308                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35309                                  ;
 35310                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35311                                  
 35312                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35313                                  query_user:
 35314                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 35315                                          ;jz	short qu_1		;
 35316                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35317                                  	;jmp	short skip_all		;
 35318                                  	jnz	short skip_all
 35319                                  qu_1:
 35320                                  	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?
 35321                                          jnz	short nearby_ret	; yes (and return carry clear!)
 35322                                          push    ax                      ;
 35323                                          mov     al,[config_cmd]         ;
 35324                                          test    byte [bQueryOpt],1	; query every command?
 35325                                          jnz	short query_all		; yes
 35326                                          test    al,CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY  ;
 35327                                          ;jnz	short query_all		;
 35328                                          ; 12/12/2022
 35329                                  	;jmp	short do_cmd		;
 35330                                  	jz	short do_cmd ; cf=0
 35331                                  query_all:
 35332                                  
 35333                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 35334                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 35335                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 35336                                  
 35337                                          push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35338                                          mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 35339                                          and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 35340                                          jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 35341                                  
 35342                                          mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 35343                                          sub     bx,bx                   ;
 35344                                          mov     di,comtab		;
 35345                                  find_match:                             ;
 35346                                          mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 35347                                          or      bl,bl                   ;
 35348                                          jz	short line_print	; end of table
 35349                                          inc     di                      ;
 35350                                          cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 35351                                          je	short cmd_match		; yes
 35352                                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 35353                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 35354                                          jmp	short find_match	; loop
 35355                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 35356                                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 35357                                          mov     ch,0                    ;
 35358                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35359                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 35360                                          mov     al,[di]                 ;
 35361                                          inc     di                      ;
 35362                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35363                                          int     21h                     ;
 35364                                          loop    cmd_print               ;
 35365                                          mov     dl,'='                  ;
 35366                                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 35367                                          jne	short cmd_notset	;
 35368                                          mov     dl,' '                  ;
 35369                                  cmd_notset:
 35370                                          int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 35371                                  line_print:                             ;
 35372                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 35373                                          es
 35374                                  	lodsb
 35375                                  	or      al,al                   ;
 35376                                          jnz	short non_null		;
 35377                                          mov     al,' '                  ;
 35378                                  non_null:                               ;
 35379                                          cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?
 35380                                          jb	short prompt_user	; yes, assume end of line
 35381                                          jne	short non_space		;
 35382                                          cmp     byte [es:si],' '	;
 35383                                          jb	short prompt_user	;
 35384                                  non_space:                              ;
 35385                                          mov     dl,al                   ;
 35386                                          mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;
 35387                                          int     21h                     ;
 35388                                          jmp	short line_print	;
 35389                                  prompt_user:                            ;
 35390                                          mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 35391                                  
 35392                                  generic_prompt:
 35393                                          call    print                   ;
 35394                                  input_loop:                             ;
 35395                                          mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 35396                                          int     16h                     ;
 35397                                          or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 35398                                          jnz	short not_func		; no
 35399                                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 35400                                          jne	short input_loop	; no
 35401                                          mov     al,[_$NO]                  ;
 35402                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 35403                                          jmp     short legal_char        ;
 35404                                  not_func:
 35405                                          and     al,~20h ; 0DFh		; converting to upper case
 35406                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 35407                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35408                                          cmp     al,[_$YES]		;
 35409                                          je	short legal_char	;
 35410                                          cmp     byte [config_cmd],0	;
 35411                                          je	short input_loop	; don't allow Esc on this query
 35412                                          cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?
 35413                                          jne	short input_loop	;
 35414                                          or      byte [bQueryOpt],2	; no more interactive boot prompts
 35415                                          mov     al,[_$YES]
 35416                                  legal_char:                             ;
 35417                                          call    disp_input              ;
 35418                                          pop     si                      ; restore pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 35419                                  
 35420                                          cmp     al,[_$NO]		; process line?
 35421                                          je	short skip_cmd		; no
 35422                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35423                                  	clc
 35424                                  do_cmd:
 35425                                  	pop     ax			;
 35426                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35427                                  	; cf=0
 35428                                  	;clc				; just do the command
 35429                                  	retn
 35430                                  
 35431                                  skip_cmd:
 35432                                  	pop     ax			;
 35433                                  skip_all:
 35434                                  	mov     ah,CONFIG_REM ; '0'	; fake out the rest of sysinit's processing
 35435                                  	stc
 35436                                  	retn
 35437                                  
 35438                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35439                                  ;
 35440                                  ;   print_error: displays multi-config error conditions
 35441                                  ;
 35442                                  ;   INPUT
 35443                                  ;    Carry set to pause, clear to not
 35444                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 35445                                  ;
 35446                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35447                                  ;       None
 35448                                  ;
 35449                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35450                                  ;       None
 35451                                  ;
 35452                                  ;   NOTES
 35453                                  ;       None
 35454                                  ;
 35455                                  ;   HISTORY
 35456                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35457                                  ;
 35458                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35459                                  
 35460                                  print_error:
 35461                                          push    ax
 35462                                          push    bx
 35463                                          push    cx
 35464                                          push    dx
 35465                                          push    ds
 35466                                          push    cs
 35467                                          pop     ds
 35468                                          pushf
 35469                                          call    get_linenum
 35470                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 35471                                          call    error_line
 35472                                          popf
 35473                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 35474                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 35475                                          call    print
 35476                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 35477                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 35478                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 35479                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 35480                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 35481                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 35482                                  pe_1:     
 35483                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 35484                                          call    print
 35485                                  pe_ret: 
 35486                                  	pop     ds
 35487                                          pop     dx
 35488                                          pop     cx
 35489                                          pop     bx
 35490                                          pop     ax
 35491                                  	retn
 35492                                  
 35493                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35494                                  
 35495                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 35496                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 35497                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 35498                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 35499                                  
 35500                                  disable_autoexec:
 35501                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 35502                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35503                                  
 35504                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35505                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 35506                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 35507                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 35508                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 35509                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 35510                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 35511                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 35512                                  dae_1:
 35513                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 35514                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 35515                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 35516                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 35517                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 35518                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 35519                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 35520                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 35521                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 35522                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 35523                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 35524                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 35525                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 35526                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 35527                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 35528                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 35529                                          dec     bx                      ;
 35530                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 35531                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 35532                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 35533                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 35534                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 35535                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 35536                                          retn
 35537                                  
 35538                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 35539                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35540                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35541                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 35542                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35543                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 35544                                  	mov     dx,'Y ' ; 2059h ; 11/09/2023
 35545                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 35546                                  
 35547                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35548                                  
 35549                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 35550

 35556                                  ; procedure : delim
 35557                                  ;
 35558                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35559                                  
 35560                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35561                                  ;
 35562                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35563                                  ;
 35564                                  ;any_delim:
 35565                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35566                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35567                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35568                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35569                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 35570                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35571                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 35572                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35573                                  ;
 35574                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35575                                  
 35576                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35577                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 35578                                  delim:
 35579 00003085 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 35580 00003087 7416                    	je	short delim_ret
 35581                                  
 35582 00003089 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 35583 0000308B 7412                    	je	short delim_ret
 35584                                  
 35585                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 35586 0000308D 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 35587 0000308F 740E                    	je	short delim_ret
 35588 00003091 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 35589 00003093 740A                    	je	short delim_ret
 35590 00003095 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 35591 00003097 7406                    	je	short delim_ret
 35592 00003099 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 35593 0000309B 7402                    	je	short delim_ret
 35594 0000309D 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 35595                                  
 35596                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35597                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35598                                  ;;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 35599                                  ;	clc
 35600                                  ;;endif
 35601                                  
 35602                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35603                                  delim_ret:
 35604 0000309F C3                      	retn

 35625                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 35626                                  ;
 35627                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35628                                  
 35629                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35630                                  mapcase:
 35631 000030AD 51                      	push	cx
 35632 000030AE 56                      	push	si
 35633 000030AF 1E                      	push	ds
 35634                                  
 35635 000030B0 06                      	push	es
 35636 000030B1 1F                      	pop	ds
 35637                                  
 35638                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35639                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35640                                  ;
 35641                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 35642                                  ;;else
 35643                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 35644                                  ;;endif
 35645                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35646 000030B2 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 35647                                  
 35648                                  convloop:
 35649 000030B4 AC                      	lodsb
 35650 000030B5 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 35651 000030B7 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 35652 000030B9 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 35653 000030BB 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 35654 000030BD 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 35655 000030BF 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 35656                                  noconv:
 35657                                  
 35658                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35659                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35660                                  ;;
 35661                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 35662                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 35663                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 35664                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 35665                                  ;;
 35666                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 35667                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 35668                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 35669                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 35670                                  ;check_eol:
 35671                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35672                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35673                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35674                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35675                                  ;;endif
 35676                                  	
 35677                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35678 000030C2 E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 35679                                  convdone:
 35680 000030C4 1F                      	pop	ds
 35681 000030C5 5E                      	pop	si
 35682 000030C6 59                      	pop	cx
 35683 000030C7 C3                      	retn

 35686                                  ;
 35687                                  ; procedure : round
 35688                                  ;
 35689                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 35690                                  ; perform bounds check.
 35691                                  ;
 35692                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35693                                  
 35694                                  round:
 35695 000030C8 50                      	push	ax
 35696 000030C9 2EA1[DE03]              	mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 35697                                  
 35698 000030CD E8F1DF                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 35699                                  
 35700 000030D0 2E0106[E003]            	add	[cs:memhi],ax
 35701 000030D5 2EC706[DE03]0000        	mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 35702 000030DC 2EA1[E003]              	mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 35703 000030E0 2E3B06[A302]            	cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 35704 000030E5 7322                    	jae	short mem_err
 35705 000030E7 2EF606[3614]02          	test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 35706 000030ED 7418                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 35707 000030EF 06                      	push	es
 35708 000030F0 56                      	push	si
 35709 000030F1 2E8B36[3414]            	mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 35710 000030F6 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 35711 000030F8 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 35712 000030FA 48                      	dec	ax
 35713                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 35714 000030FB 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 35715 000030FF 2E8026[3614]FD          	and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 35716 00003105 5E                      	pop	si
 35717 00003106 07                      	pop	es
 35718                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 35719 00003107 58                      	pop	ax
 35720                                  	; 11/12/2022
 35721                                  	; cf = 0
 35722                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35723                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 35724 00003108 C3                      	retn
 35725

 35782                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35783                                  ;
 35784                                  ; procedure : getnum
 35785                                  ;
 35786                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 35787                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 35788                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 35789                                  ;
 35790                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35791                                  
 35792                                  getnum:
 35793 0000313F 53                      	push	bx
 35794 00003140 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 35795                                  b2:
 35796 00003142 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 35797 00003145 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 35798                                  
 35799 00003147 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 35800 00003148 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 35801                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 35802                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35803 00003149 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 35804 0000314B F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 35805 0000314D 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 35806 0000314E 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 35807 00003150 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 35808 00003153 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 35809                                  
 35810 00003155 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 35811                                  
 35812 00003156 E8E2F5                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 35813 00003159 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 35814 0000315B 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 35815 0000315D 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 35816 0000315F 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 35817 00003161 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 35818 00003163 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 35819 00003165 7417                    	je	short b15
 35820 00003167 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 35821 0000316C 7410                    	je	short b15
 35822 0000316E 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 35823                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 35824                                  	;nop
 35825                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35826                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35827                                  	;nop
 35828                                  	;nop
 35829 00003170 740C                    	je	short b15
 35830 00003172 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 35831 00003174 7408                    	je	short b15
 35832 00003176 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35833 00003178 7404                    	je	short b15
 35834 0000317A 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 35835 0000317C 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 35836                                  b15:
 35837 0000317E 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 35838 00003183 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 35839                                  b1:
 35840 00003188 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 35841 0000318A 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 35842 0000318C 5B                      	pop	bx
 35843 0000318D C3                      	retn
 35844                                  badnum:
 35845                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35846                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 35847 0000318E 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 35848                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 35849 00003190 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 35850 00003194 5B                      	pop	bx
 35851 00003195 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 35852 00003196 C3                      	retn
 35853                                  
 35854                                  ;****************************************************************************
 35855                                  
 35856                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 35857                                  
 35858                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35859                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 35860                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 35861                                  ;	si = 0
 35862                                  ;	ax = country id
 35863                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 35864                                  ;	bx = file handle
 35865                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 35866                                  ;
 35867                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 35868                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 35869                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 35870                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 35871                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35872                                  
 35873 00003197 57                      	push	di
 35874 00003198 50                      	push	ax
 35875 00003199 52                      	push	dx
 35876                                  
 35877 0000319A 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx

 36138                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 36139                                  
 36140                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 36141                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 36142                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 36143                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 36144                                  ;	 be moved.
 36145                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 36146                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 36147                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 36148                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 36149                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 36150                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 36151                                  
 36152 000032F3 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 36153 000032F4 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36154 000032F7 F9                      	stc
 36155 000032F8 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36156 000032FA 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 36157 000032FB 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 36158                                  
 36159 000032FD 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 36160 000032FF 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 36161 00003301 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 36162 00003303 F9                      	stc
 36163 00003304 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 36164                                  ricb_exit:
 36165 00003306 C3                      	retn
